GK16andhvc3u:1_0: tṛtīya uddyotaḥ - - - evaṃ vyaṅgyamukhenaiva dhvaneḥ pradarśite saprabhede svarūpe
GK16andhvc3u:1_1: punarvyañjakamukhenaitatprakāśyate--- locanam tṛtīya uddyotaḥ smarāmi smarasaṃhāralīlāpāṭavaśālinaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:4: tatra vācyamukhena tāvadavivakṣitavācyādayo bhedāḥ, vācyaśca yadyapi vyañjaka eva /
GK16andhvc3u:6: tataśca vyañjakamukhenāpi bheda uktaḥ, tathāpi sa vācyo 'rtho vyaṅgyamukhenaiva bhidyate /
GK16andhvc3u:8_0: vivakṣitānyaparo vācya iti vyaṅgyārthapravaṇa evocyate ityevaṃ mūlabhedayoreva yathāsvamavāntarabhedasahitayorvyañjakarūpo
GK16andhvc3u:8_1: bālapriyā atha tṛtīyodyotaṭippaṇī prārabhyate athāhaṃ prauḍhamudyotaṃ tṛtīyañca yathāmati /
GK16andhvc3u:11: smarasya kāmasya saṃhāra eva līlā, tatra yatpāṭavaṃ sāmarthyaṃ tacchālinaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:12: śambhoḥ dehārdhaṃ prasahya harantīmityanena parameśvaryāḥ tathāvidhāt parameśvarādapyatiśayitaṃ pāṭavaṃ dyotyate /
GK16andhvc3u:15: tasya saṅgāta dvitīyoyotena saha prasaṅgarūpāṃ saṅgatimityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:46: avivakṣitavācyasyātyantatiraskṛtavācye prabhede padaprakāśatā yathā maharṣervyāsasya---'saptaitāḥ samidhaḥ śriyaḥ',
GK16andhvc3u:47: yathā vā kālidāsasya---'kaḥ sannaddhe virahavidhurāṃ tvayyupekṣeta jāyām',
GK16andhvc3u:48: yathā vā--'kimiva hi madhurāṇāṃ maṇḍanaṃ nākṛtīnām',
GK16andhvc3u:49: eteṣūdāharaṇeṣu 'samidha' iti sannaddha' iti 'madhurāṇā'miti ca padāni vyañjakatvābhiprāyeṇaiva kṛtāni /
GK16andhvc3u:52: kiṃ ca yadyapyartho vyañjakastathāpi vyaṅgyatāyogyo 'pyasau bhavatīti,
GK16andhvc3u:53: śabdastu na kadācidyvaṅgyaḥ api tu vyañjaka eveti /
GK16andhvc3u:55: na ca vācyasyāvivakṣitādirūpeṇa yo bhedastatra sarvathaiva na na prakāśitaḥ kintu prakāśito 'pyadhunā punaḥ śuddhavyañjakamukhena /
GK16andhvc3u:56: tathāhi vyaṅgyamukhaprekṣitayā vinā padaṃ vākyaṃ varṇāḥ padabhāgaḥ saṅghaṭanā mahāvākyamiti svarūpata eva v.yañjakānāṃ bhedaḥ,
GK16andhvc3u:57: na caiṣāmarthavatkadācidapi vyaṅgyatā sambhavatīti vyañjakaikaniyataṃ svarūpaṃ yattanmukhena bhedaḥ prakāśyata iti tātparyam /
GK16andhvc3u:59: sa evaṃ praṣṭavyaḥ---etattāvatrribhedatvaṃ na kārikākāreṇa kṛtam /
GK16andhvc3u:61: na cedānīṃ vṛttikārobhedaprakaṭanaṃ karoti bālapriyā pradarśita ityukterabhiprāyāntarañcāstītyarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:70: nanvevaṃ punarvyañjakamukhenetyatra punaśaśbdo 'nupapanna ityatastātparyaṃ vivṛṇoti---na cetyādi /
GK16andhvc3u:74: 'vyañjakamukhatvam' iti pāṭhe vācyasyetyādeḥ vācyasambandhiyadavivakṣitādirūpaṃ avivakṣitatvādikantena hetunā yo bhedaḥ dhvaneravāntarabhedaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:84: locanam tataścedaṃ kṛtamidaṃ kriyata iti kartṛbhede kā saṅgatiḥ?
GK16andhvc3u:86: avivakṣitavācyādīnāmapi prakārāṇāṃ darśitatvādityalaṃ nijapūjyajanasagotraiḥ sākaṃ vivādena /
GK16andhvc3u:88: tenāvivakṣitavācyo dviprabhedo 'pi pratyekaṃ padavākyaprakāśa iti dvidhā /
GK16andhvc3u:89: tadanyasya vivakṣitābhidheyasya sambandhī yo bhedaḥ kramadyotyo nāma svabhedasahitaḥ so 'pi pratyekaṃ dvidhaiva /
GK16andhvc3u:90: anuraṇanena rūpaṃ rūpaṇasādṛśyaṃ yasya tādṛgvyaṅgyaṃ yattasyetyarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:92: atha ca rāmāyaṇamahābhārata prabhṛtini lakṣye dṛśyata iti /
GK16andhvc3u:93: dhṛtiḥ kṣamā dayā śaucaṃ kāruṇyaṃ vāganiṣṭhurā /
GK16andhvc3u:96: samicchabdena ca vyaṅgyo 'rtho 'nanyāpekṣalakṣmyuddīpanakṣamatvaṃ saptānāṃ vakrabhipretaṃ dhvanitam /
GK16andhvc3u:99: atra ca vācyasyātyantatiraskāraḥ pūrvoktamanusṛtya bālapriyā svarūpamiti /
GK16andhvc3u:102: ityasya kartṛbhede sati saṅgatatvaṃ na sambhavatītyarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:103: 'vyaṅgyamukhena pradarśite punarvyañjakamukhenaitatprakāśyata' ityanena pradarśanaprakāśanayorekakartṛkatvaṃ svarasataḥ pratīyate,
GK16andhvc3u:123: 'śabdena ce'tyanantaraṃ tasyaivārthāntarasaṅkramitavācye yathā---'rāmeṇa priyajīvitena tu kṛtaṃ locanam yojanīyaḥ kiṃ punaruktena /
GK16andhvc3u:125: tathaiva madhuraśabdena sarvaviṣayarañjakatvatarpakatvādikaṃ lakṣayatā sātiśayāmilāṣaviṣayatvaṃ nātrāścaryamiti vakrabhipretaṃ dhvanyate /
GK16andhvc3u:128: 'pratyākhyānaruṣaḥ kṛtaṃ samucitaṃ krūreṇa te rakṣasā soḍhaṃ tacca tathā tvayā kulajano dhatte yathoccaiḥ śiraḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:129: vyartha samprati bibhratā dhanuridaṃ tvadyvāpadaḥ sākṣiṇā' iti /
GK16andhvc3u:130: rakṣaḥsvabhāvādeva yaḥ krūro 'natilaṅghyaśāsanatvadurmadatayā ca prasahya nirākriyamāṇaḥ kodhāndhaḥ tasyaitattāvatsvacittavṛttisamucitamanuṣṭhānaṃ yanmūrdhakartanaṃ nāma,
GK16andhvc3u:131: mānyo 'pi bālapriyā vyaṅgyo 'rtha iti pāṭho dṛśyate tatsatve dhvanitamityasya bodhitamityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:147: anatilaṅdhyaṃ śāsanaṃ yasya tatvena yā durmadatā ahamanatilaṅdhyaśāsana iti durabhimānaḥ tayeti krodhāndhatve hetuḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:153: taiti yathā tādṛgapi tayā na gaṇitastasyāstavetyarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:155: yathā yena prakāreṇa kulajana iti yaḥ kaścitpāmaraprāyo 'pi kulavadhūśabdavācyaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:156: uccaiḥ śiro dhattai evaṃvidhāḥ kila vayaṃ kulavadhvo bhavāma iti /
GK16andhvc3u:157: atha ca śilaḥkartanāvasare tvayā śīghraṃ kṛtyatāmiti tathā soḍhaṃ tathoccaiḥ śiro dhṛtaṃ yathānyo 'pi kulastrījana uccaiḥ śiro dhatte netyapravṛttatayā /
GK16andhvc3u:158: evaṃ rāvaṇasya tava ca samucitakāritvaṃ nirvyūḍham /
GK16andhvc3u:169: priyaśabdasya pravṛttinimittaṃ yatpremanāma tadapyanaucityakalaṅkitamiti bālapriyā rāvaṇena hi śrīrāmasya purato māyāsītāśiraśchedaḥ kṛtaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:172: te ityasya pratyākhyānetyanena, kṛtamityanena ca sambandhaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:184: uccaiśiśaro dhatta iti prārthanāpratyākhyānena krodhāndhe kasmiṃścit kāmini śiraḥkartanāyodyukte sati śira unnataṃ karotītyarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:202: emea jaṇo tissā deu kavolopamāi sasibimbam /
GK16andhvc3u:203: paramatthaviāre uṇa cando cando via varāo //
GK16andhvc3u:205: avivakṣitavācyasyātyantatiraskṛtavācye prabhede vākyaprakāśatā yathā---- yā niśā sarvabhūtānāṃ tasyāṃ jāgarti saṃyamī /
GK16andhvc3u:206: yasyāṃ jāgrati bhūtāni sā niśā paśyato muneḥ //
GK16andhvc3u:214_1: pratyuta tadadhikavastukartavyaṃ tato dūranikṛṣṭaṃ śaśibimbaṃ kalaṅkavyājajihmīkṛtam /
GK16andhvc3u:216: tathāpi yadi parīkṣakāḥ parīkṣante tadvarākaḥ kṛpaikabhājanaṃ yaścandra iti prasiddhaḥ sa candra eva kṣayitvavilāsaśūnyatvamalinatvadharmāntarasaṃkrānto yo 'rthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:219: evaṃ prathamabhedasya dvāvapi prakārau padaprakāśakatvenodāhṛtya vākyaprakāśakatvenodāharati---yā niśeti /
GK16andhvc3u:221: tena hyuktena na kaścidupadeśyaṃ pratyupadeśaḥ siddhyati /
GK16andhvc3u:233: kalaṅkavyājo yaḥ śaśaḥ tena jihmīkṛtaṃ malinīkṛtam /
GK16andhvc3u:235: dvitīyacandrapadasya candrapadavācyatvena guṇaśūnyatvena vā rūpeṇa lakṣaṇātra bodhyā /
GK16andhvc3u:245: anena hi vākyena niśārtho na ca jāgaraṇārthaḥ kaścidvivakṣitaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:247: tattvajñānāvahitatvamatattvaparāṅmukhatvaṃ ca muneḥ pratipādyata iti tiraskṛtavācyasyāsya vyañjakatvam /
GK16andhvc3u:248: tasyaivārthāntarasaṅkramitavācyasya vākyaprakāśatā yathā--- visamaio kāṇa vi kāṇa vi vālei abhiaṇimmāo /
GK16andhvc3u:249: kāṇa vi visāmiamao kāṇa vi avisāmao kālo //
GK16andhvc3u:252: iti chāyā ) locanam niśāyāṃ jāgaratavyamanyatra rātrivadāsitavyamiti kimanenoktena /
GK16andhvc3u:253: tasmādbādhitasvārthametadvākyaṃ saṃyamino lokottaratālakṣaṇena nimittena tatvadṛṣṭāvavadhānaṃ mithyādṛṣṭo ca parāṅmukhatvaṃ dhvanati /
GK16andhvc3u:254: sarvaśabdārthasya cāpekṣikatayāpyupapadyamānateti na sarvaśabdārtānyathānupapatyāyāmartha ākṣipto mantavyaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:255: sarvoṣāṃ brahmādisthāvarāntānāṃ caturdaśānāmapi bhūtānāṃ yā niśā vyāmohajananītattvadṛṣṭiḥ tasyāṃ saṃyamī jāgarti kathaṃ prāpyeteti /
GK16andhvc3u:269: nanvatra nidrākālarūpaniśāpadārthe sarvabhūtasambandhānvaye sarvapadārthaghaṭakatayā saṃyamino 'pi tadanvayaḥ prāptaḥ,
GK16andhvc3u:270: sa ca jāgartītyetadarthānvayino 'nupapannastasmādanenoktavyaṅgyasyāviṣkṛtatvānna dhvanitvamiti śaṅkāṃ pariharati---sarvaśabdārthasyetyādi /
GK16andhvc3u:284: locanam na tu viṣayavarjanamātrādeva saṃyamīti yāvat /
GK16andhvc3u:285: yadi vā sarvabhūtaniśāyāṃ mohinyāṃ jāgarti kathamiyaṃ heyeti /
GK16andhvc3u:286: yasyāṃ tu mithyādṛṣṭau sarvāṇi bhūtāni jāgrati atiśayena suprabuddharūpāṇi sā tasya rātriraprabodhaviṣayaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:290: anyastu na paśyata na ca manyata iti /
GK16andhvc3u:292: evaṃ ca paśyata ityapi munerityapi ca na svārthamātravibhrāntam /
GK16andhvc3u:294: yattacchabdayośca na svatantrārthateti sarva evāyamākhyātasahāyaḥ padasamūho vyaṅgyaparaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:301: keṣāmapi mūḍhaprāyāṇāṃ dhārāprāptayogabhūmikārūḍhānāṃ vā aviṣābhṛtamayaḥ kālo 'tikrāmatīti sambandhaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:304: na cātra suśaduḥkhasādhane tanmātraviśrānte, api tu svakartavyasukhaduḥkhaparyavasite /
GK16andhvc3u:305: na ca te sādhane sarvathā bālapriyā iyaṃ kathaṃ prāpyeteti matyā tatprāptyupāyamanutiṣṭhatītyarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:320: atra paśyatītyetaccaritārthabahiṣkaraṇavṛttitvena manyata ityetaccaritārthāntaḥkaraṇavṛttitvena ca rūpeṇa lakṣakamityāha---tasyaivetyādi /
GK16andhvc3u:342: tanmātraviśrāntena atra hi vākye viṣāmṛtaśabdābhyāṃ duḥkhasukharūpasaṅkramitavācyābhyāṃ vyavahāra ityarthāntarasaṅkramitavācyasyā vyañjakatvam /
GK16andhvc3u:343: vivakṣitābhidheyasyānuraṇanarūpavyaṅgyasya śabdaśaktyudbhave prabhede padaprakāśatā yathā--- locanam na vivakṣite /
GK16andhvc3u:351: evaṃ kārikāprathamārdhalakṣitāṃścaturaḥ prakārānudāhṛtya dvitīyakārikārdhasvīkṛtān ṣaḍanyān prakārān krameṇodāharati--vivakṣitābhidheyasyetyādinā /
GK16andhvc3u:353: dhanairiti bahuvacanaṃ yo yenārthī tasya teneti sūcanārtham /
GK16andhvc3u:355: janasyeti bāhulyena hi loko dhanārthī, na tu guṇairupakārārthī /
GK16andhvc3u:363: na ca na vivakṣite vivakṣite eva /
GK16andhvc3u:367: 'viṣaṃnimbamamṛtaṃ kapittham' ityādau nirūḍhalakṣaṇayā duḥkhasādhanaṃ nimbaṃ sukhasādhanaṃ kapitthamityevārthe vivakṣitaḥ,
GK16andhvc3u:368_0: prakṛte tu kālaḥ keṣāñcidduḥkhamayaḥ keṣāñcitsukhamayaścātikrāmatītyarthasya vivakṣitatayā
GK16andhvc3u:368_1: viṣapadasya kiñcitsādhanakaduḥkhe amṛtapadasya kiñcitsādhanakasukhe ca lakṣaṇā duḥkhasukhayorviśeṣo vyaṅgyaḥ,
GK16andhvc3u:371: ajñātaviśeṣadharmāvacchinnavācakasya keṣāmapīti śabdasya ca duṣkṛtināmityādyuktārthaviśeṣe saṅkrāntirityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:380: dhanairarthijanasya vāñchāṃ prātuṃ daivena na sṛṣṭo yadi nāmetyabhyupagame /
GK16andhvc3u:382: jaḍo 'haṃ pathi prasannāmbudharastaṭākaḥ athavā kūpaḥ kiṃ kasmāt /
GK16andhvc3u:391: 'asmi na sṛṣṭa' prātuṃ dhanairarthijanasya vāñchāṃ daivena sṛṣṭo yadi nāma nāsmi /
GK16andhvc3u:392: pathi prasannāmbudharastaḍāgaḥ kūpo 'thavā kiṃ na jaḍaḥ kṛto 'ham // 1 //
GK16andhvc3u:393: atra hi jaḍa iti padaṃ nirviṇṇena vakrātmasamānādhikaraṇatayā prayuktamanuraṇanarūpatayā kūpasamānādhikaraṇatāṃ svaśaktyā pratipadyate /
GK16andhvc3u:394: tasyaiva vākyaprakāśatā yatā harṣacarite siṃhanādavākyeṣu--'vṛtte 'sminmahāpralaye dharaṇīdhāraṇāyādhunā tvaṃ śeṣaḥ' /
GK16andhvc3u:397: anyo hi tāvadavaśyaṃ kaścitsṛṣṭo na tvahamiti nirvedaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:402: jaḍaḥ kiṅkartavyatāmūḍha ityarthaḥ, atha ca kūpo jaḍo 'rthitā kasya kīdṛśītyasambhavadviveka iti /
GK16andhvc3u:408: mahasya utsavasya āsamantātpralayo yatra tādṛśi śokakāraṇabhūte vṛtte dharaṇyā rājyadhurāyā dhāraṇāyāśvāsanāya tvaṃ śeṣaḥ śiṣyamāṇaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:409: itīyatā pūrṇe vākyārthe kalpāvasāne bhūpīṭhabhārodvahanakṣam eko bālapriyā ityanena gamyamarthamāha--anyo hītyādi /
GK16andhvc3u:422: vṛttau 'kūpasamānādhikaraṇatāṃ pratipadyata' ityanena jaḍapadasya kūpapadasāmānādhikaraṇyamevoktanna tu taṭākapadasāmānādhikaraṇyamapi,
GK16andhvc3u:438: atra hyasamarpitamapi kusumaśareṇa madhumāsalakṣmyā mukhaṃ gṛhītamityasamarpitamapītyetadavasthābhidhāyipadamarthaśaktyā kusumaśarasya balātkāraṃ prakāśayati /
GK16andhvc3u:439: atraiva prabhede vākyaprakāśatā yathodāhṛtaṃ prāk 'sajjehi surahimāso' ityādi /
GK16andhvc3u:440: atra sajjayati surabhimāso na tāvadarpayatyanaṅgāya śarānityayaṃ vākyārthaḥ kaviprauḍhoktimātraniṣpannaśarīro manmathonmāthakadanāvasthāṃ vasantasamayasya sūcayati /
GK16andhvc3u:443: mahārghaṇa utsavaprasareṇa manoharasurasya manmathadevasya āmodaścamatkāro yatra tat /
GK16andhvc3u:451: 'prauḍhoktimātraniṣpannaśarīraḥ sambhavī svataḥ' iti prācyakārikāyā iyataivodāhṛtatvaṃ bhavedityabhiprāyeṇa /
GK16andhvc3u:452: tatra padaprakāśatā yathā--- satyaṃ manoramāḥ kāmāḥ satyaṃ ramyā vibhūtayaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:456: śeṣa' ityasya nāgarāja iti ca vivaraṇam /
GK16andhvc3u:469: vāṇiaa hattidantā kutto ahyāṇa bādhakittī a /
GK16andhvc3u:471: atra lulitālakamukhītyetatpadaṃ vyādhavadhvāḥ svataḥsambhāvitaśarīrārthaśaktyā suratakrīḍāsaktiṃ sūcayaṃstadīyasya bhartuḥ satatasambhogakṣāmatāṃ prakāśayati /
GK16andhvc3u:472: locanam ityatra kavinā yo virāgī vaktā nibaddhastatprauḍhoktyā jīvitaśabdo 'rthaśaktimūlatayedaṃ dhvanayati---sarva evāmī kāmā vibhūtayaśca svajīvitamātropayoginaḥ,
GK16andhvc3u:474: tadeva ca jīvitaṃ prāṇadhāraṇarūpatvātprāṇavṛtteśca cāñcalyādanāsthāpadamiti viṣayeṣu varākeṣu kiṃ doṣoddhoṣaṇadaurjanyena nijameva jīvitamupālabhyam,
GK16andhvc3u:475: tadapi ca nisargacañcalamiti na sāparādhamityetāvatā gāḍhaṃ vairāgyamiti /
GK16andhvc3u:481: atra luliteti savarūpamātreṇa viśeṣaṇamavaliptatayā cahastidantādyapāharaṇaṃ sambhāvyamiti vākyārthasya tāvatyeva na kācidanupapattiḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:482: bālapriyā kāmāḥ kāmyamānā vanitādayaḥ tadabhāve jīvitābhāve /
GK16andhvc3u:494: lulitāḥ itastato vikīrṇā alakā yatra tathāvidhaṃ mukhaṃ yasyāssā /
GK16andhvc3u:499: svatassambhāvitaṃ loke 'pyaucityātsambhāvyamānaṃ śarīraṃ ysaya tathāvidhasyārthasya śaktyā sāmarthyenetyarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:513: anenāpi vākyena vyādhavadhvā śikhipicchakarṇapūrāyā navapariṇītāyāḥ kasyāścitsaubhāgyātiśayaḥ prakāśyate /
GK16andhvc3u:514: tatsambhogaikaratho mayūramātramāraṇasamarthaḥ patirjātaṃ ityarthaprakāśanāt tadanyāsāṃ cirapariṇītānāṃ muktāphalaracitaprasādhanānāṃ daurbhāgyātiśayaḥ khyāpyate /
GK16andhvc3u:515: tatsambhogakāle sa eva vyādhaḥ karivaravadhavyāpārasamartha āsīdityarthaprakāśanāt /
GK16andhvc3u:516: nanu dhvaniḥ kāvyaviśeṣa ityuktaṃ katkathaṃ tasya padaprakāśatā /
GK16andhvc3u:527: avācakatvāditi yaduktaṃ so 'yamaprayojako heturiti chalena tāvaddarśayati--syādeṣa doṣa iti /
GK16andhvc3u:528: evaṃ chalena parihṛtya bālapriyā hastidantāderapāharaṇamanāharaṇaṃ dantādyanāharaṇamiti ca pāṭhaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:533: 'avavakṣitavācyasye'tyādikārikāyāṃ samudāyasyaiva dhvanipadārthavādatra pakṣa eva codyasyopapatteśceti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:551: smṛtāste tvākāṅgakṣādasahakṛtā vākyārthamanubhāvayantīti mate padasmāritatvarūpaṃ padaprakāśatvaṃ tattadartha eva vartate /
GK16andhvc3u:552: tatra ca kāvyaviśeṣatvarūpaṃ dhvanitvannāstītyato dhvaneḥ na padaprakāśatvaṃ,
GK16andhvc3u:554: anena granthena padanna dhvaniprakāśakamavācakatvādityarthaḥ phalita ityabhipretya 'syādeṣadoṣa' ityādisamādhānagranthamavatārayati locane---avācakatvādityādi /
GK16andhvc3u:558_0: kiṃ ca kāvyānāṃ śarīrāṇāmiva saṃsthānavaśeṣāvacchinnasamudāyasādhyāpi cārutvapratītiranvayavyatirekābhyāṃ
GK16andhvc3u:558_1: bhāgeṣu kalpyata iti padānāmapi vyañjakatvamukhena vyavasthito dhvanivyavahāro na virodhi /
GK16andhvc3u:560: yadi paro brūyāt---na mayā avācakatvaṃ dhvanyabhāve hetūkṛtaṃ kiṃ tūktaṃ kāvyaṃ dhvaniḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:561: kāvyaṃ cānākāṅkṣapratipattikāri vākyaṃ na padamiti tatrāha--satyamevaṃ,
GK16andhvc3u:564: tathā ca padaprakāśo dhvaniriti prakāśapadenoktam. nanu padasya tatra tathāvithaṃ sāmarthyamiti kuto 'khaṇḍa eva pratītikrama ityāśaṅkyāha--kāvyānāmiti /
GK16andhvc3u:566: nanu bhāgeṣu padarūpeṣu kathaṃ sā cārutvapratītirāropayituṃ śakyā? tāni hi smārakāṇyeva /
GK16andhvc3u:568: manohārivyaṅgyārthasmārakatvāddhi cārutvapratītinibandhanatvaṃ kena bālapriyā asādhaka ityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:573: nanu vastuvṛttena parihāraḥ kimartha ityataḥ kāvyānāmityādigranthamavatārayiṣyan bhūmikāmāha--yadi para ityādi /
GK16andhvc3u:578: kāvyaviśeṣo dhvaniḥ kāvyañca tathāvidhaṃ vākyamiti vākyameva dhvaniḥ, padantu na dhvanirityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:579: tathāca pade dhvanyabhāve avākyatvaṃ heturiti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:597: saṃsthānaviśeṣaiḥ śabdasandarbhaviśeṣaiḥ mukhādyavayavasaṃyogaviśeṣaiśca avacchinno viśiṣṭo yassamudāyastatsādhyāpītyarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:615: vākye saṅghaṭanāyāṃ ca sa prabandhe 'pi dīpyate // DhvK_3.2 //
GK16andhvc3u:618: vākye saṅghaṭanāyāṃ ca sa prabandhe 'pi dīpyate // 2 //
GK16andhvc3u:620: yathā śrutiduṣṭānāṃ pelavādipadānāmasabhyapelādyarthaṃ prati na vācakatvam /
GK16andhvc3u:623: tacca śrutiduṣṭatvamanvayavyatirekābhyāṃ bhāgeṣu vyavasthāpyate tathā prakṛte 'pīti tadāha--aniṣṭasyeti /
GK16andhvc3u:627: evaṃ dṛṣṭāntamabhidhāya pādatrayeṇa turyeṇa dārṣṭāntikārtha uktaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:629: yata eva miṣṭasmṛtiścārutvamāvaiti tena hetunā sarveṣu prakāreṣu nirūpitasya padamātrāvabhāsino 'pi padaprakāśasyāpi dhvane ramyatāsti smārakatve 'pi padānāmiti samanvayaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:653: virodhinaḥ syuḥ śṛṅgāre te na varṇā rasa-cyutaḥ // DhvK_3.3 //
GK16andhvc3u:654: ta eva tu niveśyante bībhatsādau rase yadā /
GK16andhvc3u:655: tadā taṃ dīpayanty eva te na varṇā rasa-cyutaḥ // DhvK_3.4 //
GK16andhvc3u:658: virodhinaḥ syuḥ śṛṅgāre tena varṇā rasacyutaḥ // 3 //
GK16andhvc3u:659: ta eva tu niveśyante bībhatsādau rase yadā /
GK16andhvc3u:660: tadā taṃ dīpayantyeva tena varṇā rasacyutaḥ // 4 //
GK16andhvc3u:671: yataste varṇā bhūyasā prayujyamānā na rasāṃścyotanti sravanti /
GK16andhvc3u:672: yadi vā tena śṛṅgāravirodhitvena hetunāvarṇāḥ śaṣādayo rasācchṛṅgārāccyavante taṃ na vyañjayantīti vyatireka uktaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:694: tallakṣaṇamuktaṃ bhaṭṭedbhaṭena---“śaṣābhyāṃ rephasaṃyogaiḥ ṭavargeṇa ca yojitā /
GK16andhvc3u:696: rasaścyuta iti pāṭhe te na iti padadvayamityāśayena vyācaṣṭe---te varṇā ityādi /
GK16andhvc3u:700: rasacyuta iti pāṭhe tu tenetyekaṃ padamityāha--yadi vetyādi /
GK16andhvc3u:701: tenetyasya vyākhyānam---śṛṅgāretyādi, rasāccyavanta ityasya taṃ na vyañjayantīti ca /
GK16andhvc3u:703: śaṣāvityādiślokena śakārādivarṇasatve śṛṅgārāvyaktyabhāvarūpo vyatarekaḥ pradarśita ityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:706: 'ta eve'tyādikārikāyāścaturthapāde rasaścyuta iti pade cālakṣyakramavyaṅgyasya dyotanaṃ yathā--- utkampinī bhayaparaskhalitāṃśukāntā te locane pratidiśaṃ vidhure kṣipantī /
GK16andhvc3u:707: krūreṇa dāruṇatayā sahasaiva dagdhā dhūmāndhitena dahanena na vīkṣitāsi //
GK16andhvc3u:710: asminviṣaye śṛṅgāralakṣaṇe śaṣādiprayogaḥ sukavitvamabhivāñchatā na kartavya ityevaṃphalatvādupadeśasya kārakākāreṇa pūrvaṃ vyatireka uktaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:711: na ca sarvathā na kartavyo 'pi tu bībhatsādau kartavya eveti paścādanvayaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:712: vṛttikāreṇa tvanvayapūrvako vyatireka iti śailīmanusartumanvayaḥ pūrvamupāttaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:715: tena varṇānāmapi śrutisamayopalakṣyamāṇārthānapekṣyapi śrotraikagrāhyo mṛduparuṣātmā bālapriyā pāṭhe tenetyekaṃ padaṃ,
GK16andhvc3u:716: rasacyuta iti pāṭhe tu te neti tadadvayamiti bodhyam /
GK16andhvc3u:718: ślokābhāyāmiti nirdeśe dvābhyāṃ ślokābhyāṃ pratapāditau yāvanvayavyatirekau tābhyāmityarthasya pratītyā yathāsaṅkhyamanvayasya prasaktirbhavatī,
GK16andhvc3u:719: ślokadvayeneti nirdeśe tu ślokātmakadvyavayavaghaṭitasamudāyena pratipāditau yāvanvayavyatirekau tābhyāmityarthasya pratītyā yathāsaṅkhyamanvayasya prasaktirbhavati,
GK16andhvc3u:720: ślekadvayeneti nirdeśe tu ślokātmakadvyavayavaghaṭitasamudāyena pratipāditau yāvanvayavyatirekau tābhyāmityarthasya pratītyāna tatprasaktiriti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:727: śrutiḥ śravaṇaṃ yeṣāntaiḥ śabdaiḥ samarpyamāṇā ityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:733: atra hi te ityetatpadaṃ rasamayatvena sphuṭamevāvabhāsate sahṛdayānām /
GK16andhvc3u:734: padāvayavena dyotanaṃ yathā--- vriḍāyogānnatavadanayā sannadhāne gurūṇāṃ baddhotkampaṃ kucakalaśayormanyumantarnigṛhya /
GK16andhvc3u:736: ata eva ca sahakāratāmevābhidhātuṃ nimittasaptamī kṛtā varṇapadādiṣviti /
GK16andhvc3u:737: na tu varṇareva rasābhivyaktiḥ, vibhāvādisaṃyogāddhi rasaniṣpattirityuktaṃ bahuśaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:738: śrotraikagrāhyo 'pi ca svabhāvo rasaniṣyande vyāpriyata eva,
GK16andhvc3u:743: te vibhavādayo yadā viśiṣṭena kenāpi padenārpyamāmā rasacamatkāravidhāyino bhavanti tadā padasyaivāsau mahimā samarpyata iti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:746_0: tatra ca śoko nāmeṣṭajanavināśaprabhava iti tasya janasya ye bhrūkṣepakaṭākṣaprabhṛtayaḥ
GK16andhvc3u:746_1: pūrvaṃ rativibhāvatāmavalambante sma ta evātyantavinaṣṭāḥ santa idānīṃ smṛtigocaratayā
GK16andhvc3u:779: tallocanagatatathāvidhaguṇagaṇaṃ buddhau kṛtvā rasāviṣṭena vaktrā te ityuktam,
GK16andhvc3u:780: sa evārthaḥ pratipattrāpi parāmṛśyata iti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:782: yatra hyanuddiśyamānadharmāntarasāhityayogyadharmayogitvaṃ vastuno yacchabdenābhidhāya tadbuddhisthadharmāntarasāhityaṃ tacchabdena nirvācyate /
GK16andhvc3u:788: te iti sātiśayavibhramaikāyatanarūpe apa locane vidhure kāndiśīkatayā nirlakṣe kṣipantī kastrātā kvāsāvāryaputra iti tayorlocanayostādṛśīcāvastheti sutarāṃ śokoddīpanam /
GK16andhvc3u:791: kiṃ kurutāṃ tathāpi ca dhūmenāndhīkṛto draṣṭumasamartha iti na tu savivekasyedṛśānucitakāritvaṃ sambhāvyate,
GK16andhvc3u:792: iti smaryamāṇaṃ tadīyaṃ saundaryamidānīṃ sātiśayaśokāveśavibhāvatāṃ prāptamiti /
GK16andhvc3u:797: yatra yo vidvān sa pūjya ityādau /
GK16andhvc3u:799: tathāvidhaṃ yaddharmāntaraṃ pūjyatvādikaṃ tatsāhityasya yogyaḥ prayojako yo dharmo vidvattvādiḥ tadyogitvaṃ tatsambandha ityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:802: tadbuddhisthañca yaddharmāntaraṃ viddhattvādakaṃ tasya sāhityaṃ sambandha ityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:833: dhūmāndhiteneti dahanasya viśeṣaṇaṃ, tacca hetugarbhamiti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:836: te iti tiṣṭhetyuktaṃ kimiva na tayā yatsamutsṛjya bāṣpaṃ mathyāsaktaścakitahariṇīhārinetratribhāgaḥ //
GK16andhvc3u:839: tatra śuddhasyodāharamaṃ yathā rāmābhyudaye---'kṛtakakupitaiḥ' ityādi locanam tribhāgaśabda iti /
GK16andhvc3u:840_0: gurujanamavadhīryāpi sā māṃ yatā tathāpi sābhilāṣamanyudainyagarvamantharaṃ vilokitavatītyevaṃ
GK16andhvc3u:843: varṇapadatadbhāgādiṣu satsvevālakṣyakramo vyaṅgyo nirbhāsamāno 'pi samastakāvyavyāpaka eva nirbhāsate,
GK16andhvc3u:846: vākyaṃ tu dhvaneralakṣyakramasya na nimittatāmātreṇa varṇādivadupakāri,
GK16andhvc3u:847: kiṃ tu samagravibhāvādapratipattivyāpṛtatvādrasādimayameva tannirbhāsata iti 'vākya' ityetatkārikāyāṃ bālapriyā padasyaivātra prādhānyamiti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:848: vṛttau 'jhaṭiti kanake'tyādyudāharaṇāntaraṃ prakṣiptamata eva na vivṛtaṃ locane /
GK16andhvc3u:849: pravāsodyatamātmānaṃ gurujanasannidhāne dṛṣṭavatyāḥ prayāyā darśanaprakāraṃ kaścit syayaṃ parāmṛśati ;
GK16andhvc3u:852: kucakalaśayoḥ baddhaḥ kṛta utkampaḥ yena tam /
GK16andhvc3u:854: tvaṃ tiṣṭeti māṃ prati na uktaṃ kimiva, uktameva /
GK16andhvc3u:855: yadyataḥ tayā bāṣpaṃ samutsṛjya cakitahariṇova cakitahariṇīnetramiva hāri,
GK16andhvc3u:856: yadvā--cakitahariṇyā hāri yannetraṃ tasya tribhāgaḥ tṛtīyo bhāgaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:882: etaddhi vākyaṃ parasparānurāgaṃ paripoṣaprāptaṃ pradarśayatsarvata eva paraṃ rasatattvaṃ prakāśayati /
GK16andhvc3u:884: locanam rikāyāṃ na nimittasaptamīmātram, api tvananyatra bhāvaviṣayārthamapīti /
GK16andhvc3u:886: kṛtakakupitaibāṣpāmbhobhiḥ sadainyavilokitair- vanamapi gatā yasya prītyā dhṛtāpi tathāmbayā /
GK16andhvc3u:887: navajaladharaśyāmāḥ paśyandiśo bhavatīṃ vinā kaṭhinahṛdayo jīvatyeva priye sa tava priyaḥ //
GK16andhvc3u:888: atra tathā taistaiḥ prakārairmātrā dhṛtāpītyanurāgaparavaśatvena guruvacanollaṅghanamapi tvayā kṛtamiti /
GK16andhvc3u:889: priye priya iti parasparajīvitasarvasvābhimānātmako ratisthāyibhāva uktaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:897: tadapi likhitaprakhyairaṅgaiḥ parasparamunmukhā nayananalinīnālānītaṃ pibanti rasaṃ priyāḥ //
GK16andhvc3u:901: ananyatrabhāvaḥ tadanyatra sambhavābhāvaḥ, tadrūpo yo viṣayasya artho yasya tat /
GK16andhvc3u:922: gurupadenārthāntarañja atra hi rūpakeṇa yathoktavyañjakalakṣaṇānugatena prasādhito rasaḥ sutarāmabhivyajyate /
GK16andhvc3u:923: alakṣyakramavyaṅgyaḥ saṅghaṭanāyāṃ bhāsate dhvanirityuktaṃ tatra saṅghaṭanāsvarūpameva tāvannirūpyete---
GK16andhvc3u:932: smara eva navanadīpūraḥ prāvṛṣeṇyapravāhaḥ sarabhasameva pravṛddhatvāt tenoḍhāḥ parasparasāṃmukhyamabuddhipūrvameva nītāḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:933: anantaraṃ guravaḥ śvaśrūprabhṛtaya eva setavaḥ, icchāprasararodhakatvāt /
GK16andhvc3u:934: ata ca guravo 'laṅdhyāḥ setavastaiḥ vidhṛtāḥ pratihatecchāḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:937: nanu nātra rūpakaṃ nirvayūḍhaṃ haṃsacakravākādirūpeṇa nāyakayugalasyārūpitatvāt /
GK16andhvc3u:943: saṅghaṭanāyāmiti bāve pratyayaḥ, varṇādivacca nimittamātre saptamī /
GK16andhvc3u:958: parasparābhilāṣātmakānāṃ parasparābhilāṣaṃ prakāśayantīnāṃ dṛṣṭicchaṭānāṃ yo miśrīkārastasya yuktyā yojanayetyarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:971: guṇān āśritya tiṣṭhantī mādhuryādīn vyanakti sā /
GK16andhvc3u:975: rasān--- sā saṅghaṭanā rasādīn vyanakti guṇānāśritya tiṣṭhantīti /
GK16andhvc3u:976: atra ca vikalpyaṃ guṇānāṃ saṅghaṭanāyāścaikyaṃ vyatireko vā /
GK16andhvc3u:978: guṇāśrayā saṅghaṭanā, saṅghaṭanāśrayā vā guṇā iti /
GK16andhvc3u:979_1: saṅghaṭanā locanam kārikāyāṃ dvitīyārdhasyādyaṃ padam. 'rasāṃstanniyame heturaucityaṃ
GK16andhvc3u:983: vikalpenedamarthajātaṃ kalpayituṃ vyākhyātuṃ śakyam kiṃ tadityāha--guṇānāmiti /
GK16andhvc3u:984: trayaḥ pakṣā ye sambhāvyante te vyākhyātuṃ śakyāḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:987: svabhāvasya kalpanayā pratapādanārthaṃ pradarśitabedasya svāśrayavācoyuktirdṛśyate śiśapāśrayaṃ vṛkṣatvamiti /
GK16andhvc3u:990: dharmāśca dharmyāśritā iti bālapriyā kutroktamityata āha---kārikāyāmiti /
GK16andhvc3u:1001: vikalpyamityasya vikalpena kalpyamiti vigraha iti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:1025: yadā tu nānātvapakṣe gumāśrayasaṅghaṭanāpakṣaḥ tadā gumānāśritya tiṣṭhantī gumaparatantrasvabhāvā na tu guṇarūpaivetyarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:1027: abhidhīyate---yadi gumāḥ saṅghaṭānā cetyekaṃ tattvaṃ saṅghaṭanāśrayā vā guṇāḥ,
GK16andhvc3u:1031: mādhuryaprasādau rasabhāvatadābhāsaviṣayāveveti viṣayaniyamo locanam prasiddho mārgaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:1035: tena rājāśrayaḥ prakṛtivarga ityatra yathā rājāśrayaucityenāmātyādiprakṛtaya ityayamarthaḥ,
GK16andhvc3u:1036: evaṃ guṇeṣu paratantrasvabhāvā tadāyattā tanmukhaprekṣiṇī saṅghaṭanetyayamartho labhyataiti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:1038: prathamapakṣe tādātmyena samānayogakṣematvāditaratra tu dharmatveneti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:1080: tathā hi śṛṅgāre 'pi dīrghasamāsā dṛśyate raudrādiṣvasamāsā ceti /
GK16andhvc3u:1086: yathā--'yo yaḥ śastraṃ bibharti svabhujagurumatadaḥ' ityādau /
GK16andhvc3u:1087: tasmānna saṅghaṭanāsvarūpāḥ, na ca saṅghaṭanāśrayā guṇāḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:1088: nanu yadi saṅghaṭanā guṇānāṃ nāśrayastatkimālambanā ete parikalpyantām /
GK16andhvc3u:1100: śabdārthālambanatve hi tadalaṅkārebhyaḥ ko viśeṣa ityuktaṃ cirantanairiti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:1103: bālapriyā sa vighaṭata ityatra tatpadaṃ vyācaṣṭe--yo 'yamityādi /
GK16andhvc3u:1105: śṛṅgārādāvasamāsaiva saṅghaṭanā, raudrādau dīrghasamāsaiveti niyama iti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:1113: anavarataṃ yannayanajalalavanipatanaṃ tena parimuṣitā apahṛtā patralekhā yasmiṃstat /
GK16andhvc3u:1130: athavā bhavantu śabdāśrayā eva guṇāḥ, na caiṣāmanuprāsāditulyatvam /
GK16andhvc3u:1134: nanu yadi śabdāśrayā guṇāstatsaṅghaṭanārūpatvaṃ tadāśrayatvaṃ vā teṣāṃ prāptameva /
GK16andhvc3u:1135: na hyasaṅghaṭitāḥ śabdā arthaviśeṣapratipādyarasādyāśritānāṃ guṇānāmavācakatvādāśrayā bhavanti /
GK16andhvc3u:1140: api tu bhavatveṣāmavivekināmabhiprāyeṇāpi śabdadharmatvaṃ śauryādīnāmiva śarīradharmatvam /
GK16andhvc3u:1146: upacāreṇa yadi śabdeṣu guṇāstadedaṃ tātparyam--śṛṅgārādirasābhivyañjakavācyapratipādanasāmarthyameva śabdasya mādhuryam /
GK16andhvc3u:1148: atha saṅghaṭanā na vyatiriktā kācit, api tu saṅghaṭitā eva bālapriyā aikyaprasaṅgāditi /
GK16andhvc3u:1152: saṃyogarūpakāryasya dvayorutpatyā svasmin yasya saṃyogo jāyate taṃ prati tasyāpekṣāstītyarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:1159: ayaṃ sthitaḥ mama pakṣo neti yojanā /
GK16andhvc3u:1175: locanam śabdāḥ, tadāśritaṃ tatsāmathyamiti saṅghaṭanāśritamevetyuktaṃ bhavatīta tātparyam /
GK16andhvc3u:1177: kimayaṃ madhye saṅghaṭanānupraveśa ityāśaṅkya sa eva pūrvapakṣavādyāha---na hīti /
GK16andhvc3u:1178_0: arthaviśeṣairna tu padāntaranirapekṣaśuddhapadavācyaiḥ sāmānyaiḥ pratipādyā vyaṅgyā
GK16andhvc3u:1182_0: varṇavyaṅgyo hi yāvadrasa uktastāvadavācakasyāpi padasya śravaṇamātrāvaseyena svasaubhāgyena
GK16andhvc3u:1182_1: varṇavadeva yadrasābhivyaktihetutvaṃ sphuṭameva lakṣyata iti tadeva mādhuryādīti kiṃ saṅghaṭanayā?
GK16andhvc3u:1183: tathā ca padavyaṅgyo yāvaddhvaniruktastāvacchuddhasyāpi padasya svārthasmārakatvenāpi rasābhivyaktiyogyārthavabhāsakatvameva mādhuryādīti tatrāpi kaḥ saṅghaṭanāyā upayogaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:1188: viśiṣṭā yā śabdāntarasaṅghaṭanā tathaiva labhyata ityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:1223: abhyupagate vā vākyavyaṅgyatve rasādīnāṃ na niyatā kācitsaṅghaṭanā teṣāmāśrayatvaṃ pratipadyata ityaniyatasaṅghaṭanāḥ śabdā evaṃ guṇānāṃ vyaṅgyaviśeṣānugatā āśrayāḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:1224: nanu mādhurye yadi nāmaivamucyate taducyatām ; ojasaḥ punaḥ kathamaniyatasaṅghaṭanaśabdāśrayatvam /
GK16andhvc3u:1225: na hyasamāsā saṅghaṭanā kadācidojasa āśrayatāṃ pratapadyate /
GK16andhvc3u:1227: yadi na prasiddhimātragrahadūṣitaṃ cetastadatrāpi na na brūmaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:1229: yato raudrādīn hi prakāśayataḥ kāvyasya dīptiroja iti prākpratipādatam /
GK16andhvc3u:1230: taccaujo yadyasamāsāyāmapi saṅghaṭanāyāṃ syāttatko doṣo bhavet /
GK16andhvc3u:1231: na locanam nanu vākyavyaṅgye dhvanau tarhyavaśyamanupraveṣṭavyaṃ saṅghaṭanayā svasaundarya vācyasaundaryaṃ v,
GK16andhvc3u:1234: etaduktaṃ bhavati--anupraviśa tatra saṅghaṭanā, na hi tasyāḥ sannidhānaṃpratyācakṣmahe /
GK16andhvc3u:1235_0: kiṃ tu mādhuryasya na niyatā saṅghaṭanā āśrayo vā svarūpaṃ vā tayā vinā varṇapadavyaṅgye
GK16andhvc3u:1235_1: rasādau bhāvrānmādhuryādeḥ vākyavyaṅgye 'pi tādṛśīṃ saṅghaṭanāṃ vihāyāpi vākyasya
GK16andhvc3u:1236: tasmādaupacārikatve 'pi śabdāśrayā eva guṇā ityupasaṃharati--śabdā eveti /
GK16andhvc3u:1250: niyatā saṅghaṭanā māduryasyāśrayo vā svarūpaṃ vā netyanvayaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:1274: teṣāṃ tu cakṣurādīnāmiva yathāsvaṃ viṣayaniyamitasya svarūpasya na kadācidyvabhicāraḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:1276: na ca saṅghaṭanāmāśritā guṇā ityekaṃ darśanam /
GK16andhvc3u:1283: kathamacārutvaṃ tādṛśe viṣaye sahṛdayānāṃ nāvabhātīti cet? kaviśaktitirohatatvāt /
GK16andhvc3u:1290_0: ' locanam vayaṃ tu bramaḥ--varṇapadavyaṅgye 'pyojasi raudrādisvabhāve varṇapadānāmekākināṃ
GK16andhvc3u:1290_1: svasaundaryamapi na tādṛgunmīlati tādyāvattāni saṅghaṭanāṅkitāni na kṛtānīti sāmānyenaivāyaṃ pūrvapakṣa iti /
GK16andhvc3u:1295: yasmāt 'yoyaḥ śastraṃ' ityādau nācārutvaṃ pratibhāvati tasmādityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:1298: 'śṛṅgāra eva paramo manaḥprahlādano rasaḥ' ityādinā ca viṣayaniyama ukta eva /
GK16andhvc3u:1320: evamādau ca viṣaye yathaucityātyāgastathā locanam rasābhivyaktāvetadeva sāmarthyaṃ śabdānāṃ yattathā tathā saṅghaṭamānatvamiti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:1326: uttamadevatāsaṃbhogaparāmarśe ca pitṛsaṃbhoga iva lajjātaṅkādinā kaścamatkārāvakāśa ityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:1328_0: saṃbhogo 'pi hyasau varṇitastathā pratibhānavatā kavinā yathā tatraiva viśrāntaṃ
GK16andhvc3u:1328_1: hṛdayaṃ paurvāparyaparāmarśaṃ kartuṃ na dadāti yathā nirvyājaparākramasya puruṣasyāviṣaye
GK16andhvc3u:1328_2: 'pi yudhyamānasya tāvattasminnavasare sādhuvādo vitīryate na tu paurvāparyaparāmarśe
GK16andhvc3u:1338: atassaṅghaṭanārūpā eva guṇā iti bhāvārtha ityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:1347: tasya varṇanīyasya upayogīni yāni vastūni teṣāṃ paurvāparyeṇa yaḥ parāmarśastatra kauśalaṃ sāmarthyamityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:1371: nanvevaṃ darśayiṣyata iti vaktavyaṃ na tu darśitamitītyata āha locane-- darśitamevāgre /
GK16andhvc3u:1373: tathā hi śaktirahatena kavinā evaṃvide viṣaye śṛṅgāra upanibadhyamānaḥ sphuṭameva doṣatvena pratabhāsate /
GK16andhvc3u:1374: nanvasmin pakṣe 'yo yaḥ śastraṃ bibharti' ityādau kimacārutvam? apratīyamānamevāropayāmaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:1375: tasmādguṇavyatiriktatve guṇarūpatve ca saṅghaṭanāyā anyaḥ kaścinniyamaheturvaktavya ityucyate /
GK16andhvc3u:1391: vyatirekapakṣe hi saṅghaṭanāyā niyamahetureva nāsti aikyapakṣe 'pi na raso niyamaheturityanyo vaktavyaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:1393: kathāṃ nayati svakartavyāṅgabhāvamiti kathānāyako yo nirvahaṇe phalabhāgī /
GK16andhvc3u:1397: dānadharmavīraśāntapradhāno dhīrapraśānta iti catvāro nāyakāḥ krameṇa sātvatyārabhaṭīkaiśikībhāratīlakṣaṇavṛttipradhānāḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:1403: kārikāvacanasya niṣpannatvāt bhūtanirdeśa upapanna iti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:1408: saṅghaṭanārūpā eva guṇā iti pakṣa ityarthaḥṛ /
GK16andhvc3u:1415: guṇānāṃ viṣayaniyama evoktaḥ saṅghaṭanāyāṃ niyamahetuḥ ko 'pi nokta ityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:1433: tatra yadā kavirapagatarasabhāvo vaktā tadā racanāyāḥ locanam dhvanyātāmā dhvanisvabhāvo yo rasastasyāṅgaṃ vyañjakamityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:1434: abhineyo vāgaṅgasatvāhāryairābhimukhyaṃ sākṣātkāraprāyaṃ neyo 'rtho vyaṅgyarūpo dhvanisvabhāvo yasya tadabhineyārthaṃ vācyaṃ,
GK16andhvc3u:1437: yadāha muniḥ--'vāgaṅgasattvopetātkāvyārthān bhāvayanti' ityādi tatra tatra /
GK16andhvc3u:1438: rasābhinayanāntarīyakatayā tu tadvibhāvādirūpatayā vācyo 'rtho 'bhinīyata iti vācyamabhineyārthamityeṣaiva yuktarā vācoyuktiḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:1445: tathāpi tāvati bālapriyā sātvatyādivṛttīnāṃ lakṣaṇānyanyatra draṣṭavyāni /
GK16andhvc3u:1458: kāvyenārthya iti vyutpatyā kāvyārthaśabdo vyaṅgyarasādivācīti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:1466_0: tadā vācyamabhineyārthamityatra abhineyaḥ artho yasyeti vigrahe yatpadārthasya vācyasya
GK16andhvc3u:1467: kavinibaddho vaktā rasabhāvarahita ityasyārtha pradarśya tatrānupapattimāśaṅkya pariharati---rasabhāvahīna ityādi /
GK16andhvc3u:1474: yadāpi kavinibaddho vaktā rasabhāvarahitastadā sa eva ;
GK16andhvc3u:1475: yadā tu kaviḥ kavinibaddho vā vaktā rasabhāvasamanvito rasaśca pradhānāśritatvāddhvanyātmabhūtastadā niyamenaiva tatrāsamāsāmadhyasamāse eva saṅghaṭane /
GK16andhvc3u:1478: raso yadā prādhānyena pritapādyastadā tatpratītau vyavadhāyakā virodhinaśca sarvātmanaiva parihāryāḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:1479: evaṃ ca dīrghasamāsāsaṅghaṭanāsamāsānāmanekaprakārasambhāvanayā kadācidrasaptatītiṃ vyavadadhātīti tasyāṃ nātyantamabhiniveśaḥ locanam rasādihīna ityuktam. sa eveti kāmacāraḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:1480: evaṃ śuddhavaktraucityaṃ vicārya vācaucityena saha tadevāha---yadā tviti /
GK16andhvc3u:1482: anyathā 'sa eva vītarāgaścet' iti sthityā nīrasameva kāvyaṃ syāt /
GK16andhvc3u:1483: tathāpi yadā yamakādicitradarśanapradhāno 'sau bhavati, tadā 'rasādihīna' ityuktam /
GK16andhvc3u:1484: niyamena rasabhāvasanvito vaktā na tu kathañcidapi taṭasthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:1485: rasaśca dhvanyātmabhūta eva na tu rasavadalaṅkāraprāyaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:1486: tadāsamāsāmadhyasamāse eva saghaṅṭane, anyathā tu dīrghasamāsāpītyevaṃ yojyam /
GK16andhvc3u:1493: tadāsvāde ye vyavadhāyakā asvādavighnarūpāvirodhinaśca tadviparītāsvādamayā ityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:1495: anekaprakāraḥ sambhāvyate saṅghaṭanā tu sambhāvanāyāṃ prayoktrīti bālapriyā bhāvyamiti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:1502: yadā tu kavirityādinā kadācidrasabhāvarahitatvaṃ kaverbhavatīti gamyate pūrvamuktañja,
GK16andhvc3u:1506: 'tadā niyamenaiva samāse eva' ityatra niyameneti padamevakāradvayañca yathāyathaṃ yojayaṃstattadvyavacchedyamarthañca darśayanvivṛṇoti---niyamenetyādi /
GK16andhvc3u:1522: abhineyārthe kāvye tasthāmatyantamabhiniveśo viśeṣato na śobhate /
GK16andhvc3u:1523: viśeṣato 'bhineyārthe kāvye, tato 'nyatra ca viśeṣataḥ karuṇavipralambhaśṛṅgārayoḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:1526_0: rasāntare punaḥ pratipādye raudrādau madhyamasamāsā saṅghaṭanā kadāciddhīroddhatanāyakasambandhavyāpārāśrayeṇa
GK16andhvc3u:1526_1: dīrghasamāsāpi vā tadākṣepāvinābhāvirasocitavācyāpekṣayā na viguṇā bhavatīti sāpi
GK16andhvc3u:1527: sarvāsu ca saṅghaṭanāsu prasādākhyo guṇo vyāpī /
GK16andhvc3u:1530: atruṭitena vyaṅgyena tāvatsamāsārthābhinayo na śakyaḥ kartum /
GK16andhvc3u:1532: tatra duṣprayojā bahutarasandehaprasarā ca tatra pratipattirna nāṭye 'nurūpā syāt /
GK16andhvc3u:1538_0: tasyā dīrghasamāsasaṅghaṭanāyāḥ ya ākṣepastena vinā yo na bhavati vyaṅgyābhivyañjakastādṛśo
GK16andhvc3u:1539: nāyakasyākṣepo vyāpāra iti yadvyākhyātaṃ tanna śliṣyatīvetyalam /
GK16andhvc3u:1541: yā kācitsaṅghaṭanā sā tathā kartavyā, yathā vācye jhaṭiti bhavati pratītiriti yāvat /
GK16andhvc3u:1547: tatreti prativākyaṃ yojyaṃ, dīrghasamāsāyāṃ saṅghaṭanāyāṃ satyāmiti tadarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:1549: kintu vyaṅgyārthatroṭanaṃ kṛtvaiva kartavyo bhavediti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:1554: tatra bahutarasandehaprasarā pratipattiśca syāt. sā nāṭye na anurūpā ca iti yojanā /
GK16andhvc3u:1564: raudrādaurasāntare punaḥ pratipādye madhyamasamāsāsaṅghaṭanā viguṇā na bhavata kadāciddīrghasamāsāpi vā saṅghaṭanā viguṇā na bhavatīti sambandhaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:1571: prasādātikramaṃ hyasamāsāpi saṅghaṭanā karuṇavipralambhaśṛṅgārau na vyanakti /
GK16andhvc3u:1572: tadaparityāge ca madhyamasamāsāpi na na prakāśayati /
GK16andhvc3u:1574: ata eva ca 'yo yaḥ śastraṃ bibharti' ityādau yadyojasaḥ sthitiraneṣyate tatprasādākhya eva guṇo na mādhuryam /
GK16andhvc3u:1576: tasmādguṇāvyatiriktatve guṇavyatiriktatve vā saṅghaṭanāyā yathoktādaucityādviṣayaniyamo 'stīti tasyā api rasavyañjakatvam /
GK16andhvc3u:1577: tasyāśca rasābhivyaktinimittabhūtāyā yo 'yamanantarokto niyamahetuḥ sa eva guṇānāṃ niyato viṣaya iti guṇāśrayeṇa vyavasthānamapyaviruddham /
GK16andhvc3u:1582: ojomādhuryayorhyanyonyābhāvarūpatvaṃ prāṅnirūpitamiti tayoḥ saṅkaro 'tyantaṃ śrutibāhya iti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:1584: prasādenaiva sa rasaḥ prakāśitaḥ na na prakāśita ityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:1586: yadi guṇāḥ saṅghaṭanaikarūpāstathāpi guṇāniyama eva saṅghaṭanāyā niyamaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:1588: saṅghaṭanāśrayaguṇapakṣe 'pi saṅghaṭanāyā niyāmakatvena yadvaktṛvācyaucityaṃ bālapriyā yo vācyo vyaṅgyābhivyañjako na bhavatīti sambandhaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:1589: svasvavācakaśabdānāṃ dīrghasamāsasaṅghaṭanāṅkitatve satyeva vācyārthā vyañjakā bhavantīti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:1603: tadaparityāge na na prakāśayatītyanenānvayaḥ, prasādātikrama ityādinā vyatirekaścokta ityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:1608: śṛṅgārādāvojaso raudrādau mādhuryasya ca samāveśa ityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:1613: viṣayāśrayam apy anyad aucityaṃ tāṃ niyacchati /
GK16andhvc3u:1614: kāvya-prabhedāśrayataḥ sthitā bhedavatī hi sā // DhvK_3.7 //
GK16andhvc3u:1621: paryāyabandhaḥ parikathā khaṇḍakathā sakalakathe sargabandho 'bhineyārthamākhyāyikākathe ityevamādayaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:1622: tadāśrayeṇāpi locanam hetutvenoktaṃ tadguṇānāmapi niyamaheturiti pakṣatraye 'pi na kaścidvaplava iti tātparyam // 5//
GK16andhvc3u:1626: yathā hi senādyātmakasaṅghātaniveśī purūṣaḥ kātaro 'pi tadaucityādanuguṇatayaivāste tathā kāvyavākyamapi saṅghātaviseṣātmakasandānitakādimadhyaniviṣṭaṃ tadaucityena vartate /
GK16andhvc3u:1627: muktakaṃ tu viṣayaśabdena yaduktaṃ tatsaṅghātābhāvena svātantryamātraṃ pradarśayituṃ svapratiṣṭhitamākāśamiti yathā /
GK16andhvc3u:1629: na tu viṣayaucityena vaktṛvācyaucityaṃ nivāryata iti /
GK16andhvc3u:1632: tena svatantratayā parisamāptanirākāṅkṣārthamapi prabandhamadhyavarti na muktakamityucyate /
GK16andhvc3u:1635: senādyātmako yassaṅghātaḥ samudāyaḥ tatra niveśī niviṣṭaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:1644: nanvevaṃ muktakasyaikapadyātmakasya saṅghātarūpatvābhāvāt vṛttau tasya kāvyaprabhedatvena kathanaṃ kimarthamityata āha---muktakantvityādi /
GK16andhvc3u:1648: muktakasyāpi rasasyanditvātsaṅghaṭanāniyamane svātantryamastītyetāvanmātraṃ pradarśayituṃ muktakamapi kāvyaprabhedatvenoktamityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:1650_1: prativākyamidamākāśaṃ svasminnākāśe pratiṣṭhitamiti brahma brahmaṇīva ākāśamākāśa
GK16andhvc3u:1669: iti kriyāsamāptikṛtā bhedā iti dvandvena nirdiṣṭāḥ avāntarakriyāsamāptāvapi vasantavarṇanādarekarṇanīyoddeśena pravṛttaḥ paryāyabandhaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:1675: mahākāvyarūpaḥ puruṣārthaphalaḥ samastavastuvarṇanāprabandhaḥ sargabandhaḥ saṃskṛta eva /
GK16andhvc3u:1692: sandānitaketyādinā tu vipariṇāmena tatpadaṃ yojyamiti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:1693: etena pūrveṣāntu muktakādīnāṃ bhāṣāyāmaniyama iti bakṣyamāṇasya nāsaṅgatiḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:1714: yathā hyamarukasya kavermuktakāḥ śṛṅgārarasasyandinaḥ prabandhāyamānāḥ prasiddhā eva /
GK16andhvc3u:1718: kadācidarthaucityāśrayeṇa dīrghasamāsāyāmapi saṅghaṭanāyāṃ paruṣā grāmyā ca vṛttiḥ parihartavyā /
GK16andhvc3u:1722: sargabandhetu locanam nanu muktake vibhāvādisaṅghaṭanā kathaṃ yena tadāyatto rasaḥ syādityāśaṅkyāha---muktakeṣviti /
GK16andhvc3u:1724: kathamapi kṛtapratyāpattau priye skhalitottare virahakṛśayā kṛtvā vyājaprakalpitamaśrutam /
GK16andhvc3u:1725: ahanasakhīśrotraprāptiṃ viśaṅkya samambhramaṃ vivalitadṛśā śūnye gehe samucchvasitaṃ tataḥ //
GK16andhvc3u:1728: asamāsāyāṃ hi saṅghaṭanāyāṃ manthararūpā pratītiḥ sākāṅkṣā satī cireṇa kriyāpadaṃ dūravartyanudhāvantī vācyapratītāveva viśrāntā satī na rasatatvacarvaṇāyogyā syāditi bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:1740: tathāca vācyapratītimāntharyādiparihārāya madhyamasamāsā dīrghasamāsā vā saṅghaṭanā kāryeti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:1741: prabandhāśrayeṣvatyatra sandānitakādiṣvityasyaivānuṣaṅgo na tu muktakeṣvityasyāpi pūrvoktalakṣaṇasya muktakasya rasatātparye yathārasamaucityamanyathā tu kābhacāraḥ,
GK16andhvc3u:1744: ākhyāyikākathayostu gadyanibandhanabāhulyādgadye ca chandobandhabhinnaprasthānatvādiha niyame heturakṛtapūrvo 'pi manā vikrayate /
GK16andhvc3u:1746: etad yathoktam aucityam eva tasyā niyāmakam /
GK16andhvc3u:1751: yadetadaucatyaṃ vaktṛvācyagataṃ saṅghaṭanāyā niyāmakamuktametadeva gadye chandoniyamavarjite 'pi viṣayāpekṣaṃ niyamahetuḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:1752: tathā hyatrāpi yadā kaviḥ kavinibaddho vā vaktā rasabhāvarahitastadā kāmacāraḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:1757: pūrvāparanirapekṣeṇāpi hi yena rasacarvaṇā kriyate tadeva muktakam /
GK16andhvc3u:1770: tatra tu rasatātparyaṃ sādhīya iti yaduktaṃ tatkimapekṣayeti neyārthaṃ syāt // 7 //
GK16andhvc3u:1789: racanā viṣayāpekṣaṃ tat tu kiṃcid vibhedavat // DhvK_3.9 //
GK16andhvc3u:1793: athavā padyavadgadyabandhe 'pi rasabandhoktamaucityaṃ sarvatra saṃśritā racanā locanam viṣayāpekṣamiti /
GK16andhvc3u:1801_0: tarhi viṣayaucityaṃ sarvathaiva tyaktaṃ netyāha---tadena rasaucityaṃ viṣayaṃ sahakāritayāpekṣya
GK16andhvc3u:1801_1: kiñjidvibhedo 'vantaravaicitryaṃ vidyate yasya sampādyatvena tādṛśaṃ bālapriyā viṣayatveneti /
GK16andhvc3u:1803: 'rasabandhe'ti kārikāyāṃ racanā sarvatra rasabandhoktamaucityaṃ saṃśritā bhātītyanvayaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:1804: vṛttau 'athave'ti na vikalpārthaka ityāha---vṛttau ca vāśabda iti /
GK16andhvc3u:1815: yuktyā niṣevitaṃ stryādicatuṣṭayaṃ svārthasya svaprayojanāya bhavata /
GK16andhvc3u:1817: yuktyānyathā vā niṣevitaṃ taccatuṣṭayaṃ kevalaṃ duḥkhasambhārāya duḥkhātiśayāyaiva bhavati /
GK16andhvc3u:1819: “viṣapyamṛtaṃ kvacidbhavedabhṛtaṃ vā viṣamīśvarecchaye“ti raghuvaṃśaślokavyākhyāne “vāśabdo vākyārthasya sthitapakṣatāṃ dyotayatī“tyaruṇācalanāthāḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:1832: tattu viṣayāpekṣaṃ kiñjidvaśeṣavadbhavati, na tu sarvākāram /
GK16andhvc3u:1833: tathā hi gadyavandhe 'pyatidīrghasamāsā racanā na vipralambhaśṛṅgārakaruṇayorākhyāyikāyāmapi śobhate /
GK16andhvc3u:1836: tathā hyākhyāyikāyāṃ nātyantamasamāsā svaviṣaye 'pi nāṭakādau nātidīrghasamāsā ceti saṅghaṭanāyā diganusartavyā /
GK16andhvc3u:1837: idānīmalakṣyakramavyaṅgyo dhvaniḥ prabandhātmā rāmāyaṇamahābhāratādau locanam bhavati /
GK16andhvc3u:1842: tathā hi vākyābhinayalakṣaṇe 'cūrṇapādaiḥ prasannaiḥ' ityādi munirabhyadhāt /
GK16andhvc3u:1846: evaṃ saṅghaṭanāyāṃ cālakṣyakramo dīpyata iti nirṇītam /
GK16andhvc3u:1847: prabandhe dīpyata iti tu nirvivādasiddho 'yamartha iti nātra vaktavyaṃ kiñcidasti /
GK16andhvc3u:1848: kevalaṃ kavisahṛdayān vyutpādayituṃ rasavyañjane yetikartavyatā prabandhasya sā nirūpyetyāśayenāha--idānīmiti /
GK16andhvc3u:1850: prathamaṃ dāvaditi prabandhasya vyañjakatve ye prakārāste krameṇauvopayoginaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:1852: tatrādikāvāpaḥ phalaparyantatānayanam, bālapriyā kiñcidvibhedavadityasya vivaraṇam - kiñjidityādi /
GK16andhvc3u:1867: “itīkāvyārthe“tyādiślekaḥ kvacidgranthe na dṛśyate, ata eva na vyākhyātaḥ // 9 //
GK16andhvc3u:1900: prabandho 'pi rasādīnāṃ vyañjaka ityuktaṃ tasya vyañjakatve nibandhanam /
GK16andhvc3u:1901_1: pratipipādayiṣitarasabhāvādyapekṣayā ya ucato vibhāvo bhāvo 'nu bhāvaḥ sañjārī vā
GK16andhvc3u:1905: śṛṅgāravarṇanecchunā tādṛśī kathā saṃśrayaṇīyā yasyāmṛtumālyādervibhāvasya līlāderanubhāvasya bālapriyā śeṣaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:1923: divyasya utsāhādayaḥ kevalamānuṣāśrayema kevalamānuṣasyotsāhādayaḥ kevaladivyāśrayeṇa vā upanibadhyamānā ityanvayaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:1932: ata eva ca bharate prakhyātavastuviṣayatvaṃ prakhyātodāttanāyakatvaṃ ca nāṭakasyāvaśyakartavyatayopanyastam /
GK16andhvc3u:1935: locanam etaduktaṃ bhavati---yatra vineyānāṃ pratītikhaṇḍanā na jāyate tādṛgvarṇanīyam /
GK16andhvc3u:1936: tatra kevalamānuṣasya ekapade saptārṇavalaṅghanamasambhāvyamānatayānṛtamiti hṛdaye sphuradupadeśyasya caturvargopāyasyāpyalīkatāṃ buddhau niveśayati /
GK16andhvc3u:1938: ata eva tasyāpi yadā prabhāvāntaramutprekṣyate tadā tādṛśameva /
GK16andhvc3u:1955: rājñāṃ prabhāvātiśayavarṇanaṃ yaddvayaṃ tadanucitaṃ na brūma iti sambandhaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:1970: pūrvā purātanī yā prasiddhiparamparā tayā upacito yaḥ sampratyayo viśvāsaḥ tamupārūḍhamiti hetugarbham /
GK16andhvc3u:1978_1: yo nāṭakādi utpādyavastu sat kuryāttasya mahān pramādassyāditi yojanāmmanasi kṛtya
GK16andhvc3u:1980: muninā nāṭakādi nanu yadyutsāhādibhāvavarṇane kathañciddivyamānuṣyādyaucityaparīkṣā kriyate tatkriyatām,
GK16andhvc3u:1982: ratirhi bhāratavarṣecitenaiva vyavahārema divyānāmapi varṇanīyeti sthitiḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:1986: yattu divyamaucityaṃ tattatrānupakārakameveti cet---na vayaṃ divyamaucityaṃ śṛṅgāraniṣayamanyatkiñcidbrūmaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:1988: bhāratavarṣaviṣaye yathottamanāyakeṣu rājādiṣu śṛṅgāropanibandhastathā divyāśrayo 'pi śobhate /
GK16andhvc3u:1989: na ca rājādiṣu prasiddhiṣu prasiddhagrāmyaśṛṅgāropanibandhanaṃ prasiddhaṃ nāṭakādau,
GK16andhvc3u:1991: nāṭakāderamineyārthatvādabhinayasya ca sambhogaśṛṅgāraviṣayasyāsabhyatvāttatra parihāra iti cet- na;
GK16andhvc3u:1993: tasmādabhineyārthe 'nabhineyārthe vā kāvye yaduttamaprakṛte rājāderuttamaprakṛtibhirnāyikābhiḥ saha grāmyasambhogavarṇanaṃ tatpitroḥ sambhogavarṇanamiva sutarāmasabhyam /
GK16andhvc3u:1995: locanam nirūpitaṃ munineti na kartavyamiti tātparyam /
GK16andhvc3u:1997: bālapriyā utpādyavastu sat na nirūpitamiti sambandhaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:2005: vyāyogastu vidhijñaiḥ karyaḥ prakhyātanāyakaśarīra ityādivyāyogalakṣaṇañja nāṭyaśāstrādāvuktam /
GK16andhvc3u:2006: nāṭakādītyatra nāṭakamādiḥ yasyeti vyutpattyā nāṭakādipadenātadguṇasaṃvijñānabahuvrīhiṇā prakāraṇaṃ vivakṣitamato na yathāśrutārthānupapattiriti kaścidāha,
GK16andhvc3u:2008: na ca sambhogaśṛṅgārasya suratalakṣaṇa evaikaḥ prakāraḥ,
GK16andhvc3u:2013: yattvevaṃvidhe viṣaye mahākavīnāpyasamīkṣyakāritā lakṣye dṛśyate sa doṣa eva /
GK16andhvc3u:2014: sa tu śaktitiraskṛtatvātteṣāṃ na lakṣyata ityuktameva /
GK16andhvc3u:2019: tena muninirūpite nāṭikālakṣaṇe 'prakaraṇanāṭakayogādutpādyaṃ vastu nāyako nṛpatiḥ' ityatra yathāsaṃkhyena prakhyātodāttanṛpatināyaktvaṃ boddhavyamiti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:2020: kathaṃ tarhi sambhogaśṛṅgāraḥ kavinā nibadhyatāmityāśaṅkyāha---na ceti /
GK16andhvc3u:2022: munināpa sthāne sthāne prakṛtyaucityameva vibhāvānubhāvādiṣu bahutaraṃ pramāṇīkṛtaṃ 'sthairyeṇottamamadhyamādhamānāṃ nīcānāṃ sambhrameṇa' ityādi vadatā /
GK16andhvc3u:2035: divyaṃ mānaṣyañja tadādi yadaucityaṃ tasya parīkṣā /
GK16andhvc3u:2061_1: svapratibhāṃ cānusaratā kavināvahatacetasā bhūtvā vibhāvā dyaucityabhraṃśaparityāge
GK16andhvc3u:2062_0: aucityavataḥ kathāśarīrasya vṛttasyotprekṣitasya vā graho vyañjaka ityanenaitatpratipādayati---yaditihāsādiṣu
GK16andhvc3u:2062_1: kathāsu rasavatīṣu vividhāsu satīṣvapa yattatra vibhāvādyaucityavatkathāśarīraṃ tadeva grāhyaṃnetarat /
GK16andhvc3u:2063: vṛttādapi ca kathāśarīrādutprekṣite viśeṣataḥ prayatnavatā bhavitavyam /
GK16andhvc3u:2079: adṛṣṭaṃ sukṛtaṃ prasādo devatādiprasādaḥ tābhyāmuditā yā svapratibhā tacchālitvamityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:2081: itihāsādiṣu vividhāsu rasavatīṣu kathāsu satīṣvapi tāḥ kathā anādṛtya tatra tāsāmmadhye yatkathāśarīramaucityavattadeva kavinā grāhyaṃ,
GK16andhvc3u:2082: netaradvibhāvādyaucityaśūnyaṃ kathāśarīraṃ rasavadapi na grāhyamiti vṛttyartha iti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:2092: tatra iti jātyuttaramapi na sambhavatīti sambandhaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:2097: kiñca---- santi siddharasaprakhyā ye ca rāmāyaṇādayaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:2099: teṣu hi kathāśrayeṣu tāvatsvecchaiva na yojya /
GK16andhvc3u:2101: svecchāpi yadi yojyā tadrasavirodhinī na yojyā /
GK16andhvc3u:2103: itivṛttavaśāyātāṃ kathañcidrasānanuguṇāṃ sthitiṃ tyaktvā punarutprekṣyāpyantarābhīṣṭarasocitakathonnayo vidheyaḥ yatā kālidāsaprabandheṣu /
GK16andhvc3u:2104: yathā ca sarvasenaviracite locanam na hi tatretihāsavaśādeva mayā nibaddhamiti jātyuttaramapi sambhavati /
GK16andhvc3u:2108: siddhaḥ āsvādamātraśeṣo na tu bhāvanīyo raso yeṣu /
GK16andhvc3u:2109: kathānāmāśrayā itihāsāḥ, tairitihāsārthaiḥ taissaha svecchā na yojyā /
GK16andhvc3u:2111: svecchā teṣu na yojyā, kathañcidvā yadi yojyate tattatprasiddharasaviruddhā na yojyā /
GK16andhvc3u:2112: yathā rāmasya dhīralalitatvayojanena nāṭikānāyakatvaṃ kaścitkuryāditi tvatyantāsamañjasam /
GK16andhvc3u:2118: tathārjunacarite 'rjunasya pātālavijayādi bālapriyā sahṛdayāsvāda eva śeṣaḥ śiṣṭāṃśo yasya saḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:2121: siddharasāḥ prakhyāḥ prakhyātāśca siddharasaprakhyā ye rāmāyaṇādayaḥ kathāśrayāssantīti sambandhaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:2124: na tairityādikaṃ vākyadvaye paryavasannamityāśayena teṣvityādi vyākhyātaṃ vṛttau,
GK16andhvc3u:2134: rāmāyaṇaprasiddhastadīyo raso hi vīra iti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:2141: tatretivṛte yadi rasānanuguṇāṃ sthitiṃ paśyettademāṃ bhaṅktvāpi svatantratayā rasānuguṇaṃ kathāntaramutpādayet /
GK16andhvc3u:2142: na hi kaveritivṛttamātranirvahaṇena kiñcitprayojanam, itihāsādeva tatsiddheḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:2144: yatsandhīnāṃ mukhapratimukhagarbhāvamarśanirvahaṇākhyānāṃ tadaṅgānāṃ copakṣepādīnāṃ ghaṭanaṃ locanam varṇitamithāsāprasiddham /
GK16andhvc3u:2147: iha prabhusammitebhyaḥ śrutismṛtiprabhṛtibhyaḥ kartavyamidamityājñāmātraparamārthebhyaḥ śāstrebhyo ye na vyutpannāḥ,
GK16andhvc3u:2148: na cāpyasyedaṃ vṛttamamuṣmātkarmaṇa ityevaṃ yuktiyuktakarmaphalasambandhaprakaṭanakāribhyo mitrrasammitebhya itihāsaśāstrebhyo labdhavyutpattayaḥ,
GK16andhvc3u:2149: atha cāvaśyaṃ vyutpādyāḥ prajārthasampādanayogyatākrāntā rājaputraprāyāsteṣāṃ hṛdayānupraveśamukhena caturvargopāyavyutpattirādheyā /
GK16andhvc3u:2152: prītyātmā ca rasastadeva nāṭyaṃ nāṭyameva veda ityasmadupādhyāyaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:2153: na caite prītivyutpattī bhinnarūpe eva, dvayorapyekaviṣayatvāt /
GK16andhvc3u:2158: abhīṣṭasya rasasya ucitāyāḥ kathāyā unnayaḥ ghaṭanam /
GK16andhvc3u:2172: prajānāmarthapampādane paripālane yā yogyatā rājakulaprasūtatvādirūpā tayā ākrāntā āśritā ityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:2174: caturvargopāyavyutpattiḥ nāntarīyakamānuṣaṅgikaphalaṃ yasya tathāvidho yo vibhāvādisaṃyogaḥ tatprasādopanataḥ tenotpādita ityarthaṃ /
GK16andhvc3u:2183: phalaṃ ca nāma yadadṛṣṭavaśāddavatā prasādādānyato vā jāyate /
GK16andhvc3u:2184: na ca tadupadeśyam, tata upāye vyutatpatyayogāt /
GK16andhvc3u:2185: tenopāyakrameṇa pravṛttasya siddhiḥ anupāyadvāreṇa pravṛttasya nāśa ityevaṃ nāyakapratināyakagatatvenārthānarthepāyavyutpattiḥ kāryā /
GK16andhvc3u:2193: tā evaṃvidhāḥ pañcāvasthā ; kāraṇagatā muninoktaḥ--- saṃsādhye phalayoge tu vyāpāraḥ kāraṇasya yaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:2232: tadanurodhe tu svarūpāt kiñciducchūnatāmityasya svarūpamityanenānvayo bodhyaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:2241: prārambhādīnāmmukhādisandhīnāṃ locanam tasyānupūrvyā virjñayāḥ pañcāvasthāḥ prayoktṛbhiḥ //
GK16andhvc3u:2245: evaṃ yā etāḥ kāraṇasyāvasthāstatsampādakaṃ yatkarturitavṛttaṃ pañcadhā vibhaktam /
GK16andhvc3u:2246: ta eva mukhapratimukhagarbhāvamarśanirvahaṇākhyā anvarthanāmānaḥ pañca sandhaya itivṛttakhaṇaḍāḥ,
GK16andhvc3u:2248: teṣāmapi sandhīnāṃ svanirvāhyaṃ prati tathā kramadarśanādavāntarabhinnā ititavṛttabhāgāḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:2251: tathā hi svāyattasiddherbījaṃ binduḥ kāryamiti tisraḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:2252: bījena sarvavyāpārāḥ bindunānusandhānaṃ kāryeṇa nirvāhaḥ sandarśanaprārthanāvyavasāyarūpā hyetāstisro 'rthasampādye kartuḥ prakṛtayaḥ svabhāvavaśeṣāḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:2253: sacivāyattasiddhitve tu sacivasya tadarthameva vā svārthameva vā svārthamapi vā pravṛtttvena prakīrṇapatākāśabdābhyāmukta iti /
GK16andhvc3u:2254: evaṃ prastutaphalanirvāhaṇāntasyādhikārikasya vṛttasya pañcasandhitvaṃ pūrṇasandhyaṅgatā ca sarvajanavyutpattidāyinī nibandhanīyā /
GK16andhvc3u:2255: prāsaṅgike tvitivṛtte nāyaṃ niyama ityuktam- 'prāsaṅgike parāthatvānna hyeṣa niyamo bhavet' iti muninā /
GK16andhvc3u:2269: tattataprayojanaṃ manasi kṛtya tātsiddhiṃ samprārthya tadartho vyavasāyo bhavatīti sandarśanādijanyatvādbījādayastatsvarūpā ityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:2281: yathā ratnāvalyām ; na tu kevalaṃ śāstrasthitisampādanecchayā /
GK16andhvc3u:2282: yathā veṇīsaṃhāre vilāsākhyasya pratimukhasandhyaṅgasya prakṛtarasanibandhānanuguṇamapi dvitīye 'ṅke bharatamatānusaraṇamātrecchayā ghaṭanam /
GK16andhvc3u:2283: locanam prastāvanopakrame pañcāpi sandhayo 'vasthāpañcakasahitāḥ samucitasandhyaṅgaparipūrṇā arthaprakṛtiyuktā darśitā eva /
GK16andhvc3u:2284_1: iti 'rājyaṃ nirjitaśatru' iti ca vacobhiḥ 'upabhogasevāvasaro 'yam' ityupakṣepātprabhṛti hi nirūpitam /
GK16andhvc3u:2286: pratyekena tu pradarśyamānaṃ pūrvāparānusandhānavandhyatayā kevalaṃ saṃmohadāyi bhavatīti na vitatam /
GK16andhvc3u:2287: asyārthasya yatnāvadheyatveneṣṭatvātsvakaṇṭhena yo vyatireka ukto 'na tu kevalayā' iti tasyodāharaṇamāha---na tviti /
GK16andhvc3u:2288: kevalaśabdamicchāśabdaṃ ca prayuñcānasyāyamāśayaḥ---bharatamuninā sandhyaṅganāṃ rasāṅgabhūtamitivṛttaprāśastyotpādanameva prayojanamuktam /
GK16andhvc3u:2322: idaṃ cāparaṃ prabandhasya rasavyañjakatve nimittaṃ yaduddīpanapraśamane yathāvasaramantarā locanam iti pratimukhasandhyaṅgavilāsalakṣaṇe /
GK16andhvc3u:2328: yathā---'ayaṃ sa rāā udayaṇo tti' ityādi sāgarikāyāḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:2335: durlabhatvaṃ yato nāryā kāminaḥ sā parā ratiḥ //
GK16andhvc3u:2337: vīrarasādāvapi yathāvasaramuddīpanapraśamanābhyāṃ vinā jhaṭityevādbhutaphalakalpe sādhye labdhe prakaṭīcikīrṣita upāyopeyabhāvo na pradarśita evala syāt /
GK16andhvc3u:2342: yadvā---rateḥ ratyākhyasthāyinaḥ yo bhujyata iti bhogo viṣayaḥ pramadādiḥ tadarthā tatsambhogārthā ityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:2344: ādhikāriko yo raso varṇyamānaḥ tasya yaḥ sthāyībhāvastadupavyañjako yo vibhāvādiḥ tadupalakṣamārthatvena tadupalakṣakatvenetyarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:2349: yathātattvamadhigato jñāto 'rtho munyabhipretārthe yasya tathābhūto na,
GK16andhvc3u:2353: nanu veṇīsaṃhāre ka āghikāriko rasa ityatrāha---prakṛta iti /
GK16andhvc3u:2361: yataśca yacca vinivāryate nāryā sambhoga iti śeṣaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:2362: yataḥ yat sā etatrrayam, parā ratiḥ vidhnitasambhogāyā nāryāssambhogaḥ paramaprītiheturityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:2368: nāyakāditattadyvāpārasya caturvargasya ca hetuhetumadbhāva ityarthaḥ naiveti yojanā /
GK16andhvc3u:2372: tathāca yatra yatrā ṅgino rasasya vicchedaḥ prāpnuyāttatra rasasya, yatā ratnāvalyāmeva /
GK16andhvc3u:2375: prabandhaviśeṣasya nāṭakāde rasavyaktinimittamidaṃ cāparamavagantavyaṃ yadalaṅkṛtīnāṃ śaktāvapyānurūpyeṇa yojanam /
GK16andhvc3u:2376: śakto hi kaviḥ kadācidalaṅkāranibandhane tadākṣiptatayaivānapekṣitarasabandhaḥ prabandhamārabhate tadupadeśārthamidamuktam /
GK16andhvc3u:2378: locanam na tu sarvarthavopanatā viśrāntirvicchedo yasya sa tathā /
GK16andhvc3u:2382: rājyapratyāpattyā hi sacivanītimahimopanatayā tadaṅgabhūtapajhāvatīlābhānugatayānuprāṇyamānarūpā paramāmabhilaṣaṇīyatamatāṃ prāptā vāsavadattādhigatireva tatra phalam /
GK16andhvc3u:2383: nirvahaṇe hi 'prāptā devī bhūtadhātrī ca bhūyaḥ saṃbandho 'bhūddarśakena' ityevaṃ devīlābhaprādhānyaṃ nirvāhitam /
GK16andhvc3u:2384: iyati cetivṛttavaicitryacitre bhittisthānīyo vāsavadattāpremabandhaḥ prathamamantrārambhātpramṛti pajhāvatīvivāhādau,
GK16andhvc3u:2386: tena sa eva vāsavadattāviṣayaḥ premabandhaḥ kathāvaśādāśaṅkyamānavicchedo 'pyanusaṃhitaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:2403: dṛṣṭāyūyaṃ nirjitā vidviṣaśca prāptā devī bhūtadhātrī ca bhūyaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:2404: sambandho 'bhūddarśakenāpi sārdhaṃ kiṃ te duḥkhaṃ yattataśśāntamadya //
GK16andhvc3u:2412_1: tāvadaṅke sphuṭaṃ sa evopanivaddhaḥ 'tadvakrenduvilokanena divaso nītaḥ pradoṣastathā
GK16andhvc3u:2414: dvitīye 'pi 'dṛṣṭirnāmṛtavarṣiṇī smitamadhuprasyandi vaktraṃ na kim' ityādinā sa eva vicchinno 'pyanusaṃhitaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:2415: tṛtīye 'pi sarvatra jvaliteṣu veśmasu bhayādālījane vidgute śvāsotkampavihastayā pratipadaṃ devyā patantyā tathā /
GK16andhvc3u:2416: hā nātheti muhuḥ pralāpaparayā dagdhaṃ varākyā tayā śāntenāpi vayaṃ tu tena dahanenādyāpi dahyāmahe //
GK16andhvc3u:2418: caturthe 'pi devīsvīkṛtamānasasya niyataṃ svapnāyamānasya me tadgotragrahaṇādiyaṃ suvadanā yāyātkathaṃ na vyathām /
GK16andhvc3u:2419: itthaṃ yantraṇayā kathaṅkathamapi kṣīṇā niśā jāgrate /
GK16andhvc3u:2420: bālapriyā praṣṭuṃ pravṛttasya me” ityādipadena grāhyam /
GK16andhvc3u:2422: tatpadenātra tatpadenātra sarvatra vāsavadattāyāḥ parāmarśaḥ divasaḥ ahasmamayaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:2426: manmathena kṛtaḥ utpāditaḥ utsāhaḥ yeṣāṃ taiḥ kiṃ kutaḥ baddhotkaṇṭhaṃ bhavati /
GK16andhvc3u:2433: ādipadena “nordhvārdraṃ hṛdayaṃ na candanarasasparśāni cāṅgāni vā kasmin labdhapadena te kṛtamidaṃ krūreṇa pātāgrinā /
GK16andhvc3u:2440_0: pūrvārddhena dṛṣṭyādyaṅgeṣu viroghisadbhāvādagneḥ padalābho na bhavatīti darśitamata
GK16andhvc3u:2440_2: tvaṃ krūreṇāgninā pītā dagdhā iti yadidamiti sambandhaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:2446: varākyā nirbhāgyayā tayā devyā tathā dagdhamiti sambandhaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:2454: itthaṃ yantraṇayā evaṃ locanam dākṣiṇyopahatena sā priyatamā svapte 'pi nāsāditā //
GK16andhvc3u:2456: pañcame 'pi samāgamapratyāśayā karuṇe nivṛtte vipralambhe 'ṅkurite tathābhūte tasminmunivacasi jātāgasi mayi prayatnāntargūḍhāṃ ruṣamupagatā me priyatamā /
GK16andhvc3u:2457: prasīdeti proktā na khalu kupitetyuktimadhuraṃ samudbhinā pītairnayanasalilaiḥ sthāsyati punaḥ //
GK16andhvc3u:2459: ṣaṣṭe 'pi 'tvatsamprāptivilobhitena sacivaiḥ prāṇā mayā dhāritāḥ' ityādinā /
GK16andhvc3u:2463: uddhāṭya sā praviṣṭā hṛdayagṛhaṃ me nṛpatanūjā //
GK16andhvc3u:2465: bālapriyā cintanarūpanidrāpratibandhakena jāgrato me niśā kṣīṇeti sambandhaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:2474: sā priyatamā tathā mama punaḥpaścādapipura itivā pāṭhaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:2479: samudbhinna saṃmiśrā, yukteti yāvat pītaiḥ antaḥstambhitaiḥ samudbhinnaprītiriti pāṭhaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:2480: sādhiṣṭhaḥ samudbhinna prakāśitā prītiḥ yayā setyarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:2483: ādipadena “tanmatvā tyajataśsarīrakamidaṃ naivāsti nissnehatā āsanno 'vasarastavānugamane jātā dhṛtiḥ kintvayam /
GK16andhvc3u:2484: khedo yacca tavānugaṃ na hṛdayaṃ tasmin kṣaṇe dāruṇa //
GK16andhvc3u:2495: svañtite praveśapratibandhāya suṣṭu mithaḥ sambaddhe pakṣmaṇī eva kavāṭe yasya tat /
GK16andhvc3u:2497: svarūpatāḍena svasyarūpamākṛtiḥ tadeva tāḍaḥ tāḍanakriyā sādhanamudgāḍhanakaraṇamiti yāvat tena /
GK16andhvc3u:2500: atra nayanadvāramityetāvadeva rūpaṇaṃ śṛṅgārānuguṇatayā sundaraṃ na tvanyadapīti bhāvaḥ //14//
GK16andhvc3u:2504: dhvaner asya prabandheṣu bhāsate so 'pi keṣucit // DhvK_3.15 //
GK16andhvc3u:2508: asya vivakṣitānyaparavācyasya dhvaneranuraṇanarūpavyaṅgyo 'pi yaḥ prabheda udāhṛto dviprakāraḥ so 'pi prabandheṣu keṣuciddyotate /
GK16andhvc3u:2510: yathā vā mamaiva kāmadevasya sahacarasamāgame locanam na kevalaṃ prabandhena sākṣādvyaṅgyo yāvatpāramparyeṇāpīti darśayitumupakramate--kiñceti /
GK16andhvc3u:2512: yo dhvaneḥ prabheda udāhṛtaḥ saḥ keṣucitprabandheṣu nimittabhūteṣu vyañcakeṣu satsu vyaṅgyatayā sthitaḥ san /
GK16andhvc3u:2515: atha vānusvānopamaḥ prabheda udāhṛto yaḥ prabandheṣu bhāsate asyāpi 'dyotyo 'lakṣyakramaḥ kvacit' ityuttaraślokena kārikāvṛttyoḥ saṅgatiḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:2516: etaduktaṃ bhavati---prabandhena kadācidanuraṇanarūpavyaṅgyo dhvaniḥ sākṣādvyajyate sa tu rasādidhvanau paryavasyatīti /
GK16andhvc3u:2517: yadi tu spaṣṭameva vyākhyāyate tadā grandhasya pūrvottarasyālakṣyakramaviṣayasya madhye grantho 'yamasaṅgataḥ syāt nīrasatvaṃ ca pāñcajanyoktyādīnāmuktaṃ syādatyalam /
GK16andhvc3u:2522: dhvanerityasya prabheda ityanena sambandha iti darśayati-dhvaneḥ prabheda iti /
GK16andhvc3u:2528: ya udāhṛtaḥ sa keṣucit prabandheṣu bhāsate ityanta anuvādaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:2545: saviṇa vi tumammi puṇovanti a atanti paṃmusimmi //
GK16andhvc3u:2548: śmaśānāvatīrṇaṃ putradāhārthamudyoginaṃ janaṃ vipralabdhuṃ gṛdhro divā śavaśarīrabhakṣaṇārthī śīghramevāpasarata yūyamityāha /
GK16andhvc3u:2558: līlayā daṃṣṭrāgreṇa uddhṛtaṃ sakalamahīmaṇḍalaṃ yena varāharūpiṇā tasyetyanena gurutaravastuvahane anāyāsassūcyate /
GK16andhvc3u:2584: kṛt-tad dhita-samāsaiś ca dyotyo 'lakṣya-kramaḥ kvacit // DhvK_3.16 //
GK16andhvc3u:2588: alakṣyakramo dhvanerātmā rasādaḥ subviśeṣaistiṅviśeṣairvacanavaśeṣaiḥ sambandhaviśeṣaiḥ kārakaśaktibhiḥ kṛdviśeṣaistaddhitaviśeṣaiḥ samāsaiśceti /
GK16andhvc3u:2594: sa cābhiprāyo vyaktaḥ śāntarasa eva pariniṣṭhatatāṃ prāptaḥ // 15 //
GK16andhvc3u:2595: evamalakṣyakramavyaṅgyasya rasādadhvaneryadyapi varṇebhyaḥ prabhṛti prabandhaparyante vyañjakavarge nirūpite nanirūpaṇīyāntaramavaśiṣyate,
GK16andhvc3u:2596: tathāpi kavisahṛdayānāṃ śibhāṃ dātuṃ punarapi sūkṣmadṛśānvayavyatirekāvāśritya vyañjakavargamāha--suptiṅḍityādi /
GK16andhvc3u:2598: subādibhiḥ yo 'nusvānopamo bhāsate vaktrabhiprāyādarūpaḥ asyāpi subādibhirvyaktasyānusvānopamasyālakṣyakramavyaṅgyo dyotyaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:2601: udāharaṇe sa tvabhivyakto 'bhiprāyo yathāsvaṃ vibhāvādirūpatādvāreṇa rasādīnvyanakti /
GK16andhvc3u:2609: kanakavarṇasya hemakumbhāderābhā kāntirivābhā yasya iti vā tam /
GK16andhvc3u:2615: nirūpite nirūpite sati na avaśiṣyata iti sambandhaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:2618: subityādīnāṃ tṛtīyāntānāṃ pūrvakārikāsthena bhāsata ityanena tatsthasyāsya dhvanerapītyasyātratyena dyotya ityanena ca sambandha iti vyācaṣṭe--subādibhirityādi /
GK16andhvc3u:2621: yathā---- nyakkāro hyayameva me yadarayastatrāpyasau tāpasaḥ so 'pyatraiva nihanti rākṣasakulaṃ jīvatyaho rāvaṇaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:2622: dhigdhikchakrajitaṃ prabodhitavatā kiṃ kumbhakarṇena vā svargagrāmaṭikāviluṇṭhanavṛthocchūnaiḥ kimebhirbhujaiḥ //
GK16andhvc3u:2623_0: locanam etaduktaṃ bhavati--varṇādibhiḥ prabandhāntaiḥ sākṣādvā raso 'bhivyajyate
GK16andhvc3u:2623_1: vibhāvādipratipādanadvāreṇa yadivā vibhāvādivyañjanadvārema paramparayete tatra bandhasyaitatparamparayā
GK16andhvc3u:2626: vyañjakatvaṃ dṛśyata ityādau ca vākyaśeṣo 'dhyāhāryaḥ vibhāvādivyañjanadvāratayā parāmpartheṇetyervarūpaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:2628: mama śatrusadbhāvonocita iti sambandhānaucityaṃ krodhavibhāvaṃ vyanakti asya iti bahuvacanam /
GK16andhvc3u:2629: tapovidyate yasyeti pau ṣakathāhīnatvaṃ taddhitena matvarthīyenābhivyaktam /
GK16andhvc3u:2631: matkartṛkā yadi jīvanakrayā tadā hananakriyā tāvadanucitā /
GK16andhvc3u:2632: tasyāṃ ca sa kartā apiśabdena manuṣyamātrakam /
GK16andhvc3u:2634: vibhāvādipratipādanadvāreṇa sākṣādvā vibhāvādivyañjanadvāreṇa paramparayā vā raso 'bhivyajyata iti sambandhaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:2642: iyaṃ śrīrāmeṇa rākṣasakulakṣaye kriyamāṇe kruddhasya rāvaṇasya svādhikṣepoktiḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:2649: bahutvena śatrumattā mamānuciteti sambandhānaucityarūpaṃ krodhavibhāvamaraya iti bahuvacanaṃ vyañjayatīti bahuvacanamityasyārthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:2659: saḥ tāpasaḥ mānuṣamātrakaḥ kutsito manuṣya eva /
GK16andhvc3u:2661: yathā atra hi śloke bhūyasā sarveṣāmapyeṣāṃ sphuṭameva vyañjakatvaṃ dṛśyate /
GK16andhvc3u:2663: 'tatrāpyasau tāpasa' ityatra tadvitanipātayoḥ 'so 'pyatraiva nihanti rākṣasakulaṃ jīvatyaho rāvaṇaḥ' ityatra tiṅkārakaśaktīnām /
GK16andhvc3u:2665: evaṃvidhasya vyañcakabhūyastve ca ghaṭamāne kāvyasya sarvātiśāyinī bandhacchāyā samunmīlati /
GK16andhvc3u:2666: yatra hi vyaṅgyāvabhāsinaḥ padasyaikasyaiva tāvadāvirbhāvastatrāpi kāvye kāpi bandhacchāyā kimuta yatra teṣāṃ bahūnāṃ samavāyaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:2668: atra hi rāvama ityasmin pade 'rthāntarasaṃkramitavācyena dhvaniprabhedenālaṅkṛte 'pi punaranantaroktānāṃ vyañjakaprakārāṇāmudbhāsanam /
GK16andhvc3u:2669: dṛśyante ca mahātmanāṃ pratibhāviśeṣabhājāṃ bāhulyenaivaṃvidhā bandhaprakārāḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:2670: locanam deśo 'dhikaraṇam niḥśeṣema hanyamānatatāyā rākṣasabalaṃ ca karmeti tadidamasaṃbhāvyamānamupanatamiti puruṣakārāsampattirdhvanyate tiṅkārakaśaktipratipādakaiśca śabdaiḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:2672: dhigdhigiti nipātasya śakraṃ jitavānityākhyāyikeyamiti upapadasamāsena sahakṛtaḥ svargetyādisamāsasya svapauruṣānusmaraṇaṃ prati vyañjakatvam /
GK16andhvc3u:2677: tena tilaśastilaśo 'pi vibhajyamāne 'tra śloke sarva evāṃśo vyañjakatvena bhātīti kimanyat /
GK16andhvc3u:2702: 'pṛthivī gatayauvanā' locanam atikrāntaṃ na tu kadācana vartamānatāmavalambamānaṃ sukhaṃ yeṣu te kālā iti,
GK16andhvc3u:2703: sarva eva na tu sukhaṃ prati vartamānaḥ sa ko 'pi kālaleśa ityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:2704: pratīpānyupasthitāni vṛttāni pratyāvartamānāni tathā dūrabhāvīnyapi pratyupasthitāni nikaṭatayā vartamānāni bhavanti dāruṇāni duḥkhāni yeṣu te /
GK16andhvc3u:2705: duḥkhaṃ bahuprakārameva prativartamānāḥ sarve kālāṃśā ityanena kālasya tāvannirvedamabhivyañjayataḥ śāntarasavyañjakatvam /
GK16andhvc3u:2706: deśasyāpyāha--pṛthivī śvaḥ śvaḥ prātaḥ prātardināddinaṃ pāpīyadivasāḥ pāpānāṃ sambandhinaḥ pāpiṣṭhajanasvāmikā divasā yasyāṃ sā tathoktā /
GK16andhvc3u:2707_0: svābhāvata eva tāvatkālo duḥkhamayaḥ tatrāpi pāpiṣṭhajanasvāmikapṛthivīlakṣayauvanā
GK16andhvc3u:2707_1: vṛddhastrīvadasaṃbhāvyamānasaṃbhogā gatayauvanatayā hi yo yo divasa āgacchati bālapriyā
GK16andhvc3u:2726: śvaḥ śva ityasya gatayauvanetyanenāpi sambandha ityāha---śvaḥśva ityādi /
GK16andhvc3u:2727: gatayauvanetyasya mukhyārthaṃ tasya prakṛte bādhallakṣaṇānimittaṃ tatsārūpyaṃ ca darśayati--vṛddhetyādi /
GK16andhvc3u:2731: gatayauvaneti pāpīyānityatra hetugarbhaṃ pāpīyapadamarthāntaraparaṃ cetyanyathā vyācaṣṭe---gatetyādi /
GK16andhvc3u:2735: eṣāṃ ca subādīnāmekaikaśaḥ samuditānāṃ ca vyañjakatvaṃ mahākavīnāṃ prabandheṣu prāyeṇa dṛśyate /
GK16andhvc3u:2736: subantasya vyañjakatvaṃ yathā--- tālaiḥ śiñjadvayasubhagaiḥ kāntayā nartito me yāmadhyāste divasavigame nīlakaṇṭhaḥ suhṛdvaḥ //
GK16andhvc3u:2738: avasara rouṃ cia ṇimmiāiṃ mā puṃsa me haacchīiṃ /
GK16andhvc3u:2739: daṃsaṃṇamettumbhattehiṃ jahi hiaaṃ tuha ṇa ṇāam //
GK16andhvc3u:2740: locanam sa sa pūrvapūrvāpekṣayā pāpīyān nikṛṣṭatvāt /
GK16andhvc3u:2741: yadiveyasunanto 'yaṃ śabdo muninaivaṃ prayukto ṇijanto vā /
GK16andhvc3u:2745: samuditatve tūdāharaṇaṃ dattaṃ vyastatve cojyata iti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:2747: apasara roditumeva nirmite mā puṃsaya hate akṣiṇī me /
GK16andhvc3u:2748: darśanamātronmattābhyāṃ yābhyāṃ tava hṛdayamevaṃrūpaṃ na jñātam //
GK16andhvc3u:2749: anmatto hi na kiñcijjānātīti na kasyāpyatrāparādhaḥ daivenetthameva nirmāṇaṃ bālapriyā pṛthivyā iti śeṣaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:2750: nanu pāpīyānityuktārthaḥ kathaṃ labhyata ityatrāha---itasunanta iti /
GK16andhvc3u:2751: nanvasmin pakṣe pāpīyo divaseti bhāvyamityata āha--muninetyādi /
GK16andhvc3u:2752: ārṣo 'yaṃ prayoga ityarthaḥ. a6 pakṣāntaramāha---ṇijanto veti /
GK16andhvc3u:2753: muninā prayukta ityanuṣajyate ṇijanteyasunanto munināprayukto vetyarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:2754: lokān pāpīyasaḥ karotītyarthe pāpīyaśśabdāṇṇaci kartaryavi ṭerṇicaśca lopādakārānto 'yaṃ pāpīyaśabda iti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:2755: anusvānetyādikārikā yathā vyākhyātā, tathā prakṛte yojayata---so 'pītyādi /
GK16andhvc3u:2767: rīditumeva nirmite sṛṣṭe me hatākṣiṇī kutsite nayane /
GK16andhvc3u:2768: mā puṃsaya mā abhivardhaya, mā tvadabhimukhaṃ vikāsayeti /
GK16andhvc3u:2777: mā panthaṃ rundhīo avehi bālaa ahosi ahirīo /
GK16andhvc3u:2780: aṇaṇatta vacca bālaa hṇā arnti kiṃ maṃ puloesieam /
GK16andhvc3u:2783: apasara mā vṛthā prayāsaṃ kārṣīḥ daivasya viparivartayitumaśakyatvāditi tiṅanto vyañjakaḥ tadanugṛhītāni padāntarāṇyapīti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:2784: mā panthānaṃ rudhaḥ apehi bālaka aprauḍha aho asi ahnīkaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:2785: vayaṃ paratantrā yataḥ śūnyagṛhaṃ māmakaṃ rakṣaṇīyaṃ vartate //
GK16andhvc3u:2786: ityatrāpehīti tiṅantamidaṃ dhvanati--tvaṃ tāvadaprauḍho lokamadhye yadevaṃ prakāśayasi /
GK16andhvc3u:2788: 'anyatra vraja bālaka' aprauḍha buddhe snāntīṃ māṃ kiṃ prakarṣeṇālokayasyetat /
GK16andhvc3u:2791: atra jāyāto ye bhīravasteṣāmetatsathānamiti durāpetaḥ bālapriyā tiṅantaśabda itṣathaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:2801: atra śloke śṛṅgāraḥ sambhogo vyaṅya pūrvaślorake tu vipralambha iti bhedaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:2802: vṛttau--'aṇṇatte'ti anyatra vraja bālakasnāntīṃ kiṃ mā pralokayasyetat /
GK16andhvc3u:2806: jalāśaye snāntīṃ kañcidanurāgeṇa paśyantaṃ kañcana gṛhasthaṃ prati taṃ kāmayamānāyāstasyā uktiriyam /
GK16andhvc3u:2810: etattaṭaṃ jāyābhīrukāṇāṃ sambandhi na bhavatyeveti yojanā /
GK16andhvc3u:2813: tathāvidhānāmatra sthāne vartanarūpaḥ sambandho dūrāpeta ityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:2821: nipātānāṃ vyañjakatvaṃ yathā--- ayamekapade tayā viyogaḥ priyayā copanataḥ suduḥsaho me /
GK16andhvc3u:2825: mukhamaṃsavivarti pakṣmalākṣyāḥ kathamapyunnamitaṃ na cumbitaṃ tu //
GK16andhvc3u:2828: upasargāṇāṃ vyañcakatvaṃ yathā--- nīvārāḥ śukagarbhakoṭaramukhabhraṣṭāstaruṇāmadhaḥ prasnigdhāḥ kvacidiṅgudīphalabhidaḥ sūcyanta evopalāḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:2829: viśvāsopagabhādabhinnagatayaḥ śabdaṃ sahante mṛgā- stoyādhārapathāśca valkalaśikhāniṣyandalekhāṅkitāḥ //
GK16andhvc3u:2832: kṛtaḥ kapratyayaprayogo yeṣu kāvyavākyeṣu yathā jāyābhīrukāṇāmiti /
GK16andhvc3u:2833: ye hyarasajñā dharmapatnīṣu premaparatantrāstebhyaḥ ko 'nyo jagati kutsitaḥ sthāditi kapratyayo 'vajñātiśayadyotakaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:2837: dvau caśabdāvevamāhatuḥ kākatālīyanyāyena gaṇḍasyopari sphoṭa itivattadviyogaśca varṣasamayaśca samamupanatau etadalaṃ prāṇaharaṇāya /
GK16andhvc3u:2840: paścāttāpasūcakassan tāvanmātraparicumbanalābhenāpi kṛtakṛtyatā syaditi dhvanatīti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:2853: ityādau dvitrāṇāṃ copasargāṇāmekatra pade yaḥ prayogaḥ so 'pi rasavyaktyanuguṇatayaiva nirdeṣaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:2856: locanam vaiyākaraṇādigṛheṣu hi prākprayogasvātantryaprayogābhāvātṣaṣṭhyādyaśravaṇālliṅgasaṃkhyāvarahācca vācakavailakṣaṇyena dyotakā nipātā ityuddhoṣyata eveti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:2857: prakarṣeṇa snigdhā iti praśabdaḥ prakarṣaṃ dyotayanniṅgudīphalānāṃ sarasatvamācakṣāṇa āśramasya saundaryātiśayandhvanati /
GK16andhvc3u:2864: samyagbhūtamupāṃśukṛtvā ā samantāccarantamityanena lokānujighṛkṣātiśayastattadācarataḥ parameśvarasya dhvanitaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:2871_0: prākprayogaśca svātantrayeṇa prayogābhāvaśca tasmāt prākprayogāditi vyastatayā pāṭhaḥ
GK16andhvc3u:2871_1: sādhīyān upasargasaṃjñāviśiṣṭānāṃ prasākṣādityādīnāṃ nipātānāṃ dhātoḥ prāgeva prayogādivaivamādīnāṃ
GK16andhvc3u:2873: yathā candrasya candreṇa vā sadṛśaṃ mukhamityādau ṣaṣṭhyādikaṃ śrūyate,
GK16andhvc3u:2874: tathā candra ivetyādau ṣaṣṭhyādikaṃ na śrūyate yatastasmādityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:2883: ūrjite guṇini dṛṣṭe sata, ye jīvanti sma utkṛṣṭajīvitā abhūvan /
GK16andhvc3u:2884: ye prītyā vapuṣi na mānti sma,
GK16andhvc3u:2885: ye prasyandipramadāśravaḥ pulakitāḥ santaḥ pranṛtyanti smetyādyanvayaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:2889: ye svavapuṣīti pāṭhe tu jīvantītyādau nipātānāmapi tathaiva /
GK16andhvc3u:2891: yathā vā--- ye jīvanti na mānti ye sma vapuṣi prītyā pranṛtyanti ca prasyandipramadāśravaḥ pulakitā dṛṣṭe guṇinyūrjite /
GK16andhvc3u:2892: hā dhikkaṣṭamaho kva yāmi śaraṇaṃ teṣāṃ janānāṃ kṛte nītānāṃ pralayaṃ śaṭhena vidhinā sādhudviṣaḥ puṣyatā //
GK16andhvc3u:2895: yathā--- yadvañjanāhitamatirbahucāṭugarbhaṃ kāryonmukhaḥ khalajanaḥ kṛtakaṃ bravīti /
GK16andhvc3u:2896: tatsādhavo nana vidanta vidanti kintu kartu vṛthāprāṇayamasya na pārayanti //
GK16andhvc3u:2900: ślāghātiśayo nirvedātiśayaśca aho bateti hā dhigiti ca dhvanyate /
GK16andhvc3u:2904: ta eva hi sarvaṃ vidanti sutarāmiti dhvanyate /
GK16andhvc3u:2905: vākyapaunaruktyaṃ yathā---'paśya dvīpādanyasmādapi' iti vacanānantaraṃ 'kaḥ saṃdehaḥ dvīpādanyasmādapa' ityanenepsitaprāptiravidhnitaiva dhvanyate /
GK16andhvc3u:2906: 'kiṃ kim? svassthā bhavanti mayi jīvati' ityanenāmarṣātiśayaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:2923: airā hohinti pahā maṇorahāṇaṃ pi dullaṅghā //
GK16andhvc3u:2927: atra hyacirādbhaviṣyanti panthāna ityatra bhaviṣyantītyasmin pade pratyayaḥ kālaviśeṣābhidhāyī rasaparipoṣahetuḥ prakāśate /
GK16andhvc3u:2928: ayaṃ hi gāthārthaḥ pravāsavipralambhaśṛṅgāravibhāvatayā vibhāvyamāno rasavān /
GK16andhvc3u:2930: yathā---tadgehaṃ natamiti mandiramidaṃ labdhāvagāhaṃ divaḥ sā dhenurjaratī caranti kariṇāmetā dhanābhā dhaṭāḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:2931: sa kṣudo musaladhvaniḥ kalamidaṃ saṅgītakaṃ yoṣitā- māścaryaṃ divasaurdvijo 'yamiyatīṃ bhūmiṃ samāropitaḥ //
GK16andhvc3u:2933: tiṅantapadānupravaṣṭasyāpyarthakalāpasya kārakakālasaṃkhyopagraharūpasya madhye 'nvayavyatarekābhyāṃ sūkṣmadṛśā bhāgagatamapi vyañjakatvaṃ vicāryamiti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:2935: utprekṣyamāṇo varṣāsamayaḥ kampakārī kimuta vartamāna iti dhvanyate /
GK16andhvc3u:2946: samaviṣamāḥ samāḥ viṣamāśca deśāḥ nirviśeṣāḥ jalapravāhanimagnatayā ekarūpāḥ yeṣu te /
GK16andhvc3u:2958: atra śloke divasairityasmin pade prakṛtyaṃśo 'pi dyotakaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:2960: atra ca sarvanāmnāmeva vyañjakatvaṃ hṛdi vyavasthāpya kavinā kvetyādiśabdaprayogo na kṛtaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:2961: anayā diśā locanam divasārthe hyatrātyantāsambhāvyamānatāmasyārthasya dhvani /
GK16andhvc3u:2964: tena prakṛtyaṃśena sambhūta sarvanāmavyañjakaṃ dṛśyata ityuktaṃ bhavatīti na paunaruktyam /
GK16andhvc3u:2965: tathā hi taditi padaṃ natabhittītyetatprakṛtyaṃśasahāyaṃ samastāmaṅgalanidhānabhūtāṃ mūṣakādyākīrṇatāṃ dhvanati /
GK16andhvc3u:2967: na ca natabhittiśabdenāpyete daurbhāgyāyatanatvasūcakā viśeṣā uktāḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:2972: tadidaṃśabdādyabhāve tu sarvamasaṅgataṃ syaditi tadidamaṃśayoreva prāṇatvaṃ yojyam /
GK16andhvc3u:2973: etacca dviśaḥ sāmastyaṃ triśaḥ sāmastyamiti vyañjakamityupalakṣaṇaparam /
GK16andhvc3u:2978: nanu prakṛtyaṃśo dyotaka ityukatyaiva sarvanāmnāmapi vyañjakatve prāpte punastadvacanaṃ punaruktamityata āha---prakṛtyaṃśasya ceti /
GK16andhvc3u:2995: te locane ityatra pūrvamuktaṃ smārayati---evaṃvidha ityādi /
GK16andhvc3u:3009: dvayoḥ sambhūya tathā trayāṇāṃ sambhūya vyañjakatvamityetadupalakṣaṇamityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:3013: etacca sarvaṃ padavākyaracanādyotanoktyaiva gatārthamapi vaicitryeṇa vyutpattaye punaruktam /
GK16andhvc3u:3017: kiñjārthaviśeṣākṣepyatve 'pi rasādīnāṃ teṣāmarthaviśeṣāṇāṃ vyañjakaśabdāvinābhāvitvādyathāpradarśitaṃ vyañjakasvarūpaparijñānaṃ vibhajyopayujyata eva /
GK16andhvc3u:3018: śabdaviśeṣāṇāṃ cānyatra ca cārutvaṃ yadvibhāgenopadarśitaṃ tadapi teṣāṃ vyañjakatvenaivāvasthitamityavagantavyam /
GK16andhvc3u:3019: yatrāpi tatsamprati na pratibhāsate tatrāpi vyañjake racanāntare yaddṛṣṭaṃ sauṣṭhavaṃ teṣāṃ pravāhapatitānāṃ tadevābhyāsādapoddhṛtānāmapyavabhāsata ityavasātavyam /
GK16andhvc3u:3027: na vācakatvaṃ dhvanivyavahāropayogi yenāvācakasya vyañjakatvaṃ na syāt iti prāgevoktam /
GK16andhvc3u:3028: nanu na gītādivadrasābhivyañjakatve 'pi śabdasya tatra vyāpāro 'styeva ;
GK16andhvc3u:3035: srakcandanādayaḥ śabdāḥ śṛṅgāre cāravo bībhatse tvacārava iti rasakṛta eva vibhāgaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:3036: rasaṃ prati ca śabdasya vyañjakatvamevetyuktaṃ prāk /
GK16andhvc3u:3038: srakcandanādiśabdānāṃ tadānīṃ śṛṅgārādivyañjakatvābhāve 'pi vyañjakatvaśakterbhūyasā bālapriyā atropaṣṭambhakamāha - yadvattyatyanye 'pīti /
GK16andhvc3u:3042: vṛttāvanupadaṃ vakṣyamāṇasyādhikāṃśasya bodhanārthaṃ cākṣepaḥ kṛta ityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:3054: ko 'nyathā tulye vācakatve śabdānāṃ cārutvaviṣayo viśeṣaḥ syat /
GK16andhvc3u:3055: anya evāsau sahṛdayasaṃvedya iti cet kimidaṃ sahṛdayatvaṃ nāma?
GK16andhvc3u:3058: pūrvasmin pakṣe tathāvidhasahṛdayavyavasthāpitānāṃ śabdaviśeṣāṇāṃ cārutvaniyamo na syāt /
GK16andhvc3u:3061: tathāvidhaiḥ sahṛdayaiḥ saṃvedyo rasādisamarpaṇasāmarthyameva naisargikaṃ śabdānāṃ viśeṣa iti vyañjakatvāśrayyeva teṣāṃ mukhyaṃ cārutvam /
GK16andhvc3u:3063: tathāhi-'taṭī tāraṃ tāmyati' ityatra taṭaśabdasya puṇṭaśabdasya puṃstvanapuṃsakatve anādṛtya strītvamevāśritaṃ sahṛdayaiḥ 'strīti nāmāpi madhuraṃ' iti kṛtvā /
GK16andhvc3u:3064: yathā vāsmadupādhyāyasya vidvatkavisahṛdayacakravartino bhaṭṭendurājasya--- indīvaradyuti yadā bibhṛyānna lakṣma syurvismayaikasuhṛdo 'sya yadā vilāsāḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:3078: tathāpi kapolatalakomalakāntiḥ kiṃ kiṃ syānnāmeti sambandhaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:3086: candraṃ vilokya madhyasthasya kasyacidrasikasya vacana ityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:3090: evaṃ rasādīnāṃ vyañjakasvarūpamabhidhāya teṣāmeva virodhirūpaṃ lakṣayitumidamupakramyate---
GK16andhvc3u:3092: prabandhe muktake vāpi rasādīn bandhum icchatā /
GK16andhvc3u:3093: yatnaḥ kāryaḥ sumatinā parihāre virodhinām // DhvK_3.17 //
GK16andhvc3u:3097: prabandhe muktake vāpi rasabhāvanibandhanaṃ pratyādṛtamanāḥ kavirvirodhipahihāre paraṃ yatnamādadhīta /
GK16andhvc3u:3098: anyathā tvasya rasamayaḥ śloka eko 'pi samyaṅna samapdyate /
GK16andhvc3u:3099: locanam aniyantrītapuruṣecchāyatto hi samayaḥ kathaṃ niyataḥ syāt /
GK16andhvc3u:3105: śabdāntareṇa saha yā racanā tadapekṣo 'sau viśeṣa ityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:3107: ata eva racanayā prasādena cārutvena copabṛṃhitā eva śabdāḥ kāvye yojyā iti tātparyam // 15//
GK16andhvc3u:3109: rasādīnāṃ yadvyañjakaṃ varṇapadādiprabandhāntaṃ tasya svarūpamabhidhāyeti sambandhaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:3111: virodhināmapi lakṣaṇakaraṇe prayojanamucyate śakyahānatvaṃ nāma anayā kārikayā /
GK16andhvc3u:3113: nanu 'vibhāvabhāvānubhāvasañcāryaucityacāruṇaḥ' iti yaduktaṃ tata eva vyatirekamukhenaitadapyavagaṃsyate /
GK16andhvc3u:3114: maivam ;vyatirekeṇa hi tadabhāvamātraṃ pratīyate na tu tadviruddham /
GK16andhvc3u:3115: tadabhāvamātraṃ ca na tathā dūṣakaṃ yathā tadviruddham /
GK16andhvc3u:3116: pathyānupayogo hi na tathā vyādhiṃ bālapriyā śabdagato viśeṣa ityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:3123: śakyahānatvaṃ nāma prayojanamanayā kārakayā ucyata iti sambandhaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:3124: virodhināṃ lakṣaṇe jñāte teṣāṃ parihāraḥ śakya iti tadeva prayojanamityarthaḥ // 17 //
GK16andhvc3u:3128: vibhāvādyaucityaśālinaḥ kathāśarīrasya vidhirityādinā tadaucityavirahiṇo vidhirna kārya ityādyathamātramityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:3131: vṛttau 'śāntā'dīti kāni punastāni virodhīni yāni yatnataḥ kaveḥ parihartavyānītyucyate--
GK16andhvc3u:3135: akāṇḍa eva vicchittir akāṇḍe ca prakāśanam /
GK16andhvc3u:3137: rasasya syād virodhāya vṛtty-anaucityam eva ca // DhvK_3.19 //
GK16andhvc3u:3144: prastutarasāpekṣayā virodhī yo rasastasya sambandhināṃ vibhāvabhāvānubhāvānāṃ parigraho rasavirodhahetukaḥ sambhavanīyaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:3145: tatra virodhirasavibhāvaparigraho yathā śāntarasavibhāveṣu tadvibhāvatayaiva nirūpiteṣvanantarameva śṛṅgārādivibhāvavarṇane /
GK16andhvc3u:3146: virodhirasabhāvaparigraho yathā priyaṃ prati praṇayakalahakupitāsu kāminīṣu vairāgyakathābhiranunaye /
GK16andhvc3u:3147: virodhirasānubhāvaparigraho yathā praṇayakupitāyāṃ priyāyāmaprasīdantyāṃ nāyakasya kopāveśavivaśasya raudrānubhāvavarṇane /
GK16andhvc3u:3153: 'alaṅkṛtīnām' ityanena yaduktaṃ tadviruddhamanyadapi ca viruddhaṃ vṛtyanaucityamityanena /
GK16andhvc3u:3157: virodhinī rasasya yo bhāvo vyabhicārī tasya parigrahaḥ,
GK16andhvc3u:3158: virodhinastu yaḥ sthāyī sthāyitayā bālapriyā 'śṛṅgārādī'ci ca nirdeśe bījamāha---hāsyaśṛṅgārayārityādi /
GK16andhvc3u:3163: pratipattaryekasmin śame udbuddhe tadavyavadhānena rāgodbodhāsambhavāditi bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:3164: ataḥ śāntavibhāve varṇite tadanantarameva śṛṅgārādivibhāvavarṇanaṃ na kāyam /
GK16andhvc3u:3165: virodhirasasyetyādigranthaṃ ayaṃ cānyo rasabhaṅgaheturyatprastutarasāpekṣayā vastuno 'nyasya kathañcidanvitasyāpi vistareṇa kathanam /
GK16andhvc3u:3166: yathā vipralambhaśṛṅgāre nāyakasya kasyacadvarṇayitumupakrānte kaveryamakādyalaṅkāranibandhanarasikatayā mahatā prabandhena parvatādivarṇane /
GK16andhvc3u:3167: ayaṃ cāparo rasabhaṅgaheturavagantavyo yadakāṇḍa locanam tatparigraho 'sambhavanīya eva tadanutthānaprasaṅgāt /
GK16andhvc3u:3170: vairāgyakathāmirita vairāgyaśabdena nirvedaḥ śāntasya yaḥ sthāyī sa uktaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:3171: yathā---'prasāde vartasva prakaṭaya mudaṃ santyaja ruṣam' ityādyupakramyārthāntaranyāso 'na mugdhe pratyetuṃ prabhavati gataḥ kālahariṇaḥ' iti /
GK16andhvc3u:3174: na hi jñātaśuktikārajatatattvastadupādeyadhiyaṃ bhajate ṛte saṃvṛtimātrāt /
GK16andhvc3u:3175: kathābhiriti bahuvacanaṃ śāntarasasya vyabhicāriṇo dhṛtiṃ matiprabhṛtīn saṅgṛhṇāta /
GK16andhvc3u:3177: kimuta vistarata ityāha---kathañjidanvitasyeti bālapriyā vivṛṇoti---virodhina ityādi /
GK16andhvc3u:3182: svata eva vyabhicāriṇaḥ vyabhicāratvena sthāyinaśca bodhanāya bhāva iti sāmānyata uktamityathaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:3186: nidhānaṃ saukhyānāṃ kṣaṇamabhimukhaṃ sthāpaya mukham' iti dvitīyatṛtīyapādau /
GK16andhvc3u:3188: gataḥ kāla eva hariṇaḥ asthiratvāt pratyetuṃ pratyāgantum na prabhavati sa punarnāgacchatītyarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:3189_0: atra śāntasya vibhāvaḥ kālānityatvalakṣaṇo nibandhaḥ tatprakāśito nirvedo vyabhicārī
GK16andhvc3u:3189_1: cetyato 'tra virodhirasavibhāvabhāvayoḥ parigrahaḥ sa ca prakṛtarasapratikūla ityāha---manāgapītyādi /
GK16andhvc3u:3194: jñātaṃ viṣayāṇāṃ satatvaṃ duḥkhamiśritatvapariṇāmavirasatvādinā heyatvarūpaṃ tattvaṃ yena saḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:3199: śuktau bhāsamānaṃ rajataṃ śuktikārajatamityucyate, jñātaṃ śuktikārajatatatvaṃ yena saḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:3208: eva vicchittiḥ rasasyākāṇḍa eva ca prakāśanam /
GK16andhvc3u:3209_0: tatrānavasare virāmo rasasya yathā nāyakasya kasyacitspṛhaṇīyasamāgamayā nāyikayā
GK16andhvc3u:3209_1: kayācitparāṃ paripoṣapadarvī prāpte śṛṅgāre vidite ca paramparānurāge samāgamopāyacintocitaṃ
GK16andhvc3u:3210_0: anavasare ca prakāśanaṃ rasasya yathā pravṛtte pravṛttavividhavīrasaṅkṣaye kalpasaṅkṣayakalpe
