GK16andhvc3u:3211: na caivaṃvidhe viṣaye daivavyāmohitatvaṃ kathāpuruṣasya parihāro yato rasabandha eva kaveḥ prādhānyena pravṛttinibandhanaṃ yuktam /
GK16andhvc3u:3212: itivṛttavarṇanaṃ tadupāya evetyuktaṃ prāk 'ālokārthī yathā dīpaśikhāyāṃ yatnavāñjanaḥ' ityādinā /
GK16andhvc3u:3213: ata eva cetivṛttamātravarṇanaprādhānye 'ṅgāṅgibhāvarahitarasabhāvanibandhena ca kavīnāmevaṃvidhāni skhalitāni bhavantīti rasādirūpavyaṅgyatātparyamevaiṣāṃ locanam vyāpārāntareti /
GK16andhvc3u:3215: api tāvaditi śabdābhyāṃ duryodhanādestadvarṇanaṃ dūrāpāstamiti veṇīsaṃhāre dvitīyāṅkamevodāharaṇatvena dhvanati /
GK16andhvc3u:3220: yato rasabandha eva mukhyaḥ kavivyāpāraviṣayaḥ itivṛttamātravarṇanaprādhānye bālapriyā rāmadevaprāyasyāpi tāvadityatratyābhyāṃ tāmyāmityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:3240: vṛttau prādhānye sati yadibandhanaṃ tasminniti sambandhaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:3242: punaścāyamanyo rasabhaṅgaheturavadhāraṇīyo yatparipoṣaṃ gatasyāpi rasasya paunaḥ--punyena dīpanam /
GK16andhvc3u:3243: ubhayukto hi rasaḥ svasāmagrīlabdhaparipoṣaḥ punaḥ punaḥ parāmṛśyamāṇaḥ parimlānakusumakalpaḥ kalpate /
GK16andhvc3u:3245: yathā nāyakaṃ prati nāyikāyāḥ kasyāściducitāṃ bhaṅgimantareṇa svayaṃ sambhogābhilāṣakathane /
GK16andhvc3u:3246: yadi vā vṛttīnāṃ bharataprasiddhānāṃ kaiśikyādīnāṃ kāvyālaṅkārāntaraprasiddhānāmupanāgarikādyānāṃ vā yadanaucityamaviṣaye nibandhanaṃ tadapi rasabhaṅgahetuḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:3247: evameṣāṃ rasavirodhināmanyeṣāṃ cānayā diśā svayamutprekṣitānāṃ parihāre satkavibhiravahitairbhavitavyam /
GK16andhvc3u:3250: nīrasastu prabandho yaḥ so 'paśabdo mahān kaveḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:3252: locanam sati yadaṅgāṅgibhāvarahitānāmavicāritaguṇapradhānabhāvānāṃ rasabhāvānāṃ nibandhanaṃ tannimittāni skhalitāni sarve doṣā ityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:3254: vyaṅgyo 'rtho bhavatu mā vā bhūt kastatrābhiniveśaḥ? kākadantaparīkṣāprāyameva tatsyāditi bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:3255: vṛttyanaucityameva cetibahudā vyācaṣṭe tadapītyanena caśabdaṃ kārikāgataṃ vyācaṣṭe /
GK16andhvc3u:3259: nāyakasya hi dhīrodāttādibhedabhinnasya sarvathā vīrarasānuvedhena bhavitavyamiti taṃ prati kātarapuruṣocitamadhairyayojanaṃ duṣṭameva /
GK16andhvc3u:3263: nanu kālidāsaḥ bālapriyā cakārau vākyālaṅkāre ityāśayena vyācaṣṭe---itivṛttetyādi /
GK16andhvc3u:3268: nāyakaṃ prati nāyakayā svayaṃ sambhogābhilāṣasya kathane nibaddhe nāyakasyādhairyayojanamāpatati,
GK16andhvc3u:3274: vṛttau 'ucitāṃ bhaṅgimantareṇe' pūrve viśṛṅkhalagiraḥ kavayaḥ prāptakīrtayaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:3281: bādhyānām aṅga-bhāvaṃ vā prāptānām uktir acchalā // DhvK_3.20 //
GK16andhvc3u:3285: svasāmagnyā labdhaparipoṣe tu vivakṣite rase virodhināṃ virodhirasāṅgānāṃ bādhyānāmaṅgabhāvaṃ vā prāptanāṃ satāmuktiradoṣā /
GK16andhvc3u:3286: bādhyatvaṃ hi virodhināṃ śakyābhibhavatve sati nānyathā /
GK16andhvc3u:3288: aṅgabhāvaṃ prāptānāṃ ca teṣāṃ virodhitvameva nivartate /
GK16andhvc3u:3290: tatra yeṣāṃ naisargikī teṣāṃ tāvaduktāvavirodha eva /
GK16andhvc3u:3291: yathā vipralambhaśṛṅgāre tadaṅgānāṃ locanam paripoṣaṃ gatasyāpi karuṇasya rativilāseṣu paunaḥpunyena dīpanamakārṣīt,
GK16andhvc3u:3293: na hi vasiṣṭhādibhiḥ kathañcidyadi smṛtimārgastyaktastadvayamapi tathā tyajāmaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:3296: evaṃ virodhināṃ parihāre sāmānyenokte pratiprasavaṃ viyataviṣayamāha---vivakṣita itī /
GK16andhvc3u:3302: bālapriyā tyenena bhaṅgyā tatkathanaṃ duṣyantādernāyakasyeva nāyikāyā api na doṣa iti darśitam /
GK16andhvc3u:3317: tadaṅgatve ca sambhavatyapi maraṇasyopanyāso na jyāyān /
GK16andhvc3u:3319: karuṇasaya tu tathāvide viṣaye paripoṣo bhaviṣyatīti cet-na;
GK16andhvc3u:3323_1: rasabandhapradhānena kavinā locanam tatra prathamaṃ svābhāvikaprakāraṃ nirūpayati---tadaṅgānāmiti /
GK16andhvc3u:3324: nirapekṣabhāvatayā sāpekṣabhāvavapralambhaśṛṅgāravirodhinyapi karuṇe ye vyādhyādayassarvathāṅgatvena dṛṣṭāḥ teṣāmiti /
GK16andhvc3u:3325: te hi karuṇe bhavantyeva ta eva ca bhavantīti /
GK16andhvc3u:3326: śṛṅgāre tu bhavantyeva nāpi ta eveti /
GK16andhvc3u:3336: nanvevaṃ sarva eva vyabhicāriṇa iti vighaṭitamityāśaṅkyāha---śṛṅgāre veti /
GK16andhvc3u:3337: adīrghakāle yatramaraṇe viśrāntipadabandha eva notpadyate tatrāsya vyabhicāritvam /
GK16andhvc3u:3339: yadi tādṛśīṃ bhaṅgiṃ ghaṭayituṃ sukaveḥ kauśalaṃ bhavati /
GK16andhvc3u:3345: karuṇe bhavantyeva te eva bhavantīti dvedhā niyama ityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:3349: ālasyaugnyajugupsāvarjāssarvaṃ eva vyabhicāriṇa iti muninā uktatvādityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:3356: maraṇādūrdhvamadīrgho yaḥ kālastasmiṃstena vā pratyāpattiḥ nāyakayoḥ samāgamastatsambhave satītyarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:3361_0: kāvyānuśāsane 'pyevamuktam--“śṛṅgāre tu maraṇādhyavasāyo tatra labdhapratiṣṭhe tu
GK16andhvc3u:3361_1: vivakṣite rase virodhirasāṅgānāṃ bādhyatvenoktāvadoṣo yathā--- kvākāryaṃ śaśalakṣmaṇaḥ
GK16andhvc3u:3361_2: kva ca kulaṃ bhūyo 'pi dṛśyeta sā doṣāṇāṃ praśamāya me śrutamaho kope 'pi kāntaṃ mukham /
GK16andhvc3u:3362: kiṃ vakṣyantyapakalmaṣāḥ kṛtadhiyaḥ svapne 'pi sā durlabhā cetaḥ svāsthyamupaihi kaḥ khalu yuvā dhanyo 'dharaṃ pāsyati //
GK16andhvc3u:3363: locanam pūrvākārādhikacaturayā saṅgataḥ kāntayāsau līlāgāreṣvaramata punarnandanābhyantareṣu //
GK16andhvc3u:3365: ata eva sukavinā maraṇe padabandhamātraṃ na kṛtam, anūdyamānatvenaivopanibandhanāt /
GK16andhvc3u:3366: padabandhaniveśe tu sarvathā śokodaya evātiparimitakālapratyāpattilābhe 'pi atha dūraparāmarśakasahṛdayasāmājikābhiprāyeṇa maraṇasyādīrghakālapratyāpatteraṅgatocyate,
GK16andhvc3u:3367: hanta tāpasavatsarāje 'pi yaugandharāyaṇādinītimārgākarṇanasaṃskṛtamatīnāṃ vāsavadattāmaraṇabuddherevābhāvātkaruṇasya nāmāpi na syādityalamavāntareṇa bahunā /
GK16andhvc3u:3373: bālapriyā maraṇādūrdhvaṃ jhaṭiti punaryogo vā nibadhyata'iti /
GK16andhvc3u:3382: prapūrvaślokena saṅgamāśāyā varṇitatvādatra maraṇasya vipralambhāṅgatvaṃ sphuṭamiti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:3387: atiparimito 'lyalpaḥ kālastena pratyāpatteḥ saṅgamasya lābhaḥ sambhavaḥ pratītirvā tasminnapītyarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:3393: ayuktakathanahetuko viṣādo vismayo vā hantetyanena prakāśyate /
GK16andhvc3u:3405: yathā vā puṇḍarīkasya mahāśvetāṃ prati pravṛttanirbharānurāgasya dvitīyamunikumāropadeśavarṇane /
GK16andhvc3u:3406: svābhāvikyāmaṅgabhāvaprāptāvadoṣo yathā--- bhramimaratimalasahṛdayatāṃ pralayaṃ mūrcchāṃ tamaḥ śarīrasādam /
GK16andhvc3u:3407: maraṇaṃ ca jaladabhujagajaṃ prasahya kurute viṣaṃ viyoginīnām //
GK16andhvc3u:3411: iyaṃ locanam vitarka autsukyena matiḥ smṛtyā śaṅkā dainyena dhṛtiścintayā ca bādhyate /
GK16andhvc3u:3417: pāṇḍukṣāmaṃ vaktraṃ hadayaṃ sarasaṃ tavālasaṃ ca vapuḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:3419: atra karuṇocito vyādhiḥ śleṣabhaṅgyā sthāpitaḥ kopāditi badhveti hanyata iti ca raudrānubhāvanāṃ rūpakabalādāropitānāṃ tadanirvāhādevāṅgatvam /
GK16andhvc3u:3434: atra karuṇocatavyādheranubhāvānāṃ bhramyādīnāṃ vipralambhe 'pi sambhavānnaisargikī aṅgatā /
GK16andhvc3u:3441: kṣetriyo rogaḥ kṣayaroga iti kecit tam /
GK16andhvc3u:3444: atra karuṇocitavyādheḥ vipralambhe samāropādaṅgatetyāha locane - atretyādi /
GK16andhvc3u:3455: vṛttau aṅgabhāvagamanaṃ yadiyaṃ cāṅgabhāvaprāptiranyā yadādhikārikatvātpradhāna ekasminvākyārthe rasayorbhāvayorvā parasparavirodhinordvayoraṅgabhāvagamanaṃ tasyāmapi na doṣaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:3457: kathaṃ tatrāvirodha iti cet, dvayorapi tayoranyaparatvena vyavasthānāt /
GK16andhvc3u:3458: anyaparatve 'pi virodhinoḥ kathaṃ virodhanivṛttiriti cet, ucyate--
GK16andhvc3u:3470: ayaṃ bhāvaḥ---sāmagrīviśeṣapatitatvena bhāvānāṃ virodhāvirodhau na svabhāvamātranibandhanau śītoṣṇayorapi virodhābhāvāt /
GK16andhvc3u:3472: tadeva kuru mā kārṣīriti bālapriyā cānyā aṅgabhāvaprāptiriti sambandhaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:3489: ayamarthaḥ---padārthānāṃ madhye kasyacitkenacitsaha virodhaścāvirodhaśca svabhāvamātrakṛtau na,
GK16andhvc3u:3491: atra tadvirodho nāma tadasāmānādhikaraṇyaṃ tadutpattipratibandhaśca ghaṭatvādīnāṃ paṭatvādibhiśśītasparśadīnāmuṇṇasparśādibhiśca sahāsāmānādhikaraṇyarūpo virodhaḥ svabhāvakṛtaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:3492: evaṃ teṣāṃ dravyatvādibhiḥ rūpādiguṇaiśca saha sāmānādhikaraṇyarūpāvirodhaśca bodhyaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:3495: vithisthale pravṛttisāmagrīṃ niṣedhasthale nivṛttisāmagrīṃ cādāya tadanupraveśena virodhāvirodhau grāhyāviti /
GK16andhvc3u:3510: ata evātirātre ṣoḍaśinaṃ gṛhṇantīti viruddhavidhirvikalpaparyavasāyīti vākyavidaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:3513: bālapriyā ata eva viruddhāyorekatraikadā prādhānyasya duṣṭatvādeva /
GK16andhvc3u:3515: atirātre atirātrayāge ṣoḍaśinaṃ somapātraviśeṣam gṛhṇanti yathā---- ehi gaccha patottiṣṭha vada maunaṃ samācara /
GK16andhvc3u:3518: atra hi vidhipratiṣedhayoranūdyamānatvena samāveśe na virodhastathehāpi bhaviṣyati /
GK16andhvc3u:3521: locanam krīḍāṅgatve na hyatra viruddhānāmarthānāmabhidhānamiti rājanikaṭavyavasthitātatāyidvayanyāyena viruddhānāmapyanyamukhaprekṣitāparatantrīkṛtānāṃ yena virodhaḥ syāt /
GK16andhvc3u:3522: kevalaṃ viruddhatvādaruṇādhikaraṇasthityā bālapriyā gṛhṇīyuḥ iti ṣoḍaśigrahaṇaṃ vihitam /
GK16andhvc3u:3523: punaśca “nātirātre ṣoḍaśinaṃ gṛhṇātī“tyanena tanniṣiddhañceti yadyapi grahaṇāgrahaṇayorviruddhayorvidhiḥ,
GK16andhvc3u:3524: tathāpi sa vidhiḥ ṣoḍaśinaṃ gṛhṇīyānna gṛhṇīyādvā iti vikalpe paryavasyatītyarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:3532_0: atra ehīti krīḍanti gaccheti krīḍantītyādirītyā bhāvābhāvarūpayorapi gamanāgamanādyoḥ
GK16andhvc3u:3539: rājanikaṭavyavasthitau rājāśrayatvena sthitau yāvātatāthinau mitho vaireṇa vadhodyatau puruṣau tayordveyaṃ tannyāyenetyarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:3542: autena krameṇa ehi gacchetyādiśrutikramema yaḥ svātmanāṃ parāmarśaḥ pratītaḥ tasmin satyapi /
GK16andhvc3u:3547: parasparasya yadrūpaṃ svabhāvaḥ taccintāyāṃ kā kathā taccintā nodetyevetyarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:3552: aruṇayetyādividhivākye kārakāṇāṃ bhāvanānvayaniyamānmitho 'nanvitānāmevāruṇyapiṅgākṣītvādīnāṃ karaṇavibhaktyantapadārthānāṃ somakrayaṇabhāvanāyāṃ karaṇatvenādāvanvayaḥ,
GK16andhvc3u:3553: paścāt parasparānvayaḥ--- na ca raseṣu vidhyanuvādavyavahāro nāstīti śakyaṃ vaktum,
GK16andhvc3u:3555: vākyārthasya vācyasya ca yau vidhyanuvādau tau locanam yo vākyīya eṣāṃ pāścātyaḥ sambandhaḥ sambhāvyate sa vighaṭatām /
GK16andhvc3u:3558: na ca rasasya vācyatvaṃ tvayaiva soḍhamityāśaṅkamānaḥ pariharati---na ceti /
GK16andhvc3u:3559: pradhānāpradhānatvamātrakṛtau vidhyanuvādau, tau ca vyaṅgyatāyāmapi bhavata eveti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:3560: mukhyatayā ca rasa eva kāvyavākyārtha ityuktam /
GK16andhvc3u:3595: dṛśyate viruddhobhayasahakāriṇaḥ kāraṇātkāryaviśeṣotpattiḥ viruddhaphalotpādanahetutvaṃ hi yugapadekasya kāraṇasya viruddhaṃ na tu viruddhobhayasahakāritvam /
GK16andhvc3u:3596: locanam yadi vā mā bhūdanūdyamānatayā viruddhayo rasayoḥ samāveśaḥ,
GK16andhvc3u:3597: sahakāritayā tu bhaviṣyatīti sarvathāviruddhayoryuktiyukto 'ṅgāṅgibhāvo nātra prayāsaḥ kaściditi darśayati--yaivati /
GK16andhvc3u:3599: kāvyārtho vibhāvādirnimittaṃ yeṣāṃ rasādīnāṃ te tathā teṣāṃ bhāvastattā /
GK16andhvc3u:3600_0: anūdyamānā ye hastakṣepādayo rasāṅgabhūtā vibhāvādayastannimittaṃ yadubhayaṃ karuṇavipralambhātmakaṃ
GK16andhvc3u:3601: viruddhaṃ yadubhayaṃ vāritejogataṃ śītoṣṇaṃ tatsahakāri yasya taṇḍulādeḥ kāraṇasya tasmātkāryaviśeṣasya komalabhaktakaraṇalakṣaṇasyotpattirdṛśyate /
GK16andhvc3u:3605: nanvabhineyārthe kāvye yadīdṛśaṃ vākyaṃ bhavettadā bālapriyā anvityādi /
GK16andhvc3u:3609: anūdyamānāṅgetyādikaṃ kṣipta ityādiśloke yojayan vyācaṣṭe---anūdyamānā ityādi /
GK16andhvc3u:3610: hastakṣepādayo vibhāvādaya ityatra yathāsaṃkhyenānvayo na vivakṣitaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:3629_1: yaḥ karuṇo rasaḥ sa parīkṣakāṇāṃ na vaiklavyamādadhāti locanam yadi samastābhinayaḥ
GK16andhvc3u:3629_2: kriyate tadā viruddhārthaviṣayaḥ kathaṃ yugapadabhinayaḥ kartuṃ śakya ityāśayenāśaṅkamāna āha--evamiti /
GK16andhvc3u:3631: anūdyamānamevaṃvidhaṃ viruddhākāraṃ vācyaṃ yatra tādṛśo yo viṣayaḥ 'ehi gaccha patottiṣṭha' ityādistatra yā vārtā sātrāpīti /
GK16andhvc3u:3632: etaduktaṃ bhavati---'kṣipto hastāvalagna' ityādau prādhānyena bhītaviplutādidṛṣṭyupapādanakrameṇa prākariṇakastāvadarthaḥ pradarśayitavyaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:3633: yadyapyatra karuṇo 'pi parāṅgameva tathāpi vipralambhāpekṣayā tasya tāvannikaṭaṃ prākaraṇikatvaṃ maheśvaraprabhāvaṃ prati sopayogatvāt /
GK16andhvc3u:3635: evaṃ ca sāsranetrotpalābhiratyantaṃ prādhānyena karuṇopayogābhinayakrameṇa leśatastu vipralambhasya karuṇena sādṛśyātsūcanāṃ kṛtvā /
GK16andhvc3u:3636_0: kāmīvetyatra yadyapi praṇayakopocito 'bhinayaḥ kṛtastathāpi tataḥ pratīyamāno 'pyasau
GK16andhvc3u:3636_1: vipralambhaḥ samanantarābhinīyamāne sa dahatu duritamityādau sāṭopābhinayasamarpito
GK16andhvc3u:3642: kintu vīrasya yo 'sau krodho vyabhicāratāṃ pratipadyate tatphalarūpo 'sau karuṇarasaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:3662: vaiklavyamityasya pratyuta prītyatiśayanimittatāṃ pratipadyata ityatastasya kuṇṭhaśaktikatvāttadvirodhavidhāyino na kaściddoṣaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:3663: tasmādvākyārthībhūtasya rasasya bhāvasya vā virodhī rasavirodhīti vaktuṃ nyāyyaḥ,
GK16andhvc3u:3665: locanam yathoktam--'raudrasya caiva yatkarma sa jñeyaḥ karuṇo rasaḥ' iti /
GK16andhvc3u:3667: atrodāharaṇam--- kurabaka kucāghātakrīḍāsukhena viyujyase bakulaviṭapin smartavyaṃ te mukhāsavasevanam /
GK16andhvc3u:3668: caraṇaghaṭanāśūnyo yāsyasyaśoka saśokatā- miti nijapuratyāge yasya dviṣāṃ jagaduḥ strayaḥ //
GK16andhvc3u:3670: tasmin rase sthāyinaḥ pradhānabhūtasya vyabhicāriṇo vā yathā vipralambhaśṛṅgāra autsukyasya /
GK16andhvc3u:3674: sa pādāghātādaśokastilakakuravakau vīkṣaṇālaṅganābhyām strīṇāṃ sparśātpriyaṅgurvikasati bakulaśśīdhugaṇḍūṣasekāt //
GK16andhvc3u:3696: aṅgabhūtasya kasyacidrasasya bhāvasya vā virodhī rasavirodhīti vaktuṃ na nyāyya ityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:3697: tathācāṅgabhūtasya kasyacidvirodhī yo lasaḥ tatsambandhiparigraho na doṣa iti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:3699: bhāvasya vetyatra bhāvapadena sthāyī vyabhicārī ca vivakṣita ityāha locane---tasminnityādi /
GK16andhvc3u:3702: athavā vākyārthībhūtasyāpi kasyacitkaruṇarasaviṣayasya tādṛśena śṛṅgāravastunā bhaṅgiviśeṣāśrayeṇa saṃyojanaṃ rasaparipoṣāyaiva jāyate /
GK16andhvc3u:3703: yataḥ prakṛtimadhurāḥ padārthāḥ śocaniyatāṃ prāptāḥ pragavasthābhāvibhiḥ saṃsmaryamāṇairvilāsairadhikataraṃ śokāveśamupajanayanti /
GK16andhvc3u:3704: yathā--- locanam adhunā pūrvasminneva śloke kṣipta ityādau prakārāntareṇa virodhaṃ pariharati---athaveti /
GK16andhvc3u:3706: adhunā tu sa vipralambhaḥ karuṇasyaivāṅgatāṃ pratipannaḥ kathaṃ virodhīti vyavasthāpyate---tathā hi karuṇo raso nāmeṣṭajanavinipātādervibhāvādityuktam /
GK16andhvc3u:3709: śāṃbhavaśaravahniceṣṭitāvalokane prāktanapraṇayakalahavṛttāntaḥ smaryamāṇa idānīṃ vidhvastatayā śokavibhāvatāṃ pratipadyate /
GK16andhvc3u:3712: atha veti ityasya sthāne athavetyādinā doṣābhāva ityanteneti ca pāṭhaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:3716: apiśabdaḥ anantaroktanītyā rasaparapoṣaṇe āpātato virodhaṃ dyotayati 'kasyacidi'ti /
GK16andhvc3u:3728: adhunā tu ityasya iti vyavasthāpyata ityanena sambandhaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:3740: avalokane ityapi pāṭhaḥ, smaryamāṇa ityanenāsya sambandhaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:3746: naṣṭatayetyarthaḥ śokavibhāvatāmityasyānantaraṃ prakṛṣṭāmiti ca kvacit pāṭhaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:3748: tathācātra viśiṣṭavaiśiṣṭyanyāyena vipralambhopaskṛtaḥ karuṇaḥ tripuraripuprabhāvātiśayaṃ ayaṃ sa raśanotkarṣī pīnastanavimardanaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:3751: tadatra tripurayuvatīnāṃ śāmbhavaḥ śarāgnirārdrāparādhaḥ kāmī yathā vyavaharati sama tathā vyavahṛtavānityanenāpi prakāreṇāstyeva nirvirodhatvam /
GK16andhvc3u:3752: tasmādyathā yathā nirūpyate tatā tathātra doṣābhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:3753: ityaṃ ca---- krāmantyaḥ kṣayakomalāṅgulivaladraktaiḥ sadarbhāḥ sthalīḥ pādaiḥ pātitayāvakairiva patadbāṣpāmbudhautānanāḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:3754: bhītā bhartṛkarāvalambitakarāstvadvairinārthādhunā dāvāgniṃ parito bhramanti punarapyudyadvivāhā iva //
GK16andhvc3u:3757: idānīṃ teṣāmekaprabandhaviniveśane nyāyyo yaḥ kramastaṃ pratipādayitumucyate--
GK16andhvc3u:3760: atra bhūriśravasaḥ samarabhuvi nipatitaṃ bāhuṃ dṛṣṭvā tatkāntānāmetadanuśocanam /
GK16andhvc3u:3761: raśanāṃ mekhalāṃ sambhogā vasareṣūrdhvaṃ karṣatīti rasanotkarṣī /
GK16andhvc3u:3762: amunā virodhoddharaṇaprakāreṇa bahutaraṃ lakṣyamupapāditaṃ bhavatītyabhiprāyeṇāha--itthaṃ ceti /
GK16andhvc3u:3769: bālapriyā tadālambitaṃ itibhāvaṃ vā upaskarotīti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:3784: eko raso 'ṅgīkartavyas teṣām utkarṣam icchatā // DhvK_3.21 //
GK16andhvc3u:3788_0: prabandheṣu mahākāvyādiṣu nāṭakādiṣu vā viprakīrṇatayāṅgāṅgibhāvena bahavo rasā upanibadhyanta
GK16andhvc3u:3788_1: ityatra prasiddhau satyāmapi yaḥ prabandhānāṃ chāyātiśayayogamicchati tena teṣāṃ
GK16andhvc3u:3788_2: rasānāmanyatamaḥ kaścidvivakṣito raso 'ṅgitvena viniveśayitavya ityayaṃ yuktataro mārgaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:3789: nanu rasāntareṣu bahuṣu prāptaparipoṣeṣu satsu kathamekasyāṅgitā na virudhyata ityāśaṅkyedamucyate--
GK16andhvc3u:3796: prabandheṣu prathamataraṃ prastutaḥ san punaḥ punaranusandhīyamānatvena sthāyī yo rasastasya sakalabandhavyāpino rasāntarairantarālavartibhiḥ samāveśo yaḥ locanam prasiddhe 'piti /
GK16andhvc3u:3805_0: yadyapi ramavakārādau paryāyabandhādau ca naikasyāṅgitvaṃ tathāpi nāyuktatā tasyāpyevaṃvidho
GK16andhvc3u:3805_1: yaḥ prabandhaḥ tadyathā nāṭakaṃ mahākāvyaṃ vā tadutkṛṣṭataramiti taraśabdasyārthaḥ // 21 //
GK16andhvc3u:3808: alabdhaparipoṣatve vā kathaṃ rasatvamiti rasatvamaṅgatvaṃ cānyonyaviruddhaṃ teṣāṃ cāṅgatvāyoge kathamekasyāṅgitvamuktamiti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:3810: prastutasya samastetivṛttavyāpinastata eva vitatavyāptikatvenāṅgibhāvocitasya bālapriyā krama ityenena teṣāmityasya sambandha ityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:3814: tathāpi ca tasyāpi nāyuktatā iti sambandhaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:3826: kāryam ekaṃ yathā vyāpi prabandhasya vidhīyate /
GK16andhvc3u:3827: tathā rasasyāpi vidhau virodho naiva vidyate // DhvK_3.23 //
GK16andhvc3u:3830: tathā rasasyāpi vidhau virodho naiva vidyate // 23 //
GK16andhvc3u:3831: locanam rasasya rasāntarairitivṛttavaśāyātatvena parimitakathāśakalavyāpibhiryaḥ samāveśaḥ samupabṛṃhaṇaṃ sa tasya sthāyitvenetivṛttavyāpitayā bhāsamānasya nāṅgitāmupahanti,
GK16andhvc3u:3833: etaduktaṃ bhavati---aṅgabhūtānyapi rasāntarāṇi svavibhāvādisāmagnyā svāvasthāyāṃ yadyapi labdhaparipoṣāṇi camatkāragocaratāṃ pratipadyante,
GK16andhvc3u:3834: tathāpi sa camatkārastāvatyeva na parituṣya viśrāmyati kiṃ tu camatkārāntaramanudhāvati /
GK16andhvc3u:3836: yathāha tatrabhavān--- guṇaḥ kṛtātmasaṃskāraḥ pradhānaṃ pratipadyate /
GK16andhvc3u:3847: tathaiva tenaiva prakāreṇa kāryāṅgāṅgibhāvarūpeṇa rasānāmapi balādevāsāvāpatatītyarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:3850: 'svalpamātraṃ samutsṛṣṭaṃ bahudhā yadvisarpati' iti lakṣitaṃ bījam /
GK16andhvc3u:3852: 'kathamekasyāṅgitā na' ityasya sthāne ekasyāṅgiteti pāṭhaśca dṛśyate /
GK16andhvc3u:3858: anyena kṛtātmasaṃskāraḥ san tathā kṛtātmasaṃskāraḥ guṇaḥ pradhānasya aṅginaḥ bhūyasi upakāre vartate bhūyase upakārāya bhavati hi /
GK16andhvc3u:3874: sandhyādimayasya prabandhaśarīrasya yathā kāryamekamanuyāyi vyāpakaṃ kalpyate na ca tatkāryāntarairna saṅkīryate,
GK16andhvc3u:3875: na ca taiḥ saṅkīryamāṇasyāpi tasya prādhānyamapacīyate,
GK16andhvc3u:3876: tathaiva rasasyāpyekasya sanniveśe kriyamāṇe virodho na kaścit /
GK16andhvc3u:3877: pratyuta pratyuditavivekānāmanusandhānavatāṃ sacetasāṃ tathāvidhe viṣaye prahlādātiśayaḥ pravartate /
GK16andhvc3u:3878_0: nanu yeṣāṃ rasānāṃ parasparāvirodhaḥ yathā---vīraśṛṅgārayoḥ śṛṅgārahāsyayo locanam
GK16andhvc3u:3878_1: bājātprabhṛti prayojanānāṃ vicchede yadavicchedakāraṇaṃ yāvatsamāptibandhaṃ sa tu
GK16andhvc3u:3878_2: binduḥ' iti bindurūpayārthaprakṛtyā nirvahaṇaparyantaṃ vyāpnoti tadāha---anuyāyīti /
GK16andhvc3u:3881_1: kāryaṃ yāni ca tato 'pyūnavyāptitayā prakarīlakṣaṇāni kāryāṇi tairityevaṃ pañcānāmarthaprakṛtīnāṃ
GK16andhvc3u:3884: evamanena ślokenāṅgāṅgitāyāṃ dṛṣṭāntanirūpaṇamitivṛttabalāpatitatvaṃ ca rasāṅgāṅgibhāvasyeti dvayaṃ nirūpitam /
GK16andhvc3u:3908: aṅgāṅgitāyāṃ dṛṣṭāntanirūpaṇaṃ rasāṅgāṅgibhāvasya itivṛttabalāpatitatvaṃ ceti dvayamanena ślokena nirūpitamiti sambandhaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:3915: teṣāṃ tu sa kathaṃ bhavedyeṣāṃ parasparaṃ bādhyabādhakabhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:3920: yathāha muniḥ--'vīrasya caiva yatkarma so 'dbhutaḥ' iti /
GK16andhvc3u:3922: raudrakaruṇayorapi muninaivoktaḥ---- 'raudrasyaiva ca yatkarma sa jñeyaḥ karuṇo rasaḥ' iti /
GK16andhvc3u:3926_1: ca ratiruttiṣṭhati tataḥ palāyamānarūpatayā jugupseti samānāśrayatvena tayoranyonyasaṃskāronmūlanatvam /
GK16andhvc3u:3928: śāntasyāpi tattvajñānasamutthitasamastasaṃsāraviṣayanirvedaprāṇatvena sarvato nirīhasvabhāvasya viṣayāsaktijīvitābhyāṃ ratikrodhābhyāṃ virodha eva // 23 //
GK16andhvc3u:3964: paripoṣaṃ na netavyas tathā syād avirodhitā // DhvK_3.24 //
GK16andhvc3u:3968: aṅgini rasāntare śṛṅgārādau prabandhavyaṅgye sati avirodhī virodhī vā rasaḥ paripoṣaṃna netavyaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:3969: tatrāvirodhino rasasyāṅgirasāpekṣayātyantamādhikyaṃ na kartavyamityayaṃ prathamaḥ paripoṣaparihāraḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:3972: vāgrahaṇasyāyamabhiprāyaḥ---aṅgirasāpekṣayā yasya rasāntarasyotkarṣo nibadhyate tadā tadaviruddho 'pi raso nibaddhaścodyāvahaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:3973: atha tu yuktyā ṅgini raso 'ṅgabhāvatānayenopapattirghaṭate tadviruddho 'pi raso vakṣyamāṇena viṣayabhedādiyojanenopanibadhyamāno na doṣāvaha iti virodhāvirodhāvakiñcitkarau /
GK16andhvc3u:3976: aṅginaṃ rasaviśeṣamanādṛtya paripoṣaparihāre trīn prakārānāha--tatretyādinā tṛtīya ityantena /
GK16andhvc3u:3977: nanu nyūnatvaṃ kartavyamiti vācye ādhikyasya kā sambhāvanā yenoktamādhikyaṃna kartavyamityāśaṅkyāha--utkarṣasāmya iti /
GK16andhvc3u:3979: snehena raṇarasena ca bhaṭasya dolāyitaṃ hṛdayam //
GK16andhvc3u:3997: tatrāvirodhino rasasyāṅgirasāpekṣayā nyūnatvaṃ kartavyamiti vaktavye satītyarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:4009: tasyāṃ yā abhyasūyā tayā hetunā hasitaḥ paśupattiḥ sandhyāṃ sevamānaḥ parameśvaro yayā sā /
GK16andhvc3u:4014: ṇeheṇa raṇaraseṇa a bhaḍassa dolāiaṃ hiaam //
GK16andhvc3u:4015: yathā vā-- kaṇṭhācchittvākṣamālāvalayamiva kare hāramāvartayantī kṛtvā paryaṅkabandhaṃ viṣadharapatinā mekhalāyā guṇena /
GK16andhvc3u:4024: etacca muktakaviṣayameva bhavati na tu prabandhaviṣayamiti kecidāhustaccāsat ;
GK16andhvc3u:4026: tathāhi---ratnāvalyāṃ sacivāyattasiddhitvābhiprāyeṇa pṛthivīrājyalābha ādhikārikaṃ phalaṃ kanyāratnalābhaḥ prāsaṅgikaṃ phalaṃ,
GK16andhvc3u:4027: nāyakabhiprāyeṇa tu viparyaya iti sthite mantribuddhau nāyakabuddhau ca svāmyamātyabuddhyekatvātphalamiti nītyā ekīkriyamāṇāyāṃ samaprādhānyameva paryavasyati /
GK16andhvc3u:4038: atra prakṛto raso vīraḥ bhaṭasyetyuktabalādgamyaḥ samaprādhānyena varṇitastadavirodhī śṛṅgāraḥ,
GK16andhvc3u:4039: kaṇṭhādityādau tu prakṛto raso vipralambhaḥ tadavirodhīhāsyassamaprādhānyena darśitaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:4045: trivargarūpaṃ yat phalaṃ tasya samaprādhānyaṃ yattasyetyarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:4051: aṅgatvena punaḥ punaḥ pratyavekṣā paripoṣaṃ nīyamānasyāpyaṅgabhūtasya rasasyeti tṛtīyaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:4054: yathā śānte 'ṅgini śṛṅgārasya śṛṅgāre vā śāntasya /
GK16andhvc3u:4056: aṅgino hi rasasya locanam rasa iti śeṣaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:4057: nanvevaṃ nāsau parituṣṭo bhavedityāśaṅkya matāntaramāha--niveśane veti /
GK16andhvc3u:4058: ata eva vāgrahaṇamuttarapakṣadārḍhyaṃ sūcayati na vikalpam /
GK16andhvc3u:4062_0: yathā---'kopātkomalalola' iti śloke 'ṅgibhūtāyāṃ ratāvaṅgatvena yaḥ krodha upanibaddhastatra
GK16andhvc3u:4062_1: baddhvā dṛḍhaṃ ityamarṣasya niveśitasya kṣiprameva rudatyeti hasanniti ca ratyuciterṣyautsukyaharṣānusandhānam /
GK16andhvc3u:4064: atra ca tāpasavatsarāje vatsarājasya pajhavatīviṣayaḥ sambhogaśṛṅgāra udāharaṇokartavyaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:4066: vibhāvānubhāvānāṃ cāpi utkarṣo na kartavyo 'ṅgirasavirodhināṃ niveśanameva vā na kāryam,
GK16andhvc3u:4068: paripoṣitā api viruddharasavibhāvānubhāvā aṅgatvaṃ pratijāgarayitavyā ityādi /
GK16andhvc3u:4070: evaṃ virodhyavirodhisādhāraṇaṃ prakāramabhidhāya virodhiviṣayā sādhāraṇadoṣaparihāraprakāragatatvenaiva viśeṣāntaramapyāha---virodhina bālapriyā ratāvaṅgatveneti /
GK16andhvc3u:4085: aṅgirasasya ye vibhāvānu bhāvāḥ tadekarūpaṃ sat tadekarūpatāṃ sampādyetyarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:4087: aṅgatvaṃ pratijāgarayitavyāḥ aṅgatāṃ netavyāḥ virodhyavirodhisādhāraṇaṃ prakāramiti /
GK16andhvc3u:4090: virodhiviṣayaḥ asādhāraṇaśca yo doṣaparihāraprakāraḥ tadgatatvena tatsambandhitvenetyarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:4094: bahuraseṣu prabandheṣvekasya rasasya āpekṣikametatprakarṣa yogitvamaśakyapratikṣepamiti sambandhaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:4100_1: prakāreṇāvirodhināṃ virodhināṃ ca rasānāmaṅgāṅgibhāvena samāveśeprabandheṣu syādavirodhaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:4101: etacca sarvaṃ yeṣāṃ raso rasāntarasa vyabhicārībhavati iti darśanaṃ locanam iti /
GK16andhvc3u:4105: upakāryopakārakabhāvo rasānāṃ nāsti svacamatkāraviśrāntatvāt ; anyathā rasatvāyogāt,
GK16andhvc3u:4106_0: tadabhāve ca kathamaṅgāṅgitetyapi yeṣāṃ mataṃ tairapi kasyacidrasasya prakṛṣṭatvaṃ
GK16andhvc3u:4107: bhūyaḥ prabandhavyāpakasya ca rasasya rasāntarairyadi na kācitsaṅgatistaditivṛttasyāpi na syātsaṅgatiścedayamevopakāryopakārakabhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:4108: na ca catmakāraviśrāntervirodhaḥ kaściditi samanantaramevoktaṃ tadāha--anabhyupagacchatāpīti /
GK16andhvc3u:4111: anyastu vyācaṣṭe--etaccāpekṣikamityādigrantho dvitīyamatamabhipretya yatra rasānāmupakāryopakārakatā nāsti,
GK16andhvc3u:4113: etaccāsat; evaṃ hi etacca sarvamiti sarvaśabdena ya upasaṃhāra ekapakṣaviṣayaḥ bālapriyā ityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:4154: etatpakṣaviṣaya locanam matāntare 'pītyādinā ca yo dvitīyapakṣopakramaḥ so 'tīva duḥśliṣṭa ityalaṃ pūrvavaṃśyaiḥ saha bahunā saṃlāpena /
GK16andhvc3u:4156: bhāvādhyāyasamāptāvasti ślokaḥ--- bahūnāṃ samavetānāṃ rūpaṃ yasya bhavedbahu /
GK16andhvc3u:4157: sa mantavyo rasasthāyī śeṣāḥ sañcāriṇo matāḥ //
GK16andhvc3u:4159_1: tu vyabhicāritayeti rasyamānatāsamaye sthāyivyabhicāribhāvasya na kaścidvirodha iti kecidvyācacakṣire /
GK16andhvc3u:4161: anye tu sthāyitayā paṭhitasyāpi rasasya rasāntare vyabhicāritvamasti,
GK16andhvc3u:4162: yathā krodhasya vīre vyabhicāritayā paṭhitasyāpi sthāyitvameva rasāntare,
GK16andhvc3u:4164: vyabhicāriṇo vā sata eva vyabhicāryantarāpekṣyā sthāyitvameva,
GK16andhvc3u:4165: yathā vikramorvaśyāmunmādasya caturthe 'ṅke itīyantamarthamavabodhayitumayaṃ ślokaḥ bahunāṃ cittavṛttirūpāṇāṃ bhāvānāṃ madhye yasya bahulaṃ rūpaṃ yathopalabhyate sa sthāyī bhāvaḥ,
GK16andhvc3u:4166: sa ca raso sasīkaraṇayogyaḥ; śeṣāstu sañcāriṇa iti vyācakṣate,
GK16andhvc3u:4168: ata evānye rasasthāyīti ṣaṣṭhyā saptamyā dvitīyayā vāśritādiṣu bālapriyā iti ca pāṭhaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:4173: madhye yasya bhāvasya, rūpaṃ bahu bhūyaḥ prabandhavyāpakaṃ bhavet /
GK16andhvc3u:4177: saḥ sthāyī raso mantavya iti yojanā /
GK16andhvc3u:4181: tatroktakrameṇa tasmin śloke ukto yaḥ kramastena /
GK16andhvc3u:4189: atra vīra ityantamekaṃ vākyaṃ, śānta ityantaṃ dvitīyaṃ, caturthe 'ṅka ityantaṃ tṛtīyaṃ bodhyam /
GK16andhvc3u:4193: saḥ sthāyī rasaśca mantavya iti yojanā /
GK16andhvc3u:4203: rasasya rase rasaṃ sthāyīti vigraha iti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:4205: matāntare tu rasānāṃ sthāyino bhāvā upacārādrasaśabdenoktāsteṣāmaṅgatvaṃ nirvirodhameva /
GK16andhvc3u:4206: evamavirodhināṃ virodhināṃ ca prabandhasthenāṅginā rasena samāveśe sādhāraṇamavirodhopāyaṃ pratipādyedānīṃ virodhiviṣayameva taṃ pratipādayitumidamucyate /
GK16andhvc3u:4208: viruddhaikāśrayo yas tu virodhī sthāyino bhavet /
GK16andhvc3u:4209: sa vibhinnāśrayaḥ kāryas tasya poṣe 'py adoṣatā // DhvK_3.25 //
GK16andhvc3u:4215: tatra prabandhasthena sthāyināṅginā rasenaucityāpekṣayā viruddhaikāśrayo yo virodhī yathā vīreṇa bhayānakaḥ sa vibhinnāśrayaḥ kāryaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:4216: tasya vīrasya ya āśrayaḥ kathānāyakastadvipakṣaviṣaye sanniveśayitavyaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:4217: tathā sati ca tasya virodhino 'pi yaḥ paripoṣaḥ sa nirdeṣaḥ vipakṣaviṣaye hi bhayātiśayavarṇane locanam gamigāmyādīnāmiti samāsaṃ paṭhanti /
GK16andhvc3u:4225: yastu sthāyīṃ sthāyyantareṇāsaṃbhāvyamānaikāśrayatvādvirodhī bhavedyathotsāhena bhayaṃ sa vibhinnāśrayatvena nāyakavipakṣādigāmitvena kāryaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:4227: tasya virodhino 'pi tathākṛtasya tathānibaddhasya bālapriyā āśritādiṣu gamyādīnāmiti /
GK16andhvc3u:4247: evamaikādhikaraṇyavirodhinaḥ prabandhasthena sathāyinā rasenāṅgabhāvagamane nirvirodhitvaṃ yathā tathā taddarśitam /

GK16andhvc3u:4810_2: pravṛttimān guḍajihvikayā prasaktānuprasaktavastutattvasaṃvedanena vairāgye paryavasyati vineyaḥ // 3.0 //
GK16andhvc3u:4812: rasādiṣu rasādiviṣaye vyañjakāni yāni vācyāni vibhāvādīni vācakāni ca suptiṅādīni teṣāṃ yannirūpaṇaṃ tasyeti /
GK16andhvc3u:4826: sambhāvyamānena nāyakavibhāvatvena nāyikānubhāvatvena ca hetunā śṛṅgārāṅgasyetyarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:4832: tathā ca yayā kayāpi vidhayā śṛṅgārāṅgayojanaṃ kāvyaśobhākaramiti bhāvaḥ // 3.0 //
GK16andhvc3u:4835: 'vyañjakavācye'tyādigranthaṃ vācyānāmitivṛttaviśeṣāṇāṃ vācakānāṃ ca tadviṣayāṇāṃ rasādiviṣayeṇaucityena yadyojanametanmahākaverbhukhyaṃ karma /
GK16andhvc3u:4836: ayameva hi mahākavermukhyo vyāpāro yadrasādīneva mukhyatayā kāvyārthīkṛtya tadyvaktyanuguṇatvena śabdānāmarthānāṃ copanibandhanam /
GK16andhvc3u:4837: etacca rasāditātparyeṇa kāvyanibandhanaṃ bharatādāvapi suprasiddhameveti pratipādayitumāha--
GK16andhvc3u:4840: aucityavānyastā etā vṛttayo dvividhāḥ sthitāḥ // DhvK_3.33 //
GK16andhvc3u:4845: tatra rasānuguṇa aucityavānvācyāśrayo yo vyavahārastā etāḥ kaiśikyādyā vṛttayaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:4847: vṛttayo hi rasāditātparyeṇa saṃniveśitāḥ kāmapināṭyasya kāvyasya ca cchāyāmāvahanti /
GK16andhvc3u:4866: 'vṛttayaḥ kāvyamātṛkāḥ' iti bruvāṇena muninā rasocitetivṛttasamāśrayaṇopadeśena rasasyaivajīvitatvamuktam /
GK16andhvc3u:4871: ālokārthītyādikārikayā prathamodyote yaduktaṃ tadevānayā kārikayā upasaṃhṛtamityarthaḥ // 3.2 //
GK16andhvc3u:4872: atra kecidāhuḥ--'guṇaguṇivyavahāro rasādīnāmitivṛttādibhiḥ saha yuktaḥ, na tu jīvaśarīravyavahāraḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:4873: rasādimayaṃ hi vācyaṃ pratibhāsate na tu rasādibhiḥ pṛthagbhūtam' iti /
GK16andhvc3u:4874: atrocyate--yadi rasādimayameva vāyyaṃ yathā gauratvamayaṃ śarīram /
GK16andhvc3u:4875: evaṃ sati yathā śarīre pratibhāsamāne niyamenaiva gauratvaṃ pratibhāsate sarvasya tathā vācyena sahaiva rasādayo 'pi sahṛdayasyāsahṛdayasya ca pratibhāseran /
GK16andhvc3u:4877: locanam ityādinā rasopayogajīvitaḥ śabdavṛttilakṣaṇo vyavahāra uktaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:4887: bālapriyā kārikāyāmarthaśabdayoḥ rasādyanuguṇatvena aucityavān vyavahāro yaḥ,
GK16andhvc3u:4890: rasopayoga eva jīvitaṃ yasya sa ityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:4895: atra guṇasthānīyo rasādiḥ guṇisthānīya itivṛttādirūpo vācyārthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:4910: yadi rasādimayo vācyārthastarhi sa niyamato rasādibhiḥ sahaiva sarvaiḥ pratīyamānassyādityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:4915: ratnānāmiva jātyatvaṃ pratipattṛviśeṣataḥ saṃvedyaṃ vācyanāṃ rasādirūpatvamiti /
GK16andhvc3u:4917: yato yathā jātyatvena pratibhāsamāne ratne ratnasvarūpānatiriktatvameva tasya lakṣyate tathā rasādīnāmapi vibhāvānubhāvādirūpavācyāvyatiriktatvameva lakṣyeta /
GK16andhvc3u:4919: locanam nanu yadyasya dharmarūpaṃ tattatpratibhāne sarvasya niyamena bhātītyanaikāntikametat /
GK16andhvc3u:4920: māṇikyadharmo hi jātyatvalakṣaṇo viśeṣo na tatpratibhāse 'pi sarvasya niyamena bhātītyāśaṅkate---syāditi /
GK16andhvc3u:4922: etaduktaṃ bhavati---atyantonmagnasvabhāvatve sati taddharmatvāditi viśeṣaṇamasmābhiḥ kṛtam /
GK16andhvc3u:4934: tatpratibhāne śarīrādipratibhāse ityetaditi sambandhaḥ iti niyama ityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:4935: yatra yatra yaddharmatvaṃ tatra pratyakṣīyatadviṣayitāvyāpakaviṣayitākatvamiti vyāptiriti yāvat /
GK16andhvc3u:4941: tathā ca māṇikyadharme jātyatve vyabhicāra iti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:4954: yata ityādi na caivamityantasya parihāragranthasya bhāvamāha locane--etaduktamityādi /
GK16andhvc3u:4963: yatra yatra taddharmatvabhityatra atyantonmagnasvabhāvatve satītyapi niviṣṭamastītyarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:4965: unmagnarūpatā yathārūpasya gauratvāderasti tathā jātyatvasya netyarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:4970: na hi vibhāvānubhāvavyabhicāriṇa eva rasā iti kasyācidavagamaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:4971: ata eva ca vibhāvādipratītyavinābhāvinī rasādīnāṃ pratītiriti tatpratītyoḥ kāryakāraṇabhāvena vyavasthānātkramo 'vaśyambhāvī /
GK16andhvc3u:4972: sa tu lāghavānna prakāśyate 'ityalakṣyakramā eva santo vyaṅgyā rasādayaḥ' ityuktam /
GK16andhvc3u:4973: locanam vācyānāṃ dharmāstathāsati dvau pakṣau rūpādisadṛśā vā syurmāṇikyagatajātyatvasadṛśā vā /
GK16andhvc3u:4974: na tāvatprathamaḥ pakṣaḥ, sarvān prati tathānavabhāsāt /
GK16andhvc3u:4976: eṣa ca heturādye 'pi pakṣe saṅgacchata eva /
GK16andhvc3u:4981: yataśca tatpratītau vācyapratītiḥ sarvathānupayoginī tata eva hetoḥ krameṇāvaśyaṃ bhāvyaṃ,
GK16andhvc3u:4983: sa tu sahṛdayabhāvanābhyāsānna lakṣyate anyathā tu lakṣyetāpītyuktaṃ prāk /
GK16andhvc3u:4986: nanu bhavantu vācyādatiriktā rasādayastatrāpi kramo na lakṣyata iti tāvattvayaivoktam /
GK16andhvc3u:4998: vṛttāvata evetyeko hetuḥ vyavasthānādityaparaścetyāśayena vyācaṣṭe--yato netyādi /
GK16andhvc3u:5023: nanu śabda eva prakāraṇādyavacchinno vācyavyaṅgyayoḥ samameva pratītimupajanayatīti kiṃ tatra kramakalpanayā /
GK16andhvc3u:5024: na ha śabdasya vācyapratītiparāmarśa eva vyañjakatve nibandhanam /
GK16andhvc3u:5028: kiṃ tu tadyvañjakatvaṃ teṣāṃ kadācitsvarūpaviśeṣanibandhanaṃ kadācidvācakaśaktinibandhanam /
GK16andhvc3u:5029: tatra yeṣāṃ vācakaśaktinibandhanaṃ teṣāṃ yadi vācyapratītimantareṇaiva svarūpapratītyā niṣpannaṃ tadbhavenna tarhi vācakaśaktinibandhanam /
GK16andhvc3u:5031: tataścaikayaiva sāmagnyā sahaiva vācyaṃ vyaṅgyābhimataṃ ca rasādi bhātīti vacanavyañjanavyāpāradvayena na kiñcinditi tadāha--nanviti /
GK16andhvc3u:5032: yatrāpi gītaśabdānāmartho 'sti tatrāpi tatpratītiranupayoginī grāmarāgānusāreṇāpahastitavācyānusāratayā rasodayadarśanāt /
GK16andhvc3u:5033: na cāpi sā sarvatra bhavantī dṛśyate, tadetadāha---na ceti /
GK16andhvc3u:5049: apahastitaḥ anādṛtaḥ vācyānusāraḥ vācyarthapratītyanusaraṇaṃ yena rasodayena tasya bhāvastattā tayā /
GK16andhvc3u:5060: vācakaśaktirabhidhā saiva nibandhanaṃ prayojakaṃ yasya tat /
GK16andhvc3u:5069: na caivaṃ evaṃ na bhavati ca /
GK16andhvc3u:5074: sa tu kramo yadi lāghavānna lakṣyate tatkiṃ kriyate /
GK16andhvc3u:5078: astu śabdādeva tatpratītistathāpi tena svavācakaśaktistasyāṃ kartavyāyāṃ sahakāritayāvaśyāpekṣaṇīyetyāyātaṃ vācyapratīteḥ pūrvabhāvitvamiti /
GK16andhvc3u:5080: yattukvacacchrute 'pi kāvyerasapratītirna bhavati tatrocitaḥ prakaraṇāvagamādiḥ sahakārī nāstītyāśaṅkyāha--yadi ceti /
GK16andhvc3u:5081: prakaraṇāvagamo hi ka ucyate? kiṃ vākyāntarasahāyatvam? atha vākyāntarāṇāṃ sambandhivācyam /
GK16andhvc3u:5112: nanvevaṃ yatra śabdaḥ śruto 'rtho nādhigataśca tatra rasapratītiḥ syādityata āha--yattvityādi /
GK16andhvc3u:5126: vākyāntaraṃ sahāyaḥ sahakāri yasya tattvaṃ sahakāri vāntaramityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:5128: sahabhāve ca vācyapratīteranupayogaḥ, upayoge vā na sahabhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:5129: yeṣāmapi svarūpaviśeṣapratītinimittaṃ vyañjakatvaṃ yathā gītādiśabdānāṃ teṣāmapi svarūpapratītervyaṅgyapratīteśca niyamabhāvī locanam svayamiti /
GK16andhvc3u:5131: na cānvayavyatirekavatīṃ vācyapratītimapahnutyādṛṣṭasadbhāvābhāvau śaraṇatvenāśritau mātsaryādadhikaṃ kiñcitpuṣṇīta ityabhiprāyaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:5134: evaṃ hyupayoga iti anupakārake sañjñākaraṇamātraṃ vastuśūnyaṃ syāditi bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:5136: taddṛṣṭāntenaiva vayaṃ vācyapratīterapi pūrvabhāvitāṃ samarthayiṣyāma iti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:5151: nanu vākyena rasādipratītau kartavyāyāmadṛṣṭaviśeṣo 'pi sahakārī tadabhāvādeva vācyapratītivirahakāle rasāderapratītiriti śaṅkāṃ pariharati--na cetyādi /
GK16andhvc3u:5179: tattu śabdasya kriyāpaurvāparyamananyasādhyatatphalaghaṭanāsvāśubhāvanīṣu vācyenāvirodhinyabhidheyāntaravilakṣaṇe rasādau na pratīyate /
GK16andhvc3u:5180: locanam nanu saṃścetkramaḥ kiṃ na lakṣyata ityāśaṅkyāha--tattviti /
GK16andhvc3u:5182: kriye vācyavyaṅgyapratīti yadi vābhidhāvyāpāro vyañjanāparaparyāyo dhvananavyāpāraśceti kriye tayoḥ paurvāparyaṃ na pratīyate /
GK16andhvc3u:5186: tathā vācyenāvirodhini, virodhini tu lakṣyata evetyarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:5187: kuto na lakṣyate iti nimittasaptamīnirdiṣṭaṃ hetvantaragarbhaṃ hetumāha--āśubhāvinīṣviti /
GK16andhvc3u:5188: ananyasādhyatatphalaghaṭanāsu ghaṭanāḥ pūrvaṃ mādhuryādilakṣaṇāḥ pratipāditā guṇānirūpaṇāvasare tāśca tatphalāḥ rasādipratītiḥ phalaṃ yāsām,
GK16andhvc3u:5191: etaduktaṃ bhavati---yato guṇavati kāvye 'saṅkīrṇaviṣayatayā saṅghaṭanā prayuktā tataḥ kramo na lakṣyate /
GK16andhvc3u:5193: kramastu kiṃ na lakṣyate ata āha--āśubhāvinīṣu vācyapratītikālapratīkṣaṇena vinaiva jhaṭityeva tā rasādīn bhāvayanti bālapriyā śabdajanyakriyetyarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:5223: ojoghaṭanayā karuṇādipratītirna hi sādhyetyanvayaḥ kintu vīrādipratītireveti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:5230_1: eva yata āsūtrito rasāsvādastena vācyapratītyuttarakālabhavena parisphuṭāsvādayukto
GK16andhvc3u:5231: abhyaste hi viṣaye 'vinābhāvapratītikrama itthameva na lakṣyate /
GK16andhvc3u:5232_0: abhyāso hyayameva yatpraṇidhānādināpi vinaiva saṃskārasya balavattvātsadaiva prabubhutsutayā
GK16andhvc3u:5233: jhaṭityutpannehi dhūmajñāne tadvyāptismṛtyupakṛte tadvijātīyapraṇidhānānusaraṇādipratītyantarānupraveśavirahādāśubhāvinyāmagnipratītau bālapriyā ghaṭanā ityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:5235: tattvityādigranthena labdhaṃ kramastu kinna lakṣyata iti codyasyottaraṃ vivṛṇoti---etadityādi /
GK16andhvc3u:5244: vācyapratītyuttarakāle yo bhavaḥ jananaṃ tena hetunā yaḥ parisphuṭāsvādaḥ tena yukto 'pi viśiṣṭo 'pi;
GK16andhvc3u:5261: abhyasta ityādinā samānyata uktaṃ viśiṣya darśayati--evamityādi /
GK16andhvc3u:5276: tābhyāṃ dhūmajñānavyāptismṛtibhyāṃ vijātīyaṃ yat praṇidhānānukaraṇādinā praṇidhānakaraṇādinā pratītyantaramālocanarūpaṃ kvacittu lakṣyata eva /
GK16andhvc3u:5281: tathāvidhe ca viṣaye vācyavyaṅgyeyoratyantavilakṣaṇatvādyaiva ekasya pratītiḥ saivetarasyeti na śakyate vaktum /
GK16andhvc3u:5282: śabdaśaktimūlānuraṇanarūpavyaṅgye tu dhvanau--- gāvo vaḥ pāvanānāṃ paramaparimitāṃ prītimutpādayantu locanam kramo na lakṣyate tadvadihāpi /
GK16andhvc3u:5283: yadi tu vācyāvirodhī raso na syāducitā ca ghaṭanā na bhavettallakṣyetaiva krama iti /
GK16andhvc3u:5284_0: candrikākārastu paṭhitamanupaṭhatīti nyāyena gajanimīlikayā vyācacakṣe--tasya śabdasya
GK16andhvc3u:5284_1: phalaṃ tadvā phalaṃ vācyavyaṅgyapratītyātmakaṃ tasya ghaṭanā niṣpādanā yato 'nanyasādhyā
GK16andhvc3u:5285: na cātrārthasatattvaṃ vyākhyāne kiñcidutpaśmāma ityalaṃ pūrvavaṃśyaiḥ saha vivādena bahunā /
GK16andhvc3u:5286: yatra tu saṅghaṭanāvyaṅgyatve nāsti tatra lakṣyata evetyāha--kvacittviti /
GK16andhvc3u:5291: iti hi pūrvaṃ varṇasaṅghaṭanādikaṃ nāsya vyañjakatvenoktamiti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:5305: iti hi pūrvamuktaṃ varṇasaṅghaṭanādikamasya vyañjakatvena noktamiti sambandhaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:5321: kūpa iti ca ahamiti cobhayasamānādhikaraṇatayā saṃvalanam /
GK16andhvc3u:5334: abhidheyasya vyaṅgyālaṅkārasya ca ye pratītī tayorityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:5352: abhidheyaṃ ca tatsāmarthyākṣiptālaṅkāraśca tāveva tanmātre iti ca vṛttyartho bodhyaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:5356: ārthyapi ca pratipattisyathāvide viṣaye ubhayārthasambandhayogyaśabdasāmarthyaprasāviteti śabdaśaktimūlā kalpyate /
GK16andhvc3u:5358: tatrāvivakṣitavācyatvādeva vācyeva saha vyaṅgyasya kramapratītivicāro na kṛtaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:5359: tasmādabhidhānābhidheyapratītyoriva locanam nanvevamārthatvaṃ śabdaśaktimūlatvaṃ ceti viruddhamityāśaṅkyāha---ārthyapīti /
GK16andhvc3u:5361: etacca vitatya pūrvameva nirṇītamiti na punarucyate /
GK16andhvc3u:5363: andhaśabdāderupahatacakṣuṣkādiḥ svo viṣayaḥ, tatra yadvaimukhyamanādara ityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:5367_2: tatprasaṅgena rasādīnāṃ vācyātiriktatvaṃ samarthayituṃ kramo vicārita ityetadupasaṃharati--tasmāditi /
GK16andhvc3u:5375: evaṃ vivakṣitānyaparavācye vyaṅgyavyañjakayoḥ kramaṃ pratipādya sarvatrāpi vyaṅgyavyañjakayoḥ kramo 'stīti darśayitumāha--vṛttau 'avivakṣite'tyādi /
GK16andhvc3u:5387: krameṇa yā pratītiḥ tadvicāraḥ vācyārthavyaṅgyārthapratītyoḥkramasya vicāra ityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:5392: nanu rasādeḥ vṛttijīvitatvamupakrāntaṃ vācyavyaṅgyapratītikramaśca tasmādityādinā upasaṃhṛtaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:5401: tadevaṃ vyañjakamukhena dhvaniprakāreṣu nirūpiteṣu kaścidbrūyāt---kimidaṃ vyañjakatvaṃ nāma vyaṅgyārthaprakāśanam,
GK16andhvc3u:5402: na hi vyañjakatvaṃ vyaṅgyatvaṃ cārthasya vyañjakasidydhadhīnaṃ vyaṅgyatvam,
GK16andhvc3u:5404: nanu vācyavyatiriktasya vyaṅgyasya locanam śabdarūpasya pūrvaṃ pratītistato 'bhidheyasya /
GK16andhvc3u:5405: yadāha tatra bhavān--- 'viṣayatvamanāpannaiḥ śabdairnārthaḥ prakāśyate' ityādi /
GK16andhvc3u:5407_0: udyotārambhe yaduktaṃ vyañjanamukhena dhvaneḥ svarūpaṃ pratipādyata iti tadidānīmupasaṃharanvyañjakabhāvaṃ
GK16andhvc3u:5407_1: prathamodyote samarthitamapi śiṣyāṇāmekapraghaṭṭakena hṛdi niveśayituṃ pūrvapakṣamāha--tadevamiti /
GK16andhvc3u:5412: bālapriyā vṛttyuktānumāne dṛṣṭāntasya sādhanavaikalyaśaṅkāṃ parihartuṃ vyācaṣṭe--abhidhānasyetyādi /
GK16andhvc3u:5419: ityādītyādipadena sūciteṣu kiñcit padyārddhamapi darśayati---ata ityādi /
GK16andhvc3u:5433: kaścidityādinā vyañjakatvanirūpaṇaṃ punaruktaṃ cetyatastatphalaṃ darśayannavatārayati---udyotārambha ityādinā /
GK16andhvc3u:5435: kimidamityatra kiṃśabdaḥ ākṣepe praśne vā, tatra heturnokta ityata āha--vakṣyamāṇa iti /
GK16andhvc3u:5443: śabdasya siddhiḥ prāgeva pratipāditā tatsadydhadhīnā ca vyañjakasiddhiriti kaḥ paryanuyogāvasaraḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:5452: astvasau dvitīyo 'rthaḥ, tasya yadi vyaṅya iti nāma kṛtam, vācya ityapi kasmānna kriyate?
GK16andhvc3u:5453: vyaṅgya iti vā vācyābhimatasyāpi kasmānna kriyate?
GK16andhvc3u:5455: abhidhā bālapriyā vyañjakatvamarthasya vyaṅgyatvaṃ ca 'na hi'svato na bhavati hi /
GK16andhvc3u:5466: tathā ca yato 'rthasya vyaṅgyatvamato vyañjakatvaṃ śabdasyaiva tacca vyaṅgyārthaprakāśanaṃ na hīti sambandhaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:5468: vyañjakatvasiddhyadhīnamityasyānantaraṃ vyaṅgyatvamiti pāṭhābhāve tvevaṃ yojanā--vyañjakatvaṃ vyaṅgyārthaprakāśanaṃ na hi /
GK16andhvc3u:5471: vismaraṇamāśaṅkya tatratyaṃ prāgiti padaṃ vyācaṣṭe locane---prathametyādi /
GK16andhvc3u:5478: 'satyam' ityādinā siddhāntyuktamanūdya pūrvapakṣī 'sa tvi'tyādinā dūṣaṇamabhihitavāṃstaṃ granthaṃ vyācaṣṭe--astvasāvityādinā /
GK16andhvc3u:5479: sa tvartha ityasya vyākhyānam--asau dvitīyo 'rtha iti /
GK16andhvc3u:5494: yo 'rthaḥ paryanto yasyāḥ tatra vācyatayaivāsau vyapadeṣṭuṃ yuktaḥ, tatparatvādvākyasya /
GK16andhvc3u:5496: kiṃ tasya vyāpārāntarakalpanayā? tasmāttātparyaviṣayo yo 'rthaḥ sa tāvanmukhyatayā vācyaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:5497: yā tvantarā tathāvidhe viṣaye vācyāntarapratītiḥ sā tatpratīterupāyamātraṃ padārthapratītiriva vākyārthapratīteḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:5499: tatparyantatā ca pradhānībhūte tasminnartha iti mūrdhābhiṣiktaṃ dhvaneryadrūpaṃ nirūpitaṃ,
GK16andhvc3u:5504: upāyamātramityanena sādhāraṇyoktyā bhāṭṭaṃ prābhākaraṃ vaiyākaraṇaṃ ca pūrvapakṣaṃ sūcayati /
GK16andhvc3u:5505: bhāṭṭamate hi--- vākyārthamitaye teṣāṃ pravṛttau nāntarīyakam /
GK16andhvc3u:5509: nanvastu paryantībhūtārthaṃ prati vācakatvaṃ, tataḥ kimata āha--tatparyantatyādi /
GK16andhvc3u:5510: tatparyantatā tāmabhidhāṃ prati paryantatā avadhitā tātparyaviṣayateti yāvat /
GK16andhvc3u:5534: teṣāṃ padānāṃ vākyajananadvāreṇa vākyārthamitaye eva pravṛttiḥ,
GK16andhvc3u:5536: yathānnapākārthaṃ atrocyate---yatra śabdaḥ svārthamabhidadhāno 'rthāntaramavagamayati tatra yattasya svārthābhidhāyitvaṃ yacca tadarthāntarāvagamahetutvaṃ tayoraviśeṣo viśeṣo vā /
GK16andhvc3u:5537: na tāvadaviśeṣaḥ; yasmāttau dvau vyāpārau bhinnaviṣayau bhinnarūpau ca pratīyete eva /
GK16andhvc3u:5538: tathāhi vācakatvalakṣaṇo vyāpāraḥ śabdasya svārthaviṣayaḥ gamakatvalakṣaṇastvarthāntaraviṣayaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:5539: locanam iti śabdāvagataiḥ padārthaistātparyeṇa yo 'rtha utthāpyate sa eva vākyārthaḥ,
GK16andhvc3u:5544: etaccāsmābhiḥ prathamoddyota eva vitatya nirṇītamiti na punarāyasyate granthayojanaiva tu kriyate /
GK16andhvc3u:5548: vācakatvaṃ gamakatvaṃ ceti svarūpato bhedaḥ svārthe 'rthāntare ca krameṇeti viṣayataḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:5550: no cetsa tasya na kaściditi ko viṣayārthaṃ bālapriyā pravṛttānāṃ kāṣṭhānāṃ jvalanam /
GK16andhvc3u:5551: ataḥ padānāṃ vākyārthamitiparyanta evābhidhāvyāpāro yathā kāṣṭhavyāpāraḥ pākānta ityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:5562: vākyārthasya naimittikatvoktyaiva padārthānāṃ nimittatve siddhe 'pi vaiyākaraṇamatādviśeṣaṃ darśayitumāha--padārthānāntviti /
GK16andhvc3u:5564: pratītistu prathamaṃ vākyārthasya prābhākaramate kāryānvitābhidhānāditi bodhyam /
GK16andhvc3u:5574: samayāpekṣatvātsvārthe abhidhā tadanapekṣatvādanyatrārthe avagamanavyāpāra iti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:5579: nanu na gamyate tasmācchabdātkintu tatsambandhivaśādityata āha--no cedityādi /
GK16andhvc3u:5584: yadi ca svasambandhitvaṃ sākṣāttasya syāttadārthāntararatvavyavahāra eva na syāt /
GK16andhvc3u:5593: yāvatā na sākṣātsambandhitvaṃ tena yukta evārthāntaravyavahāra iti viṣayabheda uktaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:5594: nanu bhinne 'pi viṣaye akṣaśabdāderbahvarthasya eka evābhidhālakṣaṇo vyāpāra ityāśaṅkya rūpabhedamupapādayati--rūpabhedo 'pīti /
GK16andhvc3u:5597: yadeva vācakatvaṃ tadeva gamakatvaṃ yadi syādavācakasya gamakatvamapi na syāt,
GK16andhvc3u:5599: na caitadubhayamapi gītaśabde śabdavyatirikte cādhovaktratvakucakampanabāṣpāveśādau bālapriyā tasya arthāntarasya /
GK16andhvc3u:5618: āvṛttyapekṣatve 'pi tatra tatrārthe abhidhaiva vyāpāra iti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:5619: svarūpabhede prasiddhiṃ hetumuktvā punarhetvantaroktau bījaṃ darśayati--vipratipannaṃ pratīti /
GK16andhvc3u:5620: vipratipannaṃ vācakatvameva gamakatvaṃ nānyadanubhūyata iti vadantam /
GK16andhvc3u:5623: gamakatve sati vācakatvamapi naiva na syāditi yojanā /
GK16andhvc3u:5628: tasmādbhinnaviṣayatvādbhinnarūpatvācca svārthābhidhāyitvamarthāntarāvagamahetutvaṃ ca śabdasya yattayoḥ spaṣṭa eva bhedaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:5630: śabdavyāpāragocaratvaṃ tu tasyāsmābhiriṣyata eva, tattu vyaṅgyatvenaiva na vācyatvena /
GK16andhvc3u:5636: nanu gītādau mā bhūdvācakatvamiha tvarthāntare 'pa śabdasya vācakatvamevocyate,
GK16andhvc3u:5639: gītaśabde bāṣpāveśādau ca nāstītyanvayaḥ, kintu avagamakatvamevāstīti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:5660: vyañjanāvyāpāraviṣayatāyā asmanmatasiddhāyāssādhanāt siddhasādhanaṃ nāma doṣa ityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:5675: tatra ca tasyārthāntarasya pratīteḥ śabdāntareṇa svārthābhidhāyinā yadviṣayīkaraṇaṃ tatra prakāśanoktireva yuktā /
GK16andhvc3u:5677: yataḥ padārthapratītirasatyaiveti locanam yadviṣayīkaraṇaṃ tatra prakāśanoktireva yuktā na vācakatvoktiḥ śabdasya,
GK16andhvc3u:5681: vācyatvaṃ hi samayabalena nirvyavadhānaṃ pratipādyatvaṃ yathā tasyaivārthasya śabdāntaraṃ prati padāha--prasiddheti /
GK16andhvc3u:5682: prasiddhena vācakatayābhidhānāntareṇa yaḥ sambandho vācyatvaṃ tadeva tatra vā yadyogyatvaṃ tenopalakṣitasya /
GK16andhvc3u:5684: nāpi taṃ śabdaṃ prati tasyārthasyoktarūpaṃ vācyatvam /
GK16andhvc3u:5686: atha ca pratīyate so 'rtho na ca vācyavācakatvavyāpāremeti vilakṣaṇa evāsau vyāpāra iti yāvat /
GK16andhvc3u:5691: na vācakatvoktiryuktetyatra hetutvena svārthābhidhāyineti padaṃ vācakatvanirvacanapūrvakamavatārayati---vācakatvaṃ hītyādi /
GK16andhvc3u:5721: yathāhi ghaṭe niṣpanne tadupādānakāraṇānāṃ na pṛthagupalambhastathaiva vākye tadarthe vā pratīte padatadarthānāṃ teṣāṃ tadā vibhaktatayopalambhe vākyārthabuddhireva dūrībhavet /
GK16andhvc3u:5729: saugatakāpilamate tu yadyapyupādātavya ghaṭakāle upādānānāṃ na sattā ekatra kṣaṇakṣayitvena paratra tirobhūtatvena tathāpi pṛthaktayā nāstyupalambha itīyatyaṃśe dṛṣṭantaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:5733: arthāntarapratītyanukūlā vākyasya yā śaktissā tātparyaśaktireva na tvadabhimateti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:5735: yathā padārthe pratīte tātparyaśaktyā vākyārtho gamyate,
GK16andhvc3u:5750: nanu yairapīti sāmānyenoktirnaṃ ghaṭate sautagakāpilamatayorupādeyakāle upādānābhāvāditi śaṅkate--saugatetyādi /
GK16andhvc3u:5760: yadyapi padārthavākyārthayoreva prakṛtatvaṃ, tathāpi padavākyagrahaṇaṃ dṛṣṭāntārtham /
GK16andhvc3u:5763: vākye pratīte tasmātpadānāṃ vākyārthe pratīte tasmātpadārthanāñca pṛthaktayā upalambho nāstītyarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:5770: atra gamyaṃ hetuṃ darśayati locane--arthaikatvasyābhāvāditi padārthavākyārthapratītyoḥ vācyāvabhāsāvinābhāvena tasya prakāśanāt /
GK16andhvc3u:5772: yathaiva hi pradīpadvārema ghaṭapratītāvutpannāyāṃ na pradīpaprakāśo nivartate tadvadyvaṅgyapratītau vācyāvabhāsaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:5774: nanvevaṃ yugapadarthadvayayogitvaṃ vākyasya prāptaṃ tadbhāve ca tasya vākyataiva vighaṭate,
GK16andhvc3u:5775: tasyā ekārthyalakṣaṇatvāt; naiṣa doṣaḥ; guṇapradhānabhāvena taryorvyavasthānāt /
GK16andhvc3u:5776_0: vyaṅgyasya hi kvacitprādhānyaṃ vācyasyopasarjanabhāvaḥ locanam evaṃ padārthavākyārthanyāyaṃ
GK16andhvc3u:5776_1: tātparyaśaktisādhakaṃ prakṛte viṣaye nirākṛtyābhimatāṃ prakāśaśakti sādhayituṃ taducitaṃ
GK16andhvc3u:5777: yato 'sau padārthavākyāthanyāyo neha yuktastasmāt prakṛtaṃ nyāyaṃ vyākaramapūrvakaṃ dārṣṭāntike yojayati--yathaiva hīti /
GK16andhvc3u:5778: nanu pūrvamuktam--- yathā padārthadvāreṇa vākyārthaḥ sa pratīyate /
GK16andhvc3u:5780: iti tatkathaṃ sa eva nyāya iha yatnena nirākṛta ityāśaṅkyāha--yattviti /
GK16andhvc3u:5788: dūrībhāvaśca neṣṛ ityatastayoḥ pṛthagupalambhonābhyupeya iti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:5799: ekaḥ artho yasya tasya bhāvaḥ aikārthyam /
GK16andhvc3u:5801: nanvekārthatvaṃ na lakṣaṇaṃ śleṣālaṅkāraviṣayasyānekārthasyāpi vākyatvāditi śaṅkāmabhiprāyapradarśanena pariharati--sakṛdityādi /
GK16andhvc3u:5803: tatra vyaṅgyaprādhānye dhvanirityuktameva; vācyaprādhānye tu prakārāntaraṃ nirdekṣyate /
GK16andhvc3u:5804: tasmātsthitametat--vyaṅgyaparatve 'pi kāvyasya na vyaṅgyasyāvideyatvamapi tu vyaṅgyatvameva /
GK16andhvc3u:5807: yatrāpi tasya prādhānyaṃ tatrāpi kimiti tasya svarūpamapahnūyate /
GK16andhvc3u:5808: locanam śruto hi śabdo yatraiva samayasmṛtiṃ karoti sa cedanenaivāgamitaḥ tadviramyavyāpārābhāvātsamayasmaraṇānāṃ bahūnāṃ yugapadayogātko 'rthabhedasyāvasaraḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:5809: punaḥ śrutastu smṛto vāpi nāsāviti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:5816: nanu yatparaḥ śabdaḥ sa śabdārtha iti vyaṅgyasya prāghānye vācyatvameva nyāyyam,
GK16andhvc3u:5817: tarhyaprādhānye kiṃ yuktaṃ vyaṅgyatvamiti cetsiddho naḥ pakṣaḥ, etadāha--kiñceti /
GK16andhvc3u:5827: tarhi tānyapi bahūni bhavantityāśaṅkāyāṃ tāni krameṇa yugapadveti vikalpādyaṃ nirākaroti--viramyavyāpārābhāvāditi /
GK16andhvc3u:5829: nanu śleṣaviṣaye vahvarthatvaṃ dṛśyata ityata āha--punarityādi /
GK16andhvc3u:5830: śrutastu smṛto vāpītyubhayatra śabda iti śeṣaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:5831: yadvā śrutaḥ anusaṃhitaḥ śabda iti śeṣaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:5835: tathāca śleṣasthale āvṛtyā bodhādvākyatadartho bhinnau payorekatvañcaupacārikamiti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:5839: tathāca vācyopasarjanako vyaṅgyo vyaṅgyopasarjanakavācyo vaika evārtho vākye na pratipādyata iti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:5842: tahyaprādhānye kiṃ yuktamiti siddhāntī pṛṣṭvā pūrvapakṣiṇa uttaramanuvadannāha--vyaṅgyatvamiti cedityādi /
GK16andhvc3u:5848: itaśca vācakatvādyvañjakatvasyānyatvaṃ yadvācakatvaṃ śabdaikāśrayamitarattu śabdāśrayamarthāśrayaṃ ca śabdārthayordvayorapi vyañjakatvasya pratipāditatvāt /
GK16andhvc3u:5850: kintu tato 'pi vyañjakatvaṃ svarūpato viṣayataśca bhidyate /
GK16andhvc3u:5852: tacca prādhānye 'pi vidyata iti svarūpamaheyameveti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:5858: etacca vitatya dhvanilakṣaṇe 'yatrārthaḥ śabdo vā' iti vāgrahaṇaṃ,
GK16andhvc3u:5859: 'vyaṅktaḥ' iti dvirvacanaṃ ca vyācakṣāṇairasmābhiḥ prathamoddyota eva darśitamiti punarna vistāryate /
GK16andhvc3u:5862: bālapriyā śabdasya sambandhī vācyo lakṣyo vārthaḥ tatsambandhitvamityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:5875: vṛttāvita ityanena yadityādivakṣyamāṇaḥ āśrayabhedarūpo hetuḥ parāmṛśyata ityakṣipretya vyācaṣṭe--anenetyādi /
GK16andhvc3u:5881: arthasya vayañjakatvāśrayatvaṃ śabdāyattameveti yadyapi śabda eva vācakatvasyeva vyañjakatvasyāpi mukhya āśraya iti kāraṇaikyamasti,
GK16andhvc3u:5885: evaṃ mukhyādvācakatvādabhedaṃ pratipādya amukhyādapi pratipādayitumāheti sambandhaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:5894: na hyarthādyvaṅgyatrayapratītiryā tasyā amukhyatvaṃ manāgapi lakṣyate /
GK16andhvc3u:5901: vyañjakatvamārge tu yadārtho 'rthāntaraṃ dyotayati tadā svarūpaṃ prakāśayannevāsāvanyasya prakāśakaḥ pratīyate pradīpavat /
GK16andhvc3u:5903: yadi ca yatrātiraskṛtasvapratītirartho 'rthāntaraṃ lakṣayati tatra lakṣaṇāvyavahāraḥ kriyate,
GK16andhvc3u:5904: tadevaṃ sati lakṣaṇaiva mukhyaḥ śabdavyāpāra iti prāptam /
GK16andhvc3u:5906: locanam upacāralakṣaṇayoḥ prathamoddyota eva vibhajya nirṇītaṃ svarūpamiti na punarlikhyate /
GK16andhvc3u:5917: bālapriyā ca yā guṇavṛttiḥ sā ubhayāśrayāpīti vṛttau yojaneti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:5919: mukhyatayaivetyatra mukhyatevaṃ prakṛtānurodhena vyācaṣṭe--askhalavadgatitveneti vācakatvameva guṇavṛttirityetadvivaṇoti--tatrāpītyādi /
GK16andhvc3u:5938: tadanyasthale nanu tvatpakṣe 'pi yadārtho vyaṅgyatrayaṃ prakāśayati tadā śabdasya kīdṛśo vyāpāraḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:5942: yato vyañjakatvasya rasādayo 'laṅkāraviśeṣā vyaṅgyarūpāvacchinnaṃ vastu ceti trayaṃ viṣayaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:5943: tatra rasādipratītirguṇavṛttiriti locanam kīdṛśa iti mukhyo vā na vā prakārāntarābhāvāt /
GK16andhvc3u:5945: guṇonimittaṃ sādṛśyādi taddvārikā vṛttiḥ śabdasya vyāpāro guṇavṛttiriti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:5946: mukhya evāsau vyāpāraḥ sāmagrobhedācca vācakatvādyvatiricyata ityabhiprayeṇāha--ucyata iti /
GK16andhvc3u:5948: samayānupayogātpṛthagābhāsamānatvācceti tribhiḥ prakāraiḥ prakāśakatvasyaitadviparītarūpatrayāyāśca guṇavṛtteḥ svarūpabhedaṃ vyākhyāya viṣayabhedamapyāha--viṣayabhedo 'pīti /
GK16andhvc3u:5950: bālapriyā tu syādityāśaṅkya pariharati--'yadi ce' tyādi /
GK16andhvc3u:5960: tasminsati kiṃ syādityataḥ krameṇa dūṣaṇamāha--mukhyatva ityādi /
GK16andhvc3u:5969: guṇavṛttivyañjakatvayoḥ svarūpabhedahetūn bahugranthoktān sugrahatvāyaikagranthena vṛtyabhiprāyatayā upasaṃharannuttaragranthaṃ tātparyoktyāvatārayati--evamityādi /
GK16andhvc3u:5982: na kenaciducyate na ca śakyate vaktum /
GK16andhvc3u:5985: tacca na sarvaṃ guṇavṛtterviṣayaḥ prasidydhanuroghābhyāmapi gauṇānāṃ śabdānāṃ prayogadarśanāt /
GK16andhvc3u:5989: locanam vyañjakatvasya yo viṣayaḥ sa guṇavṛtterna viṣayaḥ anyaśca tasyā viṣayabhedo yojyaḥ tatra prathamaṃ prakāramāha--tatreti /
GK16andhvc3u:5994: vastuno yatpūrvaṃ viśeṣaṇaṃ kṛtaṃ tadyvācaṣṭe--cārutvapratītaya iti /
GK16andhvc3u:6003: na sarvamiti yathāsmābhirvyākhyātaṃ tathā sphuṭayati--yadapi ceti /
GK16andhvc3u:6005_1: paryāyeṇa vācakatvādguṇavṛtteśca bālapriyā vastumātraṃ bhavatu guṇavṛtterviṣayaḥ
GK16andhvc3u:6011: na ca śakyate vaktumityatra gamyaṃ hetumāha--lakṣaṇetyādi /
GK16andhvc3u:6041: vyañjakatvaṃ hi kvacidvācakatvāśrayeṇa vyavatiṣṭhate, yathā vivakṣitānyaparavācye dhvanau /
GK16andhvc3u:6043: tadubhayāśrayatvapratipādanāyaiva ca dhvaneḥ prathamataraṃ dvau prabhedāvupanyastau /
GK16andhvc3u:6044: tadubhayāśritatvācca tadekarūpatvaṃ tasya na śakyate vaktum /
GK16andhvc3u:6046: na ca lakṣaṇaikarūpamevānyatra locanam dvitayādapi bhinnaṃ vyañjakatvamityupapādayati--vācakatveti /
GK16andhvc3u:6048: apiśabdo 'pi na kevalaṃ pūrvokto hetukalāpo yāvattadubhayāśrayatvena mukhyopacārāśrayatvena yadvyavasthānaṃ tadapi vācakaguṇavṛttivilakṣaṇasyaiveti vyāptighaṭanam /
GK16andhvc3u:6095: na ca teṣāṃ vācakatvaṃ lakṣaṇā vā kathañcillakṣyate /
GK16andhvc3u:6097: yadi ca vācakatvalakṣaṇādīnāṃ śabdaprakārāṇāṃ prasiddhaprakāravilakṣaṇatve 'pi vyañjakatvasya darśanādvācakatvādiśabdadharmaprakāratvamayuktaṃ vaktum /
GK16andhvc3u:6098: yadi ca vācakatvalakṣaṇādīnāṃ śabdaprakārāṇāṃ prasiddhaprakāravilakṣaṇatve 'pi vyañjakatvaṃ prakāratvena parikalpyate tacchabdasyaiva prakāratvena kasmānna parikalpyate /
GK16andhvc3u:6126: vṛttau 'śabdaprakārāṇām' iti nirdhāraṇe ṣaṣṭhī, prakāratvenetyanenāsya sambandhaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:6134: parikalpanaṃ tadevaṃ śābde vyavahāre trayaḥ prakārāḥ---vācakatvaṃ guṇavṛttirvyañjakatvaṃ ca /
GK16andhvc3u:6135: tatra vyañjakatve yadā vyaṅgyaprādhānyaṃ tadā dhvaniḥ,
GK16andhvc3u:6136: tasya cāvivakṣitavācyo vivakṣitānyaparavācyaśceti dvau prabhedāvanukrāntau prathamataraṃ tau savistaraṃ nirṇītau /
GK16andhvc3u:6137: anyo brūyāt--nanu vivakṣitānyaparavācye dhvanau guṇavṛttitā locanam vyañjakatvaṃ vācakatvāmiti yadi paryāyau kalpyete tarhi vyañjakatvaṃ śabda ityapa paryāyatā kasmānna kalpyate,
GK16andhvc3u:6139: vyañjakatvasya tu viviktaṃ svarūpaṃ darśitaṃ tadviṣayāntare kathaṃ viparyastatām /
GK16andhvc3u:6140: evaṃ hi parvatagato dhūmo 'nagnijo 'pi syāditi bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:6144: yadyapi ca tasya tadubhayāśrayatvena vyavasthānāditi brūvatā nirṇītacaramevaitat,
GK16andhvc3u:6145: tathāpi guṇavṛtteravivakṣitavācyasya ca durnirūpaṃ vailakṣaṇyaṃ yaḥ paśyati taṃ pratyāśaṅkānivāraṇārtho 'yamupakramaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:6163: vācakāśrayaṃ vyañjakatvaṃ vācakatvādimūlaṃ na cetparvatagato dhūmo 'nagnijaśca syādato viparyāso na yukta iti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:6173: la avivakṣitavācyasyeti dhvaneśeṣa ritiḥ yo vailakṣaṇyaṃ durnirūpaṃ paśyati,
GK16andhvc3u:6179: na hi guṇavṛttau yadā nimittena kenacidviṣayāntare śabda āropyate atyantatiraskṛtasvārthaḥ yathā--'agnirmāṇavakaḥ' ityādau,
GK16andhvc3u:6183: guṇavṛttivyavahārābhāve hetuṃ darśayituṃ tasyā eva guṇavṛttestāvadvṛttāntaṃ darśayati--na hīti /
GK16andhvc3u:6184: guṇatayā vṛttirvyāpāro guṇavṛttiḥ guṇena nimittena sādṛśyādinā ca vṛttiḥ arthāntaraviṣaye 'pi śabdasya sāmānādhikaraṇyamiti gaumaṃ darśayati /
GK16andhvc3u:6185: yadā vā svārthamiti bālapriyā ayamupakramaḥ vṛttikāropakramaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:6208: ata eva ca vivakṣitānyaparavācye dhvanau vācyavācakayodvayorapi svarūpapratītirarthāvagamanaṃ dṛśyata iti vyañjakatvavyavahāro yuktyanurodhī /
GK16andhvc3u:6210: tathāvidhe viṣaye vācakatvasyaiva vyañjakatvamiti guṇavṛttivyavahāro niyamenaiva na śakyate kartum /
GK16andhvc3u:6213: ata eva atyantatiraskṛtasvārthaśabdena viṣayāntaramākrāmati cetyanena śabdena tadeva bhedadvayaṃ darśayati--ata eva ceti /
GK16andhvc3u:6214: yata eva na tatroktatahetubalādguṇavṛttavyavahāro nyāyyastata ityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:6216: ucyata iti pradīpādiḥ, indriyādestu karaṇatvānna vyañjakatvaṃ pratītyutpattau /
GK16andhvc3u:6218: uktaguṇavṛttiśabdārthābhiprāyeṇa 'yadā nimittene' tyādigranthena gauṇīṃ 'yadā vā svārthami' tyādagranthena lakṣaṇāñca darśayatītyarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:6219: nanu guṇavṛtterbahurūpatve 'pi kimitīdaṃ bhedadvayaṃ sodāharaṇaṃ darśitamityata āha--anenetyādi /
GK16andhvc3u:6225: vivakṣitavācyatvaṃ tadā na hyupapadyata iti sambandhaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:6228: gaṅgādiśabdo hi gaṅgātīratvādinā kevalatīratvādinā vā gaṅgāyāstīrameva lakṣayatītyatoṃ'śena svārthāparityāgaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:6248: tasya prabhedadvaye guṇavṛttiprabhedadvayarūpatā lakṣyata eva yataḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:6249: ayamapi na doṣaḥ. yasmādavivakṣitavācyo dhvanirgumavṛttimārgāśrayo 'pi bhavati na tu guṇavṛttirūpa eva /
GK16andhvc3u:6251: vyañjakatvaṃ ca yathoktacārutvahetuṃ locanam evamabhyupagamaṃ pradarśakṣepaṃ darśayati---avivakṣiteti /
GK16andhvc3u:6254: avivakṣitavācyasya yatprabhedadvayaṃ tasmin gaumalākṣaṇikatvātmakaṃ prakāradvayaṃ lakṣyate nirbhāsyata ityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:6256: gumavṛtteryomārgaḥ prabhedadvayaṃ sa āśrayo nimittatayā prākkakṣyāniveśī yasyetyarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:6261: yataḥ pūrvamevoktam-- mukhyāṃ vṛttiṃ parityajya guṇavṛttyārthadarśanam /
GK16andhvc3u:6262: yaduddiśya phalaṃ tatra śabdo naiva skhaladgatiḥ //
GK16andhvc3u:6264_0: na hi prayojanaśūnya upacāraḥ prayojanāṃśaniveśī ca vyañjanavyāpāra iti bhavadbhirevābhyādhāyītyāśaṅkyābhimataṃ
GK16andhvc3u:6275_0: nanu guṇavṛttirhi vyañjakatvaśūnyāpi dṛśyata ityanenaivāvivikṣitavācyasya guṇavṛttirūpatvābhāve
GK16andhvc3u:6288: sā abedopacārarūpā yathetyādyanvayo yāpītyādivākye vācyetyādervyaṅgyetyādeścānuṣaṅgaśca bodhyaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:6289: tatra vācyadharmāśrayeṇetyetatprakṛtānuguṇaṃ vivṛṇoti locane---vācyaviṣayo yo dharma iti /
GK16andhvc3u:6294: yathā ca 'priye jane nāsti punaruktam' ityādau /
GK16andhvc3u:6295: yāpi lakṣaṇarūpā guṇavṛttiḥ sāpyupalakṣaṇīyārthasaṃbandhamātrāśrayeṇa cārurūpavyaṅgyapratītiṃ vināpi sambhavatyeva,
GK16andhvc3u:6310: yathā pīno devadatto divā na bhuṅkta ityādau śrutasya pīnatvāde rupapādakatayā rātribhojanādikaṃ kalpyate /
GK16andhvc3u:6311_0: kalpitasya tasyārthāntarasya pīnatvādyupapādana eva paryavasānañca tathā guṇavṛttisthale
GK16andhvc3u:6314: priya iti tīkṣṇatvādatyādivadguṇarūpahetukathanaṃ punaruktapadenānupādeyatvaṃ lakṣyata iti pūrvamevoktam /
GK16andhvc3u:6315: eṣūdāharaṇeṣu tīkṣṇatvādiguṇānāmādhikyaṃ vyaṅgyaṃ, tattu na cārutvakārīti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:6317: upalaṇīyo lakṣyo yo 'rtho mañjasthabālakādistena saha yassambandha ādhārādheyabhāvādirmañcādapadamukhyārthasya tanmātrāśrayeṇetyarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:6320: atra mañcasthabālakānāṃ bahutvādakaṃ vyaṅgyaṃ tadapi na cārutvakāri /
GK16andhvc3u:6322: nanu vināpi cāruvyaṅgyapratītiṃ vyañjanāvyāpāro bhavatvityata āha--tadabhāva ityādi /
GK16andhvc3u:6328: kṣaṇa eva dṛṣṭo naṣṭaśca divyavibhavo yasya saḥ tathāvidho yaḥ prākṛto daridraḥ puruṣaḥ tadvat /
GK16andhvc3u:6329: tasya yathā pratyāvṛtya prākṛtavibhāva eva tathā vyañjanāvyāpārasya yatra tu sā cārurūpavyaṅgyapratītihetustatrāpi vyañjakatvānupraveśenaiva vācakatvavat /
GK16andhvc3u:6331_0: yathā---'suvarṇapuṣpāṃ pṛthivīm' ityādau tatra cārurūpavyaṅgyapratītireva prayojiketi
GK16andhvc3u:6331_1: tathāvidhe 'pi locanam nanu yatra vyaṅgye 'rthe viśrāntistatra kiṃ kartavyamityāśaṅkyāha--yatra tviti /
GK16andhvc3u:6334: vācakatve hi tvayaivāṅgīkṛto vyañjanavyāpāraḥ prathamaṃ dhvaniprabhedamapratyācakṣaṇeneti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:6335: kiñca vastvantare mukhye sambhavati sambhavadeva vastvantaraṃ mukhyamevāropyate viṣayāntaramātratastvāropavyavahāra iti jīvitamupacārasya,
GK16andhvc3u:6336: suvarṇapuṣpāṇāṃ tu mūlata evāsambhavāttaduccayanasya tatra ka āropavyavahāraḥ;
GK16andhvc3u:6342: vyaṅgyameva hi prayojanarūpaṃ pratītiviśrāmasthāmāropite tvasambhavati pratitiviśrāntirāśaṅkanīyāpi na bhavati /
GK16andhvc3u:6360: nanu tayorubhayossatve kuta āropavyavahāra ityata āha---viṣayāntaramātrata iti /
GK16andhvc3u:6371: nanu tarhi suvarṇapuṣpāṃ pṛthivīmiti prayogaḥ kathamupapadyata ityata āha--suvarṇetyādi /
GK16andhvc3u:6372: ityāropassyāddhīti sambandhaḥ. tadāropaṃ vinā tasya mahākaviprayogasyānirvāhāditi bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:6380: nanvasambhavadapi viṣaye guṇavṛttau satyāmapi dhvanivyavahāra eva yuktyanurodhī /
GK16andhvc3u:6381_1: tu tadekarūpā sahṛdayahṛdayāhlādinī pratīyamānā pratītihetutvādviyaṣāntare locanam satyāmapīti /
GK16andhvc3u:6383: vyañjakatvalakṣaṇo yo viśeṣastenāviśiṣṭā avidyamānaṃ viśiṣṭaṃ viśeṣo bhedanaṃ yasyāḥ vyañjakatvaṃ na tasyā bheda ityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:6384: yadi vā vyañjakatvalakṣaṇena vyāpāraviśeṣemāviśiṣṭā nyakkṛtasvābhāvā āsamantādvyāptā /
GK16andhvc3u:6386: tena vyañjakatvalakṣaṇena sahaikaṃ rūpaṃ yasyāḥ sā tathāvidhā na bhavati /
GK16andhvc3u:6388: na hi guṇavṛtteścārupratītihetutvamastīti bālapriyā vyaṅgyamātrānvitamāropitameva pratītiviśrāntisthānamastu,
GK16andhvc3u:6402: yadvā viśiṣṭaṃ viśeṣaḥ ādaraḥ avidyamānaṃ viśiṣṭaṃ yasyāsseti vyatpattimabhipretyāha--nyakkṛtasvabhāveti /
GK16andhvc3u:6409: yato guṇavṛttiḥ sahṛdayahṛdayāhlādinī pratīyamānā ca na bhavatyato na tadekarūpeti sambandhaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:6410: vyaṅgyagataṃ sahṛdayahṛdayāhṇādakatvaṃ pratīyamānatvañca vyañjakatve samāropya guṇavṛttestanniṣedhapūrvaktaṃ tadekarūpatvaṃ niṣiddhamiti bodhyam /
GK16andhvc3u:6424: api ca vyañjakatvalakṣaṇo yaḥ śabdārthayorgharmaḥ sa prasiddhasambandhānurodhīti na kasyācidvimativiṣayatāmarbahati /
GK16andhvc3u:6425: śabdārtharyorhi prasiddho yaḥ sambandho vācyavācakabhāvākhyāstamanurundhāna eva vyañjakatvalakṣaṇo vyāpāraḥ sāmagrantarasambandhādaupādhikaḥ pravartate /
GK16andhvc3u:6426: ata eva vācakatvāttasya viśeṣaḥ vācakatvaṃ hi śabdaviśeṣasya niyata ātmā vyutpattikālādārabhya tadavinābhāvena tasya prasiddhatvāt /
GK16andhvc3u:6431: niyatasvabhāvācca vācyavācakatvādaupādhikatvenāniyataṃ vyañjakatvaṃ kathaṃ na bhinnanimittamiti darśayati--api ceti /
GK16andhvc3u:6436: athāpi cetyādigrantho 'bhāvavādinaḥ prati sthūṇānikhanananyāyena vyañjakatvasādhaka ityabhiprāyeṇāvatārayati--niyatetyādi /
GK16andhvc3u:6447: nanu sāmagryantarasambandhajanitatve 'pyayaṃ vyāpāro vācakavyāpāratvādabhidhaivāstvityata āha--ata evetyādi /
GK16andhvc3u:6463: naiṣa doṣaḥ; yataḥ śabdātmani tasyāniyatatvam, na tu sve viṣaye vyaṅgyalakṣaṇe /
GK16andhvc3u:6467: tathaivedaṃ yathā darśitaṃ locanam saphuṭayati--ata eveti /
GK16andhvc3u:6475: na hi dhūme vahnigamakatvaṃ sadātanam,anyagamakatvasya vahnyagamakatvasya ca darśanāt /
GK16andhvc3u:6503: yasya yaraya vyaṅgyo 'rtho vidyate tasya tasya vyañjakatvamityevamarthaviṣaye niyatatvaṃ vyañjakatvasyāstyevetyarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:6517: śabdātmanyaniyatatvādeva ca tasya vācakatvaprakāratā na śakyā kalpayitum /
GK16andhvc3u:6518: yadi hi vācakatvaprakāratā tasya bhavettacchabdātmani niyatatāpi syādvācakatvavat /
GK16andhvc3u:6519: sa ca tathāvidha aupādhiko dharmaḥ śabdānāmautpattikaśabdārthasambanthavādinā vākyatattvavidā pauruṣāpauruṣeyayorvākyayorviśeṣamabhidadhatā niyamenābhyupagantavyaḥ,
GK16andhvc3u:6520: tadanabhyupagame hi tasya śabdārthasambandhanityatve satyapyapauruṣeyapauruṣeyayorvākyayorarthapratipādane locanam svasminviṣaye ca gṛhīte trairūpyādau na vyabhicarati /
GK16andhvc3u:6524: janmanā dvitīyo bhāvavikāraḥ sattārūpaḥ sāmīpyāllaṇāto vānutpattiḥ, bālapriyā tasyāḥ jijñāsā /
GK16andhvc3u:6525: vyāptisusmūrṣā hetau sādhyasya yā vyāptiḥ, tatsmaraṇecchā /
GK16andhvc3u:6527: pakṣadharmatājijñāsādīnāmanumitiṃ prati prayojakatvaṃ prācīnābhyupagataṃ tadvārā ca liṅgatvasya tadadhīnatvaṃ bodhyam /
GK16andhvc3u:6535: tatra trairūpyasya liṅge abādhitatvādessādhye ca grahaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:6536: na vyabhicaratīti jñāpakatvaṃ svaviṣaye na vyabhicaratītyarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:6537: svaviṣayāvyabhicārīti vṛttestu jñāpakatvasya viṣaye jñāpye vahnyādau na vyabhicaratītyevārthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:6542_0: nanvevaṃ vyañjakatvaṃ na kasya cidvimativiṣayatāmarhantītyuktamayuktaṃ vyaṅgyavyañjakabhāvalakṣaṇasya
GK16andhvc3u:6545_0: 'autpattikastu śabdasyārthena sambandha' ityādijaiminīyaṃ sūtraṃ manasi kṛtyoktam
GK16andhvc3u:6545_1: 'autpattikastu śabdasyārthena sambandha' ityādijaiminīyaṃ sūtraṃ manasi kṛtyoktam 'autpattike'tyādi /
GK16andhvc3u:6548: jāyate asti vardhate vipariṇamate apakṣīyate naśyatīti ṣaṅvikārā bhāvānāmuktāḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:6549: tatra dvitīyassattārūpo vikāraḥ utpattipadārthena janmanā sāmīpyānnimittāllakṣyata ityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:6552: tadabhyupagame tu pauruṣeyāṇāṃ vākyānāṃ puruṣecchānuvidhānasamāropitaupādhikavyāpārāntarāṇāṃ satyapi svābhidheyasambandhāparityāge mithyārthatāpi bhavet /
GK16andhvc3u:6553: locanam rūḍhyā vā autpattikaśabdo nityaparyāyaḥ tena nityaṃ yaḥ śabdārthayoḥ śaktilakṣaṇaṃ saṃbandhamicchati jaimineyastenetyarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:6555: tataśca puruṣadoṣānupraveśasyākiñcitkaratvāttannibandhaṃ pauruṣeyeṣu vākyeṣu yadaprāmāṇyaṃ tanna sidhyet /
GK16andhvc3u:6556: pratipattureva hi yaditathā pratipattistarhi vākyasya na kaścidaparādha iti kathamaprāmāṇyam /
GK16andhvc3u:6558: bālapriyā ityanuṣaṅgaḥ virodharūpasambandhena nimittena janmanā tpattirlakṣyata ityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:6576: nirviśeṣatvaṃ syādityatreṣṭāpattiṃ parihartuṃ nirviśeṣatve doṣaṃ darśayati--tataścetyādi /
GK16andhvc3u:6578: puruṣe vaktari yaḥ kādācitko doṣasya bhramāderanupraveśaḥ,
GK16andhvc3u:6583: pauruṣeyeṣu laukikeṣu vākyeṣu ayathārthavākyeṣu aprāmāṇyam yathārthatvanimittakamaprāmāṇyam /
GK16andhvc3u:6594: puruṣecchāyāḥ vaktṛpuruṣābhiprāyasyānuvidhānāddhetoḥ samāropitaṃ kalpitamata evaupādhikañca yadvyāpārāntaraṃ yeṣu teṣāmityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:6596: tathā hi--himamayūkhaprabhṛtīnāṃ nirvāpitasakalajīvalokaṃ śītalatvamudvahatāmeva priyāvirahadahanadahyamānamānasairjanairālokyamānānāṃ satāṃ santāpakāritvaṃ prasiddhameva /
GK16andhvc3u:6597: tasmātpauruṣeyāṇāṃ vākyānāṃ satyapi naisargike 'rthasambandhe mithyārthatvaṃ samarthayitumicchatā vācakatvavyatiriktaṃ kiñcadrūpamaupādhikaṃ vyaktamevābhidhānīyam /
GK16andhvc3u:6600: pauruṣeyāṇi ca vākyāni prādhānyena puruṣābhiprāyameva prakāśayanti /
GK16andhvc3u:6601: sa ca vyaṅgya eva locanam nanu dharmāntarābhyupagame 'pi kathaṃ mithyārthatā,
GK16andhvc3u:6602: na hi prakāśakatvalakṣaṇaṃ svadharmaṃ jahāti śabda ityāśaṅkyāha--duśyata iti /
GK16andhvc3u:6604: yadāha--“evamayaṃ puruṣā vedeti bhavati pratyayaḥ na tvevamayamartha” iti /
GK16andhvc3u:6606: na tu bālapriyā uktārthasyānubhavasiddhatvamuktaṃ dṛśyata ityādinā tadvacanaṃ kimarthamityatastadganthamavatārayati--nanvityādi /
GK16andhvc3u:6615: sāmagnyantarasampātena sampāditamata evaupādhikaṃ dharmāntaraṃ yeṣu teṣām /
GK16andhvc3u:6619: tathāvidhaṃ śītalatvamudvahatāmityanenāparityaktasvabhāvatvaṃ priyāvirahetyādanā sāmagryantaretyādyuktaṃ santāpakāritvamityanena viruddhakriyatvañca darśitam /
GK16andhvc3u:6622: pauruṣeyāṇi vākyāni prādhānyena puruṣābhiprāyameva prakāśayantītyatra jaiminisūtrabhāṣyakṛdvacanaṃ pramāṇayati--yadāheti /
GK16andhvc3u:6634: nanvaneva nyāyena sarveṣāmeva laukikānāṃ vākyānāṃ dhvanivyavahāraḥ prasaktaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:6637: kiṃ tu vakrabhiprāyuprakāśanena yadvyañjakatvaṃ tatsarveṣāmeva laukikānāṃ vākyānāmaviśiṣṭam /
GK16andhvc3u:6638: tattu vācakatvānna bhidyate vyaṅgyaṃ hi tatra nāntarīyakatayā vyavasthitam /
GK16andhvc3u:6643: bālapriyā nanvastu puruṣābhiprāyo vyaṅgyaḥ vyāpārāntarañca vyañjakatvaṃ vākyasya,
GK16andhvc3u:6645: tathā abhiprāyavyañjakatvena prakāreṇa atra pauruṣeyavākye viṣaye /
GK16andhvc3u:6658: tathāvoktarūpasya śabdārthasambandhasya nityatve 'pi pauruṣeyavākyānāṃ puruṣābhiprāyānuvidhāyitvāttadabhipretaṃ yadvākyārthasyāsatyatvaṃ,
GK16andhvc3u:6660: apauruṣeyāṇāṃ vākyānāntu vakturabhāvena teṣāṃ sarveṣāmeva prāmāṇyañceti bodhyam /
GK16andhvc3u:6665: anena śabdasya vyaṅgyena saha yassambandhastasya vācyavācakabhāvatvaṃ nāstīti darśitaṃ,
GK16andhvc3u:6675: yadvyajakatvaṃ tattu vācakatvānna bhidyata iti sambandhaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:6680: yasya tu vivakṣitatvena vyaṅgyasya sthitiḥ tadyvañjakatvaṃ dhvanivyavahārasya prayojakam /
GK16andhvc3u:6681: locanam gāmānayeti śrute 'pyabhiprāye vyakte tadabhiprāyaviśiṣṭo 'rtha evābhipretānayanādakriyāyogyo na tvabhiprāyamātreṇa kiñcitkṛtyamiti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:6689: nanvevamabhiprāyasyaiva vyaṅgyatvāttrividhaṃ vyaṅgyamiti yaduktaṃ tatkathamityāha--- bālapriyā 'nāntarīyakataye'ti /
GK16andhvc3u:6696: gokarmakānayanādikriyārūpārthaṃ vinā abhiprāyāsiddhirataśca na vācakatvātpṛthagvyañjakatvaṃ vācyādyvaṅgyamiveti ca bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:6701: nanu dhvanyudāharaṇeṣvapi laukikavākyeṣviva vivakṣitatvāparaparyāyaṃ prādhānyaṃ vācyasya vidyata ityāśaṅkyāyāmabhiprāyamāha---kāvyavācakyebhya ityādi /
GK16andhvc3u:6714: tanmūlakatvāditi kathaṃ vyaṅgyasya prādhānyamityata āha--sā cetyādi /
GK16andhvc3u:6719: ataśca vācyasya na vivakṣitatvalakṣaṇaṃ prādhānyaṃ kāvyavākyeṣviti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:6721: vṛttāvabhiprāyaviśeṣarūpaṃ yadyvaṅgyantu tātparyeṇa prakāśyamānaṃ sacchaśabdārthābhyāṃ prakāśyate tadvivakṣitaṃ bhavatīti sambandhaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:6731: yattvabhiprāyaviśeṣarūpaṃ vyaṅgyaṃ śabdārthābhyāṃ prakāśate tadbhavati vivakṣitaṃ tātparyeṇa prakāśyamānaṃ sat /
GK16andhvc3u:6732: kintu tadeva kevalamaparimitaviṣayasya ghvanivyavahārasya na prayojakamavyāpakatvāt /
GK16andhvc3u:6733_1: ca sarvameva dhvanivyavahārasya prayojakamiti yathoktavyañjakatvaviśeṣa dhavnilakṣaṇe
GK16andhvc3u:6734: tasmādvākyatattvavidhāṃ matena tāvadyvañjakatvalakṣaṇaḥ śābdo vyāpāro na virodhī pratyutānuguṇa eva lakṣyate /
GK16andhvc3u:6735_1: iti locanam evaṃ mīmāṃsakānāṃ nātra vimatiryukteti pradarśya vaiyākaraṇānāṃ naivātra
GK16andhvc3u:6736_0: paritaḥ niścitaṃ pramāṇena sthāpitaṃ nirapabhraṃśaṃ galitabhedaprapañcatayā avidyāsaṃskārarahitaṃ
GK16andhvc3u:6744: gokarmakānayanādikriyārūpārthaṃ vinā abhiprāyāsiddhirataśca na vācakatvātpṛthagvyañjakatvaṃ vācyādvyaṅgyamiveti ca bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:6749: nanu dhvanyudāharaṇeṣvapi laukikavākyeṣviva vivakṣitatvāparaparyāyaṃ prādhānyaṃ vācyasya vidyata ityāśaṅkāyāmabhiprāyamāha--kāvyavākyebhya ityādi /
GK16andhvc3u:6762: tanmūlakatvāditi kathaṃ vyaṅgyasya prādhānyamityata āha--sā cetyādi /
GK16andhvc3u:6767: ataśca vācyasya na vivakṣitatvalakṣaṇaṃ prādhānyaṃ kāvyavākyeṣviti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:6769: vṛttāvabhiprāyaviśeṣarūpaṃ yadyvaṅgyantu tātparyeṇa prakāśyamānaṃ sacchaśabdārthābhyāṃ prakāśyate tadvivakṣitaṃ bhavatīti śambandhaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:6778: guṇībhūtvayaṅgyasthale 'bhiprāyarūpavyaṅgyasya yattvabhiprāyaviśeṣarūpaṃ vyaṅgyaṃ śabdārthābhyāṃ prakāśate tadbhavati vivakṣitaṃ tātparyeṇa prakāśyamānaṃ sat /
GK16andhvc3u:6779: kintu tadeva kevalamaparimitaviṣayasya dhvanivyavahārasya ya prayojakamavyāpakatvāt /
GK16andhvc3u:6780_1: ca sarvameva dhvanivyavahārasya prayojakamiti yathoktavyañjakatvaviśeṣe dhvanilakṣaṇe
GK16andhvc3u:6781: tasmādvākyattvavidāṃ matena tāvadyvañjakatvalakṣaṇaḥ śābdo vyāpāro na virodhī pratyutānuguṇa eva lakṣyate /
GK16andhvc3u:6782_1: iti locanam evaṃ mīmāṃsakānāṃ nātra vimatiryukteti pradarśya vaiyākaraṇānāṃ naivātra
GK16andhvc3u:6783_0: paritaḥ niścitaṃ pramāṇena sthāpitaṃ nirapabhraṃśaṃ galitabhedaprapañcatayā avidyāsaṃskārarahitaṃ
GK16andhvc3u:6791: paritaḥ bahumukhānvādinaḥ prati doṣaviśeṣavācināpabhraṃśaśabdenātra sarvadoṣaheturavidyāsaṃskāro lakṣyata ityāśayena vyācaṣṭe--galitetyādi /
GK16andhvc3u:6796: śabda ityartha iti cākhyā yasya tat /
GK16andhvc3u:6803: viśeṣāṇāṃ vyaṣṭirūpāṇāṃ sarveṣāṃ śaktibhirnirbharatāpūrṇatā tayā cetyarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:6807: viseṣāṇāṃ vyaṣṭirūpāṇāṃ sarveṣāṃ śaktibhirnirbharatāpūrṇatā tayā cetyarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:6812: viśvasya yāni nirmāṇāni tadviṣayā yāḥ śaktayaḥ taiḥ saha kiṃ virodhāvirodhau cintyete /
GK16andhvc3u:6813: kṛtrimaśabdārthasambandhavādināṃ tu yuktividāmanubhavasiddha evāyaṃ vyañjakabhāvaḥ śabdānāmarthāntarāṇāmivāvirodhaśceti na pratikṣepyapadavīmavatarati /
GK16andhvc3u:6814: locanam etaduktaṃ bhavati--vaiyākaraṇāstāvadbrahmapadenānyatkiñcidicchanti tatra kā kathā vācakatvavyañjakatvayoḥ,
GK16andhvc3u:6817: evaṃ vākyavidāṃ padavidāṃ cāvimativiṣayatvaṃ pradarśya māṇatattvavidāṃ tārkikāṇāmapi na yuktātra vimatiriti darśayitumāha--kṛtrimeti /
GK16andhvc3u:6818: kṛtrimaḥ saṅketamātrasvabhāvaḥ parikalpitaḥ śabdārthayoḥ sambandha iti ye vadanti naiyāyikasaugatādayaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:6850: asya śabdasyāyamartha ityupadeśassa iti ca kecit /
GK16andhvc3u:6862: vyañjakatve tu tatpṛṣṭhabhāvini bhāvāntarasādhāraṇe lokaprasiddha evānugamyamāne ko vimatīnāmavasaraḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:6863: locanam nanvanubhavena dvicandrādyapi siddhaṃ tacca vimatipadamityāśaṅkyāha--avirodhaśceti /
GK16andhvc3u:6864: avidyamāno virodho nirodho bādhakātmako dvitīyena jñānena yasya tenānubhavasiddhaścābādhitaścetyarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:6867: naitat; na hi vācakatve sā vimatiḥ,
GK16andhvc3u:6868: api tu vācakatvasya naisargikatvakṛtrimatvādau tadāha--vācakatve hīti /
GK16andhvc3u:6869: nanvevaṃ vyañjakatvasyāpi dharmāntaramukhena vipratipattiviṣayatāpi syādityāśaṅkyāha--vyañjakatve tviti /
GK16andhvc3u:6871: akṣinikocādeḥ sāṅketikatvaṃ cakṣurādikasyānādiryogyateti dṛṣṭvā bālapriyā yathā dīpādiḥ parikalpitanijaviṣayādanyaṃ viṣayamapi prakāśayati,
GK16andhvc3u:6872: tathā śabdo 'pi saṅketitādanyaṃ viṣayaṃ prakāśayatīti teṣāmapyanubhavasiddha evāyaṃ śabdānāṃ vyañjakabhāva iti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:6876: taccetyasya sthāne na ca neti ca pāṭhaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:6888: vācakatve dharmiṇi na vimatiḥ, kintu tatra naisargikatvādidharma evetyarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:6894: vācakatvasya vipratipattiviṣayatvaṃ vyañjakatvasya tadabhāvañca darśayan bhāvamāha--akṣītyādi /
GK16andhvc3u:6904: alaukike hyarthe tārkikāṇāṃ vimatayo nikhilāḥ pravartante na tu laukike /
GK16andhvc3u:6905: na hi nīlamadhurādhiṣvaśeṣalokendriyagocare bāghārahite tattve parasparaṃ vipratipannā dṛśyante /
GK16andhvc3u:6906: na hi bādhārahitaṃ nīlaṃ nīlamiti bruvannapareṇa pratiṣidhyate naitannīlaṃ pītametaditi /
GK16andhvc3u:6907_0: tathaiva vyañjakatvaṃ vācakānāṃ śabdānāmavācakānāṃ ca gītadhvanīnāmaśabdarūpāṇāṃ
GK16andhvc3u:6907_1: ca ceṣṭādīnāṃ locanam kāmamastu saṃśayaḥ śabdasyābhidheyaprakāśane vyañjakatvaṃ tu
GK16andhvc3u:6907_2: yādṛśamekarūpaṃ bhāvāntareṣu tādṛgeva prakṛte 'pīti niścataikarūpe kaḥ saṃśayasyāvakāśa ityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:6909: api tu prādhānikamidaṃ pāramāṇavamidaṃ jñānamātramidaṃ tucchadamiti tatsṛṣṭāvalaukikya eva vipratipattayaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:6912_1: saha sambandhasya sāṅkatikatvaṃ dvitīyasyārthena saha sambandhasya naisargikatvañca dṛṣṭverthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:6914: śabdasya vācakatve kimidaṃ sāṅketikamāhosvinnaisargikamiti vācakatvadharmikassaṃśayaḥ kāmaṃ bhavatvityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:6920: na tu laukika ityuktamupapādayati vṛttau 'na hī'tyādi /
GK16andhvc3u:6936: etanna nīlametatpītamiti na hi pratiṣidhyata iti sambandhaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:6938: nīle etanna nīlamiti vipratipattirna hīti sambandhaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:6942: api tbityalaukikya eva vipratipattaya iti sambandhaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:6961: aśabdamarthaṃ ramaṇīyaṃ hi sūcayanto vyāhārāstathā vyāpārā nibaddhāścānibaddhāśca vidagghapariṣatsu vividhā vibhāvyante /
GK16andhvc3u:6962: tānupahāsyatāmātmanaḥ pariharan ko 'tisandadhīta sacetāḥ locanam aśabdamiti /
GK16andhvc3u:6968: lakṣaṇe śatrādeśaḥ ātmanaḥ karmabhūtasya yopahasanīyatā tasyāḥ parihāreṇepalakṣitastāṃ parijīhīrṣurityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:6984: tathābhūto vyāpāro vyañjakatvalakṣaṇo yeṣāṃ tathābhūtā ityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:7020: astyatisandhānāvasaraḥ vyañjakatvaṃ śabdānāṃ gamakatvaṃ tacca liṅgatvamataśca vyaṅgyapratītirliṅgipratītireveti liṅgiliṅgabhāva eva teṣāṃ vyaṅgyavyañjakabhāvo nāparaḥ kaścit /
GK16andhvc3u:7021: ataścaitadavaśyameva boddhavyaṃ yasmādvakrabhiprāyāpekṣayā vyañjakatvamidānīmeva tvayā pratipāditaṃ vakrabhiprāyaścānumeyarūpa eva /
GK16andhvc3u:7027: vyañjakatvaṃ nāpahnūyate tattvatiriktaṃ na bhavati api tu liṅgiliṅgabhāva evāyam /
GK16andhvc3u:7043: paroktaṃ svīkṛtyāpi svasiddhāntasthāpanāya yo vādassa prauñavādaḥ taṃ vadatīti prauḍhavādī,
GK16andhvc3u:7049: vṛttau 'tat kiṃ naḥ chinnam' ityuktasyaiva vivaraṇam--'vācakatve'tyādi /
GK16andhvc3u:7051: prasiddho yaśśabdasya prakāro dharmo 'bhidhā lakṣaṇā ca tadvilakṣaṇatvamityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:7059: vyañjakatvaṃ liṅgatvamastvityuktyā siddhaṃ nassamīhitamiti manyamānaṃ pūrvapakṣiṇaṃ pratyāha--'na punari'tyādi /
GK16andhvc3u:7061: na punarayaṃ paramārtho yadvyañjakatvaṃ liṅgatvameva sarvatra vyaṅgyapratītiśca liṅgipratītireveti /
GK16andhvc3u:7062_1: śabdānāṃ liṅgatvameveti tadetadyathāsmābhirabhihitaṃ tadvibhajyaṃ pratipādyate śrūyatām /
GK16andhvc3u:7065: vivakṣā ca śabdasvarūpaprakāśanecchā śabdenārthaprakāśanecchā ceti dviprakārā /
GK16andhvc3u:7069: te tu dve apyanumeyo viṣayaḥ śabdānām /
GK16andhvc3u:7072: prayoktā hi kadācitsvaśabdenārthe locanam śabdasya yo vyāpārastasya viṣayo viśeṣa ityāhuḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:7074: pradīpālokādau liṅgiliṅgabhāvaśūnyo 'pi hi vyaṅgyañjakabhāvo 'stīti vyaṅgyavyañjakabhāvasya liṅgiliṅgabhāvo 'vyāpaka iti kathaṃ tādātmyam /
GK16andhvc3u:7076: śabda uccarite yāvati bālapriyā iti yadayaṃ punarna paramārthaṃ iti sambandhaḥ. atrābhiprāyamāha locane--pradīpetyādi /
GK16andhvc3u:7078: liṅgiliṅgabhāvena liṅginirūpitaliṅgatvena śūnyaḥ vinā kṛtaḥ tadasamānādhikaraṇa iti yāvat /
GK16andhvc3u:7079: śūnye iti pāṭhe pradīpālokādāvityasya viśeṣaṇaṃ tat /
GK16andhvc3u:7086: yadi hi vyaṅgyavyañjakabhāvo liṅgiliṅgabhāva eva syānna tadatiriktaḥ,
GK16andhvc3u:7087: tarhi yatra yatra vyaṅgyavyañjakabhāvastatra tatra liṅgiliṅgabhāvo 'pi bhavet,
GK16andhvc3u:7089: nanu vaktrabhiprāyasya vyañjakatvantu śabdasya liṅgatvameva vaktṛjñānānumāpakatvaṃ śabdasyeti vadatāṃ prābhākarāṇāṃ matasya saṃvādakatvādityāśaṅkāyāmuktaṃ vṛttau 'yadapī'tyādi /
GK16andhvc3u:7097: tatra śabdaprayuyukṣā arthapratipipādayiṣā cetyubhayyapi vivakṣānumeyā tāvat /
GK16andhvc3u:7098: yastu pratipipādayiṣāyāṃ karmabhūto 'rthasyatra śabdaḥ karaṇatvena vyavasthitaḥ na tvasāvanumeyaḥ,
GK16andhvc3u:7100: na ca tatra śabdasyakaraṇatve yaiva liṅgasyetikartavyatā pakṣadharmatvagrahaṇādikā sāsti,
GK16andhvc3u:7107: śabdasvarūpaprakāśanecchayoccaritena śabdenāyaṃ prāṇīti śroturyā prāṇitvamātrasya pratipattiḥ mātrapadenārthasya vyavacchedaḥ sā phalaṃ yasyāssetyarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:7111: śabdaviśeṣasya pratipipādayiṣitārthabodhānukūlasya vākyasya yadavadhāraṇaṃ vakturanusandhānaṃ tasminnavasitā paryavasitā tadutpādanena kṛtārtheti yāvat /
GK16andhvc3u:7112: ata eva vyavahitāpi śābdabodhaṃ prati vyavadhānavatyapi /
GK16andhvc3u:7114: śabdenārthaviśeṣasyāvadhāraṇe śroturbodhe avasitā paramparayā tadutpādiketi yāvat /
GK16andhvc3u:7117: śabdaḥ karaṇaṃ yasya tathābhūto vyavahāraśśābdabodhaḥ, tasyanibandhanaṃ nimittamityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:7131: pratipādanaṃ prati karaṇatvāttathāvidhārthaṃ prati karaṇatvaṃ bodhyam /
GK16andhvc3u:7138: pakṣadharmatvagrahaṇādikā liṅgasyetikartavyatā yā sā tatra śabdasya karaṇatvena cāstīti yojanā /
GK16andhvc3u:7145: tattacchabdasya tattadarthe yassaṅketastasya sphuraṇaṃ smaraṇaṃ sa tu dvividho 'pi pratipādyo viṣayaḥ śabdānāṃ na liṅgitayā svarūpeṇa prakāśate,
GK16andhvc3u:7147: vivakṣāviṣayatvaṃ hi tasyārthasya śabdairliṅgitayā pratīyate na tu svarūpam /
GK16andhvc3u:7148: yadi hi liṅgitayā tatra sabdānāṃ vyāpāraḥ syattacchabdārthe locanam tvanyaiva saṃketasphuraṇādikā tanna tatra śabdo liṅgam /
GK16andhvc3u:7149: itikartavyatā ca dvidhā--ekayābhidhāvyāpāraṃ karoti ditīyayā vyañjanāvyāpāram /
GK16andhvc3u:7175: gopanakṛtaṃ yatsaundaryaṃ sūkticārutvaṃ tadāderyo lābho niṣpattistadabhisandhānādikayetyarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:7193: ayamarthassatyaḥ, ayamartho mithyā ityādayo viruddhā vādāḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:7194: ayamarthassatyo mithyā vetyādisaṃśayāśca vastutaḥ pravartante tatpravṛttirna syādityarthaḥ /
