GK16andhvc3u:7197: tatra yathā tadvivādā na pravartante tathetyarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:7199: samyaṅ mithyātvāda vivādā eva na pravarteran dhūmādiliṅgānumitānumeyāntaravat /
GK16andhvc3u:7205: vaktricchā hi vācyāderarthasya bālapriyā kenacilliṅgena kasyacidarthasyānumitirniścayarūpaiva bhavatītyarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:7208: nanu vyaṅgyatvenābhimatasyārthasya śabdena sambandhe sati tatra vyāpārassiddhyati,
GK16andhvc3u:7209: sa eva netyāśaṅkāyāmuktameva smārayati vṛttau 'vyaṅgyaścārthaṃ' ityādi /
GK16andhvc3u:7215: nanu vācyasya sākṣātsambandhaḥ vyaṅgyasya tu taddvāraka ityata āha--'sākṣādi'tyādi /
GK16andhvc3u:7217: ata eva saṃyogasaṃyuktasamavāyādīnāṃ sannikarṣatvābhidhānaṃ saṅgacchata iti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:7218: vyaṅgyasya vācyasāmarthyākṣiptatayā tena saha sambandhasya vācyadhaṭitatvamuktaṃ draḍhīkartuṃ pūrvoktaṃ smārayati--'vācye'tyādi /
GK16andhvc3u:7240: vyaṅgyatvenābhimato 'rtho na śabdasya liṅgaliṅgibhāvena sambandhī śabdapratipādyatvādvācyavadityanumānamanena darśitam /
GK16andhvc3u:7249: upādhiśabdo 'tra vyāvartakaparyāya ityāśayena vyācaṣṭe locane vaktricchetyādi /
GK16andhvc3u:7251: anena vaktrāyamartho vivakṣita iti pratītau vivakṣā hyarthasya viśeṣeṇatvena bhāsate /
GK16andhvc3u:7252: tasmādityuktaṃ draḍhayituṃ pūrvoktameva smārayati eva vyaṅgye liṅgtayā śabdānāṃ vyāpāraḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:7254: pratiyamāne tasminnabhiprāyarūpe 'nabhiprāyarūpe ca vācakatvenaiva vyāpāraḥ samnbandhāntareṇa vā /
GK16andhvc3u:7257: na ca vyañjakatvaṃ liṅgatvarūpameva ālokādiṣvanyathā dṛṣṭatvāt /
GK16andhvc3u:7258: tasmātpratipādyo viṣayaḥ śabdānāṃ na liṅgitvena sambandhī vācyavat /
GK16andhvc3u:7259: yo hi liṅgitvena teṣāṃ sambandhī yathā darśito viṣayaḥ sa na vācyatvena pratīyate, api tūpādhitvena /
GK16andhvc3u:7260: pratipādhasya ca viṣayasya liṅgitve tadviṣayāṇāṃ vipratipattīnāṃ laukikaireva kriyamāṇānāmabhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:7269: icchāyāṃ loko na vipratipadyate 'rthe tu vipratipattimāneva /
GK16andhvc3u:7270: nanu yadā vyaṅgyo 'rthaḥ pratipannastadā satyatvaniścayo 'syānumānādeva pramāṇāntarāt kriyata iti punarapyanumeva evāsau /
GK16andhvc3u:7291: pratipādyasya vyaṅgyasya śabdāpekṣayā liṅgitvābhāve 'pi saṃvādakapramāṇāntarāpekṣayā liṅgitvaṃ bhavatyeveti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:7296: yathā ca vācyaviṣaye pramāṇāntarānugamena samyaktvapratītau kvacitkriyamāṇāyāṃ tasya pramāṇāntaraviṣayatve styapi na śabdavyāpāraviṣayatāhānistadyvaṅgyasyāpi /
GK16andhvc3u:7298: na caitāvatā vācyasya pratotirānumānikī kiṃ tu tadgatasya tato 'dhikasya satyatvasya tadvyaṅgye 'pi bhaviṣyati /
GK16andhvc3u:7316: ebhirvacanairvākyārthasya satyatvamevāptoktatvarūpānumānena niścetavyamiti labhyata iti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:7333: kāvyaviṣaye ca vyaṅgyapratītināṃ satyāsatyanirūpaṇasyāprayojakatvameveti tatra pramāṇāntaravyāpāraparīkṣopahāsāyaiva sampadyate /
GK16andhvc3u:7334: tasmālliṅgipratītireva sarvatra vyaṅgyapratītiriti na śakyate vaktum /
GK16andhvc3u:7344: nāyaṃ sahṛdayaḥ kevalaṃ śuṣkatarkopakramakarkaśahṛdayaḥ pratītiṃ parāmarṣṭuṃ nālamityeṣa upahāsaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:7345: nanvevaṃ tarhi mā bhūdyatra yatra vyañjakatā tatra tatrānumānatvam;
GK16andhvc3u:7346: yatra yatrānumānatvaṃ tatra tatra vyañjakatvamiti kathamapahnūyata ityāśaṅkyāha--yattvanumeyeti /
GK16andhvc3u:7348: nanvabhiprāyaviṣayaṃ yadvyañjakatvamanumānaikayogakṣemaṃ taccenna prayojakaṃ dhvanivyavahārasya tarhi kimarthaṃ bālapriyā teṣāṃ kāvyarūpāṇām /
GK16andhvc3u:7367: vṛttau tadvyañjakatvaṃ dhvanivyavahārasyāprayojakamityevoktamaprayojakatve heturnokta ityato 'bhipretaṃ hetuṃ darśayannāha--tadityādi /
GK16andhvc3u:7378: api tu vyañjakatvalakṣaṇaḥ śabdānāṃ vyāpāra autpattikaśabdārthasambandhavādināpyabhyupagantavya iti pradarśanārthamupanyastam /
GK16andhvc3u:7379: tadbhi vyañjakatvaṃ kadācilliṅgatvena kadācidrūpāntareṇa śabdānāṃ vācakānāmavācakānāṃ ca sarvavādibhirapratikṣepyamityayamasmābhiryatna ākhdhaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:7380: tadevaṃ guṇavṛttivācakatvādibhyaḥ śabdaprakārebhyo niyamenaiva tāvadvilakṣaṇaṃ vyañjakatvam /
GK16andhvc3u:7383_0: yata eva hi kvacidanumānānenābhiprāyādau kvacitpratyakṣeṇa dīpālokādau kvacitkāraṇatvena
GK16andhvc3u:7383_2: vyañjakatvaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ tata eva tebhyaḥ sarvebhyo vilakṣaṇamasya rūpaṃ nassidhyati tadāha--tadevamiti /
GK16andhvc3u:7384: nanu prasiddhasya kimarthaṃ rūpasaṃkocaḥ kriyate abhidhāvyāpāraguṇavṛttyādeḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:7394: yata eva hi abhiprāyadiviṣayaṃ śabdasya vyañjakatvamanumānainānumityā /
GK16andhvc3u:7398: avivakṣitavācyagataṃ vyañjakatvaṃ guṇavṛtyā ca anugṛhyamāṇaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ, tata evetyarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:7403: anenāyaṃ prayogaḥ pradarśitaḥ--vimataṃ vyañjakatvamanumānādiprakārebhyo vilakṣaṇaṃ teṣu vyāvartamāneṣvapi anuvartamānatayāvabhāsamānatvāt,
GK16andhvc3u:7404: yadyeṣu vyāvartamāneṣvapyanuvartamānatayāvabhāsate tattebhyo bhinnaṃ yathā kusumebhyaḥ sūtramiti /
GK16andhvc3u:7408: prasiddhasyābhidhāvyāpāragumavṛtyāde rūpasaṅkocaḥ kimarthaṃ kriyata iti sambandhaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:7416: tadantāpātitve 'pi tasya haṭhādabhidhīyamāne tadviśeṣasya dhvaneryatprakāśanaṃ vipratipattinirāsāya sahṛdayavyutpattaye vā tatkriyamāṇamanatisandheyameva /
GK16andhvc3u:7419: evaṃ hi sati sattāmātralakṣaṇe kṛte sakalasadvastulakṣaṇānāṃ paunaruktyaprasaṅgaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:7422: na vayaṃ saṃjñāniveśanādi niṣedhāma iti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:7428: tripadārthasaṅkarī sattetyanenaiva dravyaguṇakarmaṇāṃ lakṣitatvācchrutismṛtyāyurvadadhanurvedaprabhṛtīnāṃ bālapriyā viśiṣṭaṃ rūpamiti /
GK16andhvc3u:7439: vastuni hi samucitā vimatirna nāmamātra iti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:7460: yatra vyaṅgyānvaye vācya-cārutvaṃ syāt prakarṣavat // DhvK_3.34 //
GK16andhvc3u:7466: ata evādhunātra na kasyacidvimatiretasmātkṣaṇātprabhṛtīti pratipādayitum--āsīt ityuktam // 3.3 //
GK16andhvc3u:7467_0: evaṃ yāvaddhvanerātmīyaṃ rūpaṃ bhedopabhedasahitaṃ yacca vyañjakabhedamukhena rūpaṃ
GK16andhvc3u:7467_2: viniveśayituṃ vyañjakavādasthānaṃ racitamiti dhvaniṃ prati yadvaktavyaṃ taduktameva /
GK16andhvc3u:7468_0: adhunā tu guṇaibhūto 'pyayaṃ vyaṅgyaḥ kavivācaḥ pavitrayatītyamunā dvāreṇa tasyaivātmatvaṃ
GK16andhvc3u:7472: yata eva vipratipattirvastutatvānavabodhanibandhanā tadavadhāraṇe sati notpattumarhati, tata evetyarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:7482: tatsarvaṃ pratipādyetyanena, tāvataiva dhvanisvarūpapratipādanaṃ nirvyūḍhamiti darśayati /
GK16andhvc3u:7486: nanu kāvyasyātmā dhvanirityabhyupagamena kāvyātmabhūtadhvanisvarūpapratipādanamātravṛttatvāt kimarthaṃ guṇībhūtavyaṅgyapratipādanaṃ kṛtaṃ,
GK16andhvc3u:7497: cārutvaprakarṣahetutvena vyaṅgyānvayasya kārikāyāndarśitatvānna vyaṅgyasambandhamātraṃ vyaṅgyo 'rtho lalanālāvaṇyaprakhyo yaḥ pratipāditastasya prādhānye dhvanirityuktam /
GK16andhvc3u:7498: tasya tu guṇībhāvena vācyacārutvaprakarṣe guṇībhūtvayaṅgyo nāma kāvyaprabhedaḥ prakalpyate /
GK16andhvc3u:7499: tatra vastumātrasya vyaṅgyasya tiraskṛtavācyebhyaḥ prīyamānasya kadācidvācyarūpavākyārthāpekṣayā guṇībhāve sati guṇībhūtavyaṅgyatā /
GK16andhvc3u:7500: yathā-- lāvaṇyasindhuraparaiva hi keyamatra yatrotpalāni śaśinā saha samplavante /
GK16andhvc3u:7501: unmajjati dviradakumbhataṭī ca yatra yatrāpare kadalikāṇḍamṛṇāladaṇḍāḥ //
GK16andhvc3u:7507: 'yatrārthaḥ śabdo vā' ityatrāntare vyaṅgyaṃ ca vastvāditrayaṃ tatra vastuno vyaṅgyasya ye bhedā uktāsteṣāṃ krameṇa guṇabhāvaṃ darśayati---tatreti /
GK16andhvc3u:7516: tatra caiṣāṃ svārthasya sarvathānupapatterandhaśabdoktena nyāyena tiraskṛtavācyatvam /
GK16andhvc3u:7533: vastumātrasya vyaṅgyasyetyādivṛttyuktaṃ sarvaṃ krameṇa pradarśayiṣyannadau bhūmikāṃ racayati locane--abhilāṣetyādi /
GK16andhvc3u:7549_1: locanam sa ca pratīyamāno 'pyarthaviśeṣaḥ 'aparaiva hi keyaṃ' ityuktigarbhīkṛte vācyeṃ'śe
GK16andhvc3u:7553: niḥśvāsāndha ivādarśa ityatrāndhaśabdavyākhāyane ya ukto nyāyastenetyarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:7554: pratīyamāno 'pītyapiśabdena svataḥ prāptapradhānabhāvasya vaiparītyena guṇībāvāpattirviruddheti darśayati /
GK16andhvc3u:7557: aparaiva hīti keyamiti coktibhyāṃ sāmānyātmanākroḍīkṛta ityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:7565: svasya vācyasya ya ātmā svarūpantasya yadunmajjanamuddhurakandharatayāvasthānaṃ tayā upalakṣitasya /
GK16andhvc3u:7566: tathā nimajjinaṃ vyaṅgyajātaṃ pūrvoktaṃ yena tasya /
GK16andhvc3u:7572: tathā sakalalokasārabhūtāśca ye kuvalayādayo bhāvāḥ padārthasteṣāṃ vargasya /
GK16andhvc3u:7573: atisumagaṃ yadekādhikaraṇaṃ nāyikārūpaṃ tatra yā viśrāntiḥ saṃśliṣyāvasthitistāyā labdhaṃ samuccarūpaṃ saṅghātarūpatvaṃ yena tasya bhāvastattā tayā hetunā /
GK16andhvc3u:7574: yā vismayavibhāvatāprāptistasyāḥ puraskāreṇa purassarīkāreṇeti ca pāṭhaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:7579: tarhi vyaṅgyasya prādhānyamāpatitaṃ tasyaiva vibhāvatāprāptau prayojakatvādityata āha--vācyarūponmajjaneneti /
GK16andhvc3u:7584: yathohāhṛtam---'saṅketakālamanasam' locanam ata eveyati yadyapi vācyasya prādhānyaṃ ,
GK16andhvc3u:7585: tathāpi rasadhvanau tasyāpi guṇateti sarvasya guṇībhūtavyaṅgyasya prākare mantavyam /
GK16andhvc3u:7592: bālapriyā vyaṅgyasya kaṭākṣavadanādervācyakuvalayacandrādirūpatvena darśanaṃ hyabhilāṣādijanane nimittamiti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:7601: yadi guṇībhūtavyaṅgyaprabhede vācyārthasyaiva prādhānyaṃ syāttdā dhvaniḥ kāvyasyātmeti tatra tatroddhoṣyamāṇamasaṅgataṃ syāditi bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:7602: śokasyāsya kvacitprabandhe 'nupalambhānmuktakasyaucityānusāreṇa varṇyaviśeṣanirvarṇanāvidheyeti darśayan pakṣāntaramāha--anye tvityādi /
GK16andhvc3u:7603: lāvaṇyadravasundarīkṛtanadīviṣayetyanena lāvaṇyasindhurityetadvivṛtaṃ lāvaṇyamayī lāvaṇyasundarīkṛtā vā sindhuriti vigrahaḥ,
GK16andhvc3u:7604: sindhuśabdo na tiraskṛtavācyo vyañjaka iti ca bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:7606: asmin pakṣe kuvalayādīnāmatisubhagaikādhikaraṇasamāveśakṛtasaubhāgyalābho na sāmañjasyena bhavatītyasvarasamanya ityanena sūcayan pakṣāntaramāha--yadi vetyādi /
GK16andhvc3u:7609: na ca prāguktadoṣastaruṇyā eva varṇanīyatvāditi bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:7613_2: vaktavyatayā kathamatiraskṛtavācyatvamiti śaṅkāṃ parijihīrṣuḥ pratyuta tatpadasya
GK16andhvc3u:7618: locanam etacca prathamoddyota eva nirūpitam anurāgaśabdasya cābhilāṣe taduparaktatvalakṣaṇayā lāvaṇyaśabdavatpravṛttirityabhiprāyeṇātiraskṛtavācyatvamuktam /
GK16andhvc3u:7624: guṇībhāve vā kathamacārutvaṃ na syādityāśaṅkya pratyuta sundaratā bhavatīti prasiddhadṛṣṭāntamukhena darśayati---tatra ceti /
GK16andhvc3u:7626: evaṃ vastuno rasādeśca guṇībhāvaṃ pradarśyālaṅkārātmano 'pi tṛtīyasya vyaṅgyaprakārasya taṃ darśayati---vyaṅgyālaṅkārasyeti /
GK16andhvc3u:7628: evaṃ prakāratrayasyāpi guṇabhāvaṃ pradarśya bahutaralakṣyavyāpakatāsyeti darśayitumāha---tatheti /
GK16andhvc3u:7632: tatpadārthastadvastu taduparaktaṃ yena tattvaṃ vastūparañjakatvaṃ tena nimittena lakṣaṇayetyarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:7638: rasavadalaṅkāraviṣayaḥ prākdarśita iti ca vṛttau pāṭhaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:7643: nanu pradhānasyāpi sato rasādeḥ kavivivakṣāvaśādguṇībhāvaḥ kinna syādityata āha--guṇībhāve veti /
GK16andhvc3u:7647: pratyuta bhṛtyotkarṣaviśeṣo 'pi rājotkarṣātiśayāyaiva kalpiṣyata iti cārutvameva puṣṇātīti bhāvaḥ // 3.4 //
GK16andhvc3u:7651: sukhāvahā ityanena teṣu prakāro 'yameva yojya tathā---
GK16andhvc3u:7654: ye ca teṣu prakāro 'yam eva yojyāḥ sumedhasā // DhvK_3.35 //
GK16andhvc3u:7657: ye ca teṣu prakāro 'yameva yojyaḥ sumedhasā // 35 //
GK16andhvc3u:7658: ye caite 'parimitasvarūpā api prakāśamānāstathāvidhārtharamaṇīyāḥ santo vivekināṃ sukhāvahāḥ,
GK16andhvc3u:7659: kāvyabandhāsteṣu sarveṣvevāyaṃ prakāro guṇībhūtavyaṅgyo nāma yojanīyaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:7661: lacchī duhidā jāmāuo harī taṃsa dhariṇiā gaṅgā /
GK16andhvc3u:7662: locanam prasannāni prasādaguṇayogādgabhīrāṇi ca vyaṅgyārthakṣepakatvātpadāni yeṣu /
GK16andhvc3u:7666: yastvetaṃ prakāraṃ tatra yojayituṃ na śaktaḥ sa paramalīkasahṛdayabhāvanāmukulitalocanoktyopahasanīyaḥ syāditi bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:7669: tathā gṛhiṇī gaṅgā yasyāḥ samabhilaṣaṇīye sarvasminvastunyapahata upāyabhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:7671_1: mukhyeṃ phalamiti trailokyasārabhūtatā bālapriyā ityatra tatprakārasya cārutvehetutvaṃ
GK16andhvc3u:7673: sahṛdayatvapratiṣṭālābhaścaitatprakārayojanakauśalaśālitānibandhana eveti tadarthibhistadviṣaye mahāprayatna ādheya iti darśayituṃ sumedhasetyuktamityāha--yastvetamityādi /
GK16andhvc3u:7675: ayaṃ na sahṛdayaḥ kintvalīkasahṛdayabhāvanayā asatyasya sahṛdayatvastha bhāvanayā rasāsvādavaivaśyaṃ manasaḥ prakaṭayituṃ mukulitalocana āste,
GK16andhvc3u:7691: yasyāṃ snānādyadārādhanāditaśca yā labhyate sā gaṅgāsya gṛhiṇyeva,
GK16andhvc3u:7694: labdhāyā āmiamiaṅkā a suā aho kuḍumbaṃ mahoahiṇo //
GK16andhvc3u:7697: prāyeṇaiva parāṃ chāyāṃ bibhral lakṣye nirīkṣyate // DhvK_3.36 //
GK16andhvc3u:7701: vācyālaṅkāravargo 'yaṃ vyaṅgyāṃśasyālaṅkārasya vastumātrasya vā yathoyogamanugame sati cchāyātiśayaṃ vibhrallakṣaṇakārairekadeśena darśitaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:7702: sa tu tathārūpaḥ prāyeṇa sarva eva parīkṣyamāṇo lakṣye nirīkṣyate /
GK16andhvc3u:7704: locanam pratīyamānā satī aho kuṭumbaṃ mahodadherityahośabdācca guṇībhāvamanubhavati // 3.5 //
GK16andhvc3u:7705: evaṃ niralaṅkāreṣūttānatāyāṃ tucchatayaiva bhāsamānamamunāntaḥsāreṇa kāvyaṃ pavitrīkṛtamityuktvālaṅkārasyāpyanenaiva ramyataratvamiti darśayati--vācyeti /
GK16andhvc3u:7709: bālapriyā lakṣmyāssampadrūpāyā upabhogābhāve cālabdhakalpatvāccandrodayakāle vāruṇyupabhogo hi mukhyaṃ phalaṃ,
GK16andhvc3u:7710: sa candrassā vāruṇī cāsya putrabhāvameva bhajata iti mahodadhireva trailokyasāra itīyānartho 'tra dhvananavyāpārādavagamyate /
GK16andhvc3u:7711: sa cāvagatassannaho kuṭumbamiti śabdaspṛṣṭatayā guṇībhāvamavalambate yataḥ,
GK16andhvc3u:7712: tadvyaṅgyārthajātopaskṛta eva vācyārtho vismayavibhāvatāṃ prāpnoti camatkārātiśayañca vidhatta iti // 3.4//
GK16andhvc3u:7715: lakṣmīrityādyuktodāharaṇe na kaścidalaṅgāraḥ sphuṭo 'vagamyata iti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:7729: vyaṅgyāṃśānugama ityatra vyaṅgyasya vācyaṃ pratyaṃśatvaṃ guṇībhūtatvamevetyāha--aṃśatvaṃ guṇamātratvamiti /
GK16andhvc3u:7731: nāmagrahaṇe nāmaikadeśagrahaṇamiti nyāyenaikadeśaśabda ekadeśavivartirūpakapara iti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:7733: kṛtaiva ca sā mahākavibhiḥ kāmapi kāvyaccharvipuṣyati,
GK16andhvc3u:7734_0: kathaṃ hyatiśayayogitā svaviṣayaucityena kriyamāṇā satī kāvye locanam tadayamarthaḥ--ekadeśavivartirūpake---
GK16andhvc3u:7734_1: rājasaṃsairavījyanta śaradaiva saronṛpāḥ ityatra haṃsānāṃ yaccāmaratvaṃ pratīyamānaṃ
GK16andhvc3u:7734_2: tannṛpā iti vācye 'rthe vācye 'rthe guṇatāṃ prāptamalaṅkārakārairyāvadeva darśitaṃ
GK16andhvc3u:7736: vyaṅgyaṃ yadalaṅkārāntaraṃ vastvantaraṃ ca saṃspṛśanti ye svātmanaḥ saṃskārāyāśliṣyantīti te tathā /
GK16andhvc3u:7739: kāvyaśobhāṃ puṣyatīti yaduktaṃ tatra hetumāha---kathaṃ hīti /
GK16andhvc3u:7741: atiśayayogitā kathaṃ notkarṣamāvahet kāvye nāstyevāsau prakāra ityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:7742: svaviṣaye yadaucityaṃ tena ceddhṛdayasthitena tāmatiśayoktiṃ kaviḥ karoti /
GK16andhvc3u:7743: yathā bhaṭṭendurājasya-- yadviśramya vilokiteṣu bahuśo niḥsthemanī locane yadgātrāṇi daridrati pratidinaṃ lūnābjinīnālavat /
GK16andhvc3u:7773: karoti cettadā nāstyevāsau prakāra iti sambandhaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:7775: bhāmahenāpyatiśayoktilakṣaṇe yaduktam--- locanam dūrvākāṇḍaviḍambakaśca nibiḍo yatpāṇḍimā gaṇḍayoḥ kṛṇṇe yūni sayauvanāsu vanitāsveṣaiva veṣasthitiḥ //
GK16andhvc3u:7776: atra hi bhagavato manmathavapuṣaḥ saubhāgyaviṣayaḥ sambhāvyata evāyamatiśaya iti tatkāvye lokottaraiva śobhollasati /
GK16andhvc3u:7781: nanvatiśayoktiḥ sarvālaṅkāreṣu vyaṅgyatayāntalīṃnaivāsta iti yaduktaṃ tatkatham?
GK16andhvc3u:7783: na ca sāmānyaṃ śabdādviśeṣapratīteḥ pṛthagbhūtatayā paścāttanatvena cakāstīti kathamasya vyaṅgyatvamityāśaṅkyāha--bhāmaheneti /
GK16andhvc3u:7786: bhagavata iti manmathavapuṣa ityatra, tacca sambhāvyata evetyatra ca hetuḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:7807: atrātimahato 'pyavakāśātmakākāśasyālpatvena nirmāṇoktyā tato 'pyatiśayitaṃ mahatvaṃ stanayoḥ pratīyata iti atiśayoktirvyaṅgyā,
GK16andhvc3u:7808: parantviyaṃ stanayostathāvidhamahatvasyāsambhāvyamānatvenānaucityavatīti kāvyotkarṣaṃ sampādayituṃ na kṣamata iti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:7819: 'saiṣā' yeyamuktātiśayoktiḥ saiveti tattadalaṅkārāṇāṃ viśeṣatvaṃ tatsāmānyarūpatvañcātiśayokteriti tadarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:7820: bhavatvevaṃ tāvatā prakṛte kimāyātamityata āha--na cetyādi /
GK16andhvc3u:7822: vyaṅgyaṃ hi vācyāta pṛthaktayā tatpratītyuttaraṃ śabdātpratīyate samānyantvanyathā gaurityādiśabdena saiṣā sarvaiva vakroktiranayārtho vibhāvyate /
GK16andhvc3u:7825: tatrātiśayoktiryamalaṅkāramadhitiṣṭhati kavipratibhāvaśāttasya cārutvātiśayayogo 'nyasya locanam bhāmahenāpi yaduktaṃ tatrāyamevārtho 'vagantavya iti dūreṇa sambandhaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:7827: yātiśayoktirlakṣitā saiva sarvā vakroktiralaṅkāra prakāraḥ sarvaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:7829: śabdasya hi vakratā abhidheyasya ca vakratā lokottīrṇena rūpeṇāvasthānamityayamevāsāvalaṅkārasyālaṅkārabhāvaḥ,
GK16andhvc3u:7832: tathā hi---anayā atiśayoktyā, arthaḥ sakalajanopabhogapurāṇīkṛto 'pi vicitratayā bhāvyate /
GK16andhvc3u:7834_1: tatpṛthaktayā bhāsamānatvaṃ vyāpakaṃ vyāpakaṃ nivartamānaṃ svavyāpyaṃ vyaṅgyatvamapi
GK16andhvc3u:7871: tasyāścālaṅkārāntarasaṃkīrṇatvaṃ locanam viśeṣeṇa ca bhāvyate rasamayīkriyate,
GK16andhvc3u:7877: ayaṃ bhāvaḥ---yadi tāvadatiśayokteḥ sarvālaṅkāreṣu sāmānyarūpatā sā tarhi tādātmyaparyavasāyinīti tadyvatirikto naivālaṅkāro dṛśyata iti kavipratibhānaṃ na tatrāpekṣaṇīyaṃ syāt /
GK16andhvc3u:7886: upacāre hi tritayamavaśyaṃ vakta; nimittaṃ prayojanaṃ mukhyārthabādhaśceti /
GK16andhvc3u:7901: yathā khaṇḍamuṇḍādiviśeṣeṣu gotvāderanuvṛttatayā sāmānyarūpatvantathā upamādiviśeṣeṣvatiśayokteranuvṛttatayā sāmānyātmakatvātsarvā vakroktissaivetyabhedavyapadeśo mukhyo vā,
GK16andhvc3u:7902_1: kāvyajīvitatvaṃ vā vivakṣitamiti vikalpaṃ manasi kṛtyādyandūṣayati--yadi tāvadityādi /
GK16andhvc3u:7904: tathāca yathā khaṇḍamuṇḍādayo gotvādyātmakāstathā sarve 'laṅkārā atiśayoktyātmāna eva bhaveyuriti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:7909_0: yathā khaṇḍādīnāṃ svata eva gotvādyākāraśālitvaṃ nānyāpekṣaṃ tathā upamāderatiśayayogitvamapīti
GK16andhvc3u:7910: vyaṅgyatvamapi locanam alaṅkāramātraṃ ca na kiñciddṛśyeta /
GK16andhvc3u:7911: atha sā kāvyajīvitatvenetthaṃ vivakṣitā, tathāpyanaucityenāpi nibadhyamānā tathā syāt /
GK16andhvc3u:7912: aucityavatī jīvitamiti cet--aucityanibandhanaṃ rasabhāvādi muktvā nānyatkiñcidastīti tadevāntaryāmi mukhyaṃ jīvitamityabhyupagantavyaṃ na tu sā /
GK16andhvc3u:7913: etena yadāhuḥ kecit--aucityaghaṭitasundaraśabdārthamaye kāvye kimanyena dhvaninātmabhūteneti te svavacanameva dhvanisadbhāvabhyupagamasākṣibhūtaṃ manyamānāḥ pratyuktāḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:7924: kāvyajīvitatvenetthaṃ vivakṣitā kāvyajīvitatvapradarśanāya sarvā vakroktisyaiṣetyuktā tathāpītyaṅgīkṛtya vādasūcakam /
GK16andhvc3u:7925: kimatiśayoktimātrasya jīvitatvaṃ vivakṣitaṃ, kiṃ vā yatkiñcidviśiṣṭasya?
GK16andhvc3u:7945: sarvā vakroktissaiṣeti nirdeśo mukhaṃ candra ityādivadabhedopacāra evetyarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:7952: tasyā ityasya vācyatvenetyanenāpi sambandha iti vyācaṣṭe--sāpītyādi /
GK16andhvc3u:7961: ayaṃ ca prakāro 'nyeṣāmapyalaṅkārāṇāmasti, teṣāṃ tu na sarvaviṣayaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:7963_0: yeṣu cālaṅkāreṣu sādṛśyamukhena tattvapratilambhaḥ yathā rupakopamātulyayogatānidarśanādiṣu
GK16andhvc3u:7963_1: teṣu gamyamānadharmamukhenaiva yatsādṛśyaṃ tadeva śobhātiśayaśāli bhavatīti te sarve
GK16andhvc3u:7965: teṣu prakāreṣu madhye ya ādyaḥ prakārastasmin /
GK16andhvc3u:7966: nanvatiśayoktireva cedevambhūtā tatkimapekṣayā prathamaṃ tāvaditi kramaḥ sūcita ityāśaṅkyāha--ayaṃ cati /
GK16andhvc3u:7969: evamalaṅkāreṣu tāvadvyaṅgyasparśo 'stītyuktyā tatra kiṃ vyaṅgyatvena bhātīti /
GK16andhvc3u:7972: nidarśanāyāstu 'kriyayaiva tadarthasya bālapriyā vyaṅgyatayā sthātumārabdhāyā api aparaiveti śabdena spṛṣṭatvādvācyatvamāpatitamiti dvayorvācyatvamityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:7984: kramo hi satsveva bahuṣu kramikeṣu ghaṭeta, nānyatheti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:7998: rūpakādau sādṛśyaṃ vyaṅgyamupamā tu tatsvarūpaiveti bodhyam /
GK16andhvc3u:8012: tathā hi 'prabhāmahatyā śikhayeva dīpaḥ' ityādau sphuṭaiva dīpakacchāyā lakṣyate /
GK16andhvc3u:8019: upamāgarbhatva ityapamāśabdena sarva eva tadviśeṣā rūpakādayaḥ,
GK16andhvc3u:8022: 'tayā sa pūtaśca vibhūṣitaśca' ityetena dīpasthānīyena dīpanāddīpakamatrānupraviṣṭaṃ pratīyamānatayā,
GK16andhvc3u:8045: anena dīpa iveti dīpayatīti vā dīpakaśabdavyutpattirdarśitā /
GK16andhvc3u:8050: tadevaṃ vyaṅgyāṃśasaṃsparśe saṃti cārutvātiśayayogino rūpakādayo 'laṅkārāḥ sarva eva guṇībhūtavyaṅgyasya mārgaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:8051: guṇībhūtavyaṅgyatvaṃ ca teṣāṃ tathājātīyānāṃ sarveṣāmevoktānuktānāṃ sāmānyam /
GK16andhvc3u:8052: tallakṣaṇe sarva evaite locanam hyetadupamāyāṃ spaṣṭenābhidhāprakāreṇaiva /
GK16andhvc3u:8055: sulakṣitā iti yatkilaiṣāṃ tadvinirmuktaṃ rūpaṃ na tatkāvye 'bhyarthanīyam /
GK16andhvc3u:8065: aprastutapraśaṃsā sarvāṇi jñāpakāni yathā padasaṃjñāyāmantavacanam--'anyatra saṃjñāvidhau pratyayagrahaṇe tadantavidhirna' iti /
GK16andhvc3u:8066: ākṣepaścobhayatra vibhāṣāsu vikalpātmakaviśeṣābhidhitsayā iṣṭasyāpi vidheḥ pūrvaṃ niṣedhanātpratiṣedhena bālapriyā atra hetundarśayannāha---sādhāraṇetyādi /
GK16andhvc3u:8076: mālopamātiriktopāttadharmakopamāsthale tu dharmasyobhayatra sambandhaḥ spaṣṭamabhidhīyata iti na dīpakasya vyaṅgyatayānupraveśa iti mālopametyuktam /
GK16andhvc3u:8079: anye copamādayo 'laṅkārāstatkathaṃ guṇībhūtavyaṅgyalakṣaṇe kṛte teṣāṃ lakṣitatvasiddhirityato 'bhiprāyamudbhedayannāha--yatkiletyādi /
GK16andhvc3u:8098: ekaikasya svarūpaviśeṣakathanena tu sāmānyalakṣaṇarahitena pratipādapāṭheneva śabdā na śakyante tattvato nirjñātum, ānantyāt /
GK16andhvc3u:8104: guṇībhūtavyaṅgyataivātrālaṅkāratāyāṃ marmabhūtā lakṣitāḥ tān suṣṭu lakṣayati /
GK16andhvc3u:8105: yayā supūrṇa kṛtvā lakṣitāḥ saṅgṛhītā bhavanti, anyathā tvavaśyamavyāptirbhavet /
GK16andhvc3u:8110: rasasya svātmanaiva viśrāntidhāmna ānandātmakatvamiti nānavasthā kāciditi tātparyam /
GK16andhvc3u:8117: jalabāhulyapradarśanāya kuṇḍikāṃ viṣayīkṛtya samudra iti nirdeśādbhede abhedarūpātiśayoktiriti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:8123: tallakṣaṇe sarva evaite sulakṣitā bhavantītyetasya vivaraṇam--guṇībhūtetyādi /
GK16andhvc3u:8127: uktena sāmānyalakṣaṇena vinā tattadviśeṣalakṣaṇasyaiva kathana ityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:8128: kvacadgranthe tūpamā hītyādikassaṅgṛhītā bhavantītyanto grantho na dṛśyate /
GK16andhvc3u:8129_0: nanu guṇībhūtavyaṅgyatvemeva sarveṣāmalaṅkārāṇāṃ sāmānyalakṣaṇaṃ tallakṣaṇena teṣāṃ
GK16andhvc3u:8134: nanvalaṅkāracārutvaprayojakaṃ guṇībhūtavyaṅgyasya cārutvaṃ vaktavyantadapyanyena prayuktantadapyanyenetyanavasthāprasaṅga ityata āha--vyaṅgyasyetyādi /
GK16andhvc3u:8135: yaduktantallakṣaṇe sarva ete sulakṣitā iti tadākṣipya tatsamādhānaparatayottaragranthamavatārayati--nanvityādi /
GK16andhvc3u:8137: dīpakādau kvacideva cakāstyākṣepādau tu guṇībhūtavyaṅgyasya ca prakārāntareṇāpi vyaṅgyārthānugamalakṣaṇena viṣayatvamastyeva /
GK16andhvc3u:8138: tadayaṃ dhvaniniṣyandarūpo dvitīyo 'pi mahākaviviṣayo 'tiramaṇīyo lakṣaṇīyaḥ sahṛdayaiḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:8139: sarvathā nāstyeva sahṛdayahṛdayahāriṇaḥ kāvyasya sa locanam lakṣitena sarveṣāṃ saṃgrahaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:8140: maivam; vastumātraṃ vā raso vā vyaṅgyaṃ sadguṇībhūtaṃ bhaviṣyati tadevāha-guṇībhūtavyaṅgyasya ceti /
GK16andhvc3u:8142: yadi vetthamavataraṇikā--nanu guṇībhūtavyaṅgyenālaṅkārā yadi lakṣitāstarhi lakṣaṇaṃ vaktavyaṃ kimiti noktamityāśaṅkyāha--guṇībhūteti /
GK16andhvc3u:8144: kena lakṣaṇīyatvaṃ dhvanivyatirikto yaḥ prakāro vyaṅgyatvenārthānugamo nāma tadeva lakṣaṇaṃ tenetyarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:8145: vyaṅgye lakṣite tadguṇībhāve ca nirūpite kimanyadasya lakṣakriyatāmiti tātparyam /
GK16andhvc3u:8153: yatra guṇībhūtavyaṅgyasthale 'laṅkāro na cakāsti tatreti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:8156: sa lakṣaṇamasādhāraṇadharmaḥ svarūpaṃ vā yasya prakārāntarasya teneti tadarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:8172: nanvetallakṣaṇanna prāguktamataḥ kathaṃ siddhavadabhidhānamityata āha--vyaṅgya ityādi /
GK16andhvc3u:8174: yatra vyaṅgyānvaya ityādinā guṇībhāvaśca nirūpita iti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:8186: locanam yatprāguktaṃ sakalasatkavikāvyopaniṣadbhūtamiti tanna pratāraṇamātramarthavādarūpaṃ mantavyamiti darśayitum--tadidamiti // 3.6 //
GK16andhvc3u:8189: pratīyamānakṛtā chāyā śobhā, sa ca lajjāsadṛśī gopanāsārasaundaryaprāṇatvāt /
GK16andhvc3u:8197: kārikāyāṃ mukhyetyasya bhūṣetyanena sambandha iti darśayati--mukhyā bhūṣeti /
GK16andhvc3u:8204: gopanaiva sāro yasya tattathāvidhaṃ saundaryameva prāṇā yasyāstasyā bhāvastattā, tasmādityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:8210: kintu yoṣitāṃ yauvanārambhasambhāvinī kāpi hṛdayasya daśetyāha--antarityādi /
GK16andhvc3u:8211: antarmadanodbhedajaṃ tadghṛdayasaundaryantadeva rūpaṃ yasyāssā madanodbhedarūpamanovikārātmiketi yāvat /
GK16andhvc3u:8217: prakārāntareṇāpi tadyathā---- visrambhotthā manmathājñāvidhāne ye mugdhākṣyāḥ ke 'pi līlāviśeṣāḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:8218: akṣuṇṇāste cetasā kevalena sthitvaikānte santataṃ bhāvanīyāḥ //
GK16andhvc3u:8220: tathā pratīyamānasya priyatamābhilāṣānunāyanamānaprabhṛteḥ cāyā kāntiḥ yayā /
GK16andhvc3u:8221: śṛṅgārarasataraṅgiṇī hi lajjāvaruddhā nirbharatayā tāstān vilāsānnetragātravikāraparamparārūpān prasūta iti gopanāsārasaundaryalajjāvijṛmbhitametaditi bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:8223_0: manmathācāryeṇa tribhuvanavandyamānaśāsanena ata eva lajjāsādhvasadhvaṃsinā dattā
GK16andhvc3u:8232: rājā jñāto 'pyanatilaṅghanīyā hyācāryājñā “gurau ruṣṭe na kaścane“tyādivacanādata ācāryatvarūpaṇam /
GK16andhvc3u:8241: akṛtakāḥ akṛtrimāḥ tathā sambhogasya yā paribhāvanā āsvādaḥ, tatra tadavasara iti yāvat /
GK16andhvc3u:8250: ityatra ke 'pītyanena padena vācyamaspaṣṭamabhidadhatā pratīyamānaṃ vastvakliṣṭamanantamarpayatā kā chāyā nopapāditā /
GK16andhvc3u:8253: sā vyaṅgyasya guṇī-bhāve prakāram imam āśritā // DhvK_3.38 //
GK16andhvc3u:8257: yā caiṣā kākvā kvacidarthāntarapratītirdṛśyate sā vyaṅgyasyārthasya guṇībhāve sati guṇībhūtavyaṅgyalakṣaṇaṃ kāvyaprabhedamāśrayate /
GK16andhvc3u:8262: tatra hi sākāṅkṣanirākāṅkṣādikrameṇa paṭhyamāno 'sau śabdaḥ prakṛtārthātiriktamapi vāñchatīti laulyamasyābhidhīyate /
GK16andhvc3u:8263: yadi vār iṣadarthe kuśabdastasya bālapriyā arhā ityasyaiva vivaraṇam--ucitā iti /
GK16andhvc3u:8269: uktaṃ vyaṅgyaṃ vācyārthopaskārakaṃ satkāvyasya cārutvaṃ sampādayatītyarthaḥ // 3.7 //
GK16andhvc3u:8272: nanu laulyamicchā tatkathamatra ghaṭata ityata āha--tatra hītyādi /
GK16andhvc3u:8275: yathoktaṃ kāvyānuśāsane--“sā ca kākurdvidhā sākāṅkṣā nirākāṅkṣā ca,
GK16andhvc3u:8279: kintu nyūnābhyadhikaḥ pramāṇabalena nirṇayayogyastadvākyaṃ sākāṅkṣaṃ tadviparītaṃ nirākāṅkṣam. vaktṛgāta hyākāṅkṣā vākye upacaryate /
GK16andhvc3u:8282: viṣayo 'pi trividhaḥ arthāntaraṃ tadarśagata eva viśeṣastadarthābhāvo ve“tyādi /
GK16andhvc3u:8298: tena hṛdayasthavastupratīterīṣadbhūmiḥ kākuḥ tayā yār'thāntaragatiḥ sa kāvyaviśeṣa imaṃ guṇībhūtavyaṅgyaprakāramāśritaḥ. atra heturvyeṅgyasya tatra guṇībhāva eva bhavati /
GK16andhvc3u:8300: na tu pratīteratra guṇībhūtavyaṅgyatvaṃ vaktavyaṃ, pratītidvāreṇa vā kāvyasya nirūpitam /
GK16andhvc3u:8301: anye tvāhuḥ---vyaṅgyasya guṇībhāve 'yaṃ prakāraḥ anyathā tu tatrāpi dhvanitvameveti /
GK16andhvc3u:8303: kākuprayoge sarvatra śabdaspṛṣṭatvena vyaṅgyasyonmīlitasyāpi guṇībhāvāt kākurhi śabdasyaivala kaściddharmastena spṛṣṭaṃ 'gaupyaivaṃ gaditaḥ saleśaṃ' iti,
GK16andhvc3u:8305: ata eva 'bhama dhammia' ityādau kākuyojane guṇībhūtavyaṅgyataiva vyaktoktatvena tadābhimānāllokasya /
GK16andhvc3u:8309: ghārtarāṣṭrā iti ca sākāṅkṣadīptagadgadatārapraśamanoddīpanacitritā bālapriyā kaścidupāya ityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:8313: arthāntaragatirityanenārthāntarāvagamakaḥ kāvyaviśeṣo vivakṣita iti vakṣyati tadāśayena setyetadvyācaṣṭe--sa kāvyaviśeṣa iti /
GK16andhvc3u:8314: guṇībhāva iti saptamī nimitte guṇībhāvaddhetorityartha ityāha--tatretyādi /
GK16andhvc3u:8316: arthāntaragātirityasya arthāntarasya pratītiriti yathāśrutārthakatve arthāntarapratītereva guṇībhūtavyaṅgyatvaṃ vaktavyaṃ bhavati,
GK16andhvc3u:8320: anye tu kākusthale yatra tadvyaṅgyasya prādhānyantatra dhvanitvaṃ,
GK16andhvc3u:8321: yatra guṇībhāvastatra guṇībhūtavyaṅgyatvaṃ tadetadvyaṅgyasya guṇībhāva ityanena darśitamiti vyācakṣate;
GK16andhvc3u:8341: sākāṅkṣā dīptā gadgadena tārāpraśamanoddīpanābhyāṃ citritā viśeṣavatī cetyarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:8343: āma asaio orama paivvae ṇa tueṃ maliṇiaṃ sīlam /
GK16andhvc3u:8344: kiṃ uṇa jaṇassa jāa vva cāndilaṃ taṃ ṇa kāmemo //
GK16andhvc3u:8345: śabdaśaktireva hi svābhidheyasāmarthyākṣiptakākusahāyā satyarthaviśeṣapratipattiheturna kākumātram. viṣayāntare svecchākṛtātkākumātrāttathāvidhārthapratipattyasambhavāt /
GK16andhvc3u:8346: sa cārthaḥ kākuviśeṣasahāyaśabdavyāpāropārūḍho 'pyarthasāmarthyalabhya iti vyaṅgyarūpa eva /
GK16andhvc3u:8347_1: vyaṅgyamarthaṃ spṛśantī tenaivopakṛtā satīkrodhānubhāvarūpatāṃ vyaṅgyopaskṛtasya vācyasyaivādhatte /
GK16andhvc3u:8349: āma asatyaḥ uparama pativrate na tyā malinitaṃ śīlam /
GK16andhvc3u:8350: kiṃ punarjanasya jāyeva nāpitaṃ taṃ na kāmayāmahe //
GK16andhvc3u:8357: candilaṃ nāpitamiti pāmaraprakṛtiṃ na kāmayāmahe iti nirākāṅkṣagadgadopahāsagarbhā /
GK16andhvc3u:8358: eṣā hi kayācinnāpi tānuraktayā kulavadhvā dṛṣṭāvinayāyā upahāsyamānāyāḥ pratyupahāsāveśagarbhoktiḥ kākupradhānaiveti /
GK16andhvc3u:8360: bālapriyā dīptatārāvalaṅkārāntargatau praśamanoddīpane tvaṅgāntargate iti vivekaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:8362: mayi jīvati dhārtarāṣṭrāḥ svasthā bhavantīti vācyārtha ityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:8382: pativrata iti na malinitamityatra ca kākvā tattadabhāvo vyaṅgya ityabhiprāyeṇāha--pativrata ityādi /
GK16andhvc3u:8387: anugama ityasya tadviśiṣṭavācyapratītistadā guṇībhūtavyaṅgyatayā tathāvidhārthadyotinaḥ kāvyasya vyapadeśaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:8390: prabhedasyāsya viṣayo yaś ca yuktyā pratīyate /
GK16andhvc3u:8391: vidhātavyā sahṛdayair na tatra dhvani-yojanā // DhvK_3.38 //
GK16andhvc3u:8395: saṅkīrṇo hi kaściddhvanerguṇībhūtavyaṅgyasya ca lakṣye dṛśyate mārgaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:8398: vācakatve 'nugamo guṇatvaṃ vyaṅgyavyañjakabhāvasya vyaṅgyaviśiṣṭavācyapratītyā tatraiva kāvyasya prakāśakatvaṃ kalpyate;
GK16andhvc3u:8399: tena na tathā vyapadeśa iti kākuyojanāyāṃ sarvatra guṇībhūtavyaṅgyataiva /
GK16andhvc3u:8400: ata eva 'mathnāmi kauravaśataṃ samare na kopāt' ityādau viparītalakṣaṇaṃ ya āhuste na samyakyarāmamṛśuḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:8402: 'darśe yajeta' ityatra tu tathāvidhakākvādyupāyāntarābhāvadbhavatu viparītalakṣaṇā ityalamavāntareṇa bahunā // 3.8 //
GK16andhvc3u:8413: pratijñātakauravaśatavadhasya kruddhasya bhīmasenasya vacanamidamata eva na mathnāmītyādau viparītalakṣaṇeti kecittadāha--viparītetyādi /
GK16andhvc3u:8418: ayaṃ bhāvaḥ--na mathnāmītyādirūpasya mathanādiniṣedhasyādau pratītiḥ paścāttu mathnāmyevetyādirūpasya tanniṣedhaniṣedhasya pratītiritina,
GK16andhvc3u:8419: kintūccāraṇakāla eva kākubalānmathanādiniṣedhasya niṣeṣapratiyogitvenaiva na mathnāmi netyākārikā pratītirato mathanādiniṣedhasya vācyasya niṣedho vyaṅgya eveti /
GK16andhvc3u:8421: na dṛśyate candro 'treti vyutpattyā darśaśabdo 'māvāsyāyāṃ prayujyate /
GK16andhvc3u:8425: pramukha evānyatarāvadhāraṇaniyamāsambhavo yatra yuktiparāmarśaṃ tatra yasya yuktisahāyatā tatra tena vyapadeśaḥ kartavyaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:8427: yathā--- patyuḥ śiraścandrakalāmanena spṛśeti sakhyā parihāsapūrvam /
GK16andhvc3u:8428: sā rañjayitvā caraṇau kṛtāśīrmākhyena tāṃ nirvacanaṃ jaghāna //
GK16andhvc3u:8431: alaktakoparaktasya hi candramasaḥ parabhāgalābho 'navaratapādapatanaprasādanairvinā na patyurjhaṭiti yatheṣṭānuvartinyā bhāvyamiti copadeśaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:8432: śirodhṛtā yā candrakalā tāmapi paribhaveti sapatnīlokāpajaya uktaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:8442: yadā tu vyaṅgyādeva nyakkṛtavācyāttadā dhvanitvamiti cārutvapratītirūpakāryabalādeva tadanyatarāvadhāraṇasiddhirityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:8452: 'nirvacanam' ityadivṛttigranthena darśataṃ vyaṅgyaṃ tasya guṇībhāvaṃ ca pradarśayati--anenetyādi /
GK16andhvc3u:8463: yathā ca--- prāyacchatoccaiḥ kusumāni māninī vipakṣagotraṃ dayitena lambhitā /
GK16andhvc3u:8464: na kiñcidūce caraṇena kevalaṃ lileśa bāṣpākulalocanā bhuvam //
GK16andhvc3u:8465: ityatra 'nirvacanaṃ jaghāna' 'na kiñjidūce' iti pratiṣedhamukhena vyaṅgyasyārthasyoktyā kiñcidviṣayīkṛtatvādguṇībhāva eva śobhate /
GK16andhvc3u:8466: yadā vakroktiṃ vinā vyaṅgyo 'rthastātparyeṇa pratīyate tadā tasya prādhānyam /
GK16andhvc3u:8477: evaṃvidheṣu śṛṅgārāvasareṣutāmevāyaṃ smaratīti mānanapradarśanamevātra na yuktamiti sātiśayamanyusaṃbhāro vyaṅgyo vacananiṣedhasyaiva vācyasya saṃskāraḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:8493: 'na kiñcidūca' ityasya prayojanaṃ darśayan vyaṅgyamāha--evaṃ vidheṣvityādi /
GK16andhvc3u:8511: yathā ca--- durārādhā rādhā subhaga yadanenāpi bhṛjata- stavaitatprāṇeśājadhanavasanenāśru patitam /
GK16andhvc3u:8517: he subhaga ! yat patitametadaśru anena prāṇeśājadhanavasanenāpi mṛjatastava rādhā durārādhā strīcetaḥ kaṭhoraṃ tadupacārairalaṃ,
GK16andhvc3u:8531: mṛjata iti vartamānārthakapratyayena mārjanasyāvirāmatvokyā vyaṅgyamāha--anena hi pratyutetyādi /
GK16andhvc3u:8536: kaṭhoraṃ strīcetastadalamupacārairvirama he kriyātkalyāmaṃ vo hariranunayaṣvevamuditaḥ //
GK16andhvc3u:8537: locanam yanmāṃ vismṛtya tāmeva kupitāṃ manyase /
GK16andhvc3u:8541: yadi tūcyate iyatāpyādareṇa kimiti kopaṃ na muñcasi, tatkiṃ kriyate kaṭhorasvabhāvaṃ strīcetaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:8542: strīti hi premādyayogādvastuviśeṣamātrametat; tasya caiṣa svabhāvaḥ,
GK16andhvc3u:8543: ātmani caitatsukumārahṛdayā yoṣita iti na kiṃñcidvajrasārādhikamāsāṃ hṛdayaṃ yadevaṃvidhavṛttāntasākṣātkāre 'pi sahasradhā na dalati /
GK16andhvc3u:8546: anunayeṣviti bahuvacanenavāraṃ vāramasya bahuvallabhasyeyameva sthitiriti saubhāgyātiśaya uktaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:8549: yastu triṣvapi ślokeṣu pratīyamānasyaiva rasāṅgatvaṃ vyācaṣṭe sma /
GK16andhvc3u:8551: evaṃ hi vyaṅgyasya yā guṇībhūtatā prakṛtā saiva samūlaṃ truṭyet /
GK16andhvc3u:8552: rasādivyatiriktasya hi vyaṅgyasya rasāṅgabhāvayogitvameva bālapriyā patitamiti bhūtanirdeśena vyaṅgyamāha--gata ityādi /
GK16andhvc3u:8561: evaṃ bodhanīyaṃ prati vyaṅgyamuktvā rādhagataṃ vyaṅgyamāha--ātmanītyādi /
GK16andhvc3u:8568: uktasya vyaṅgyajātasya vācyaṃ prati tasya rasaṃ prati cāṅgabhāvamāha--evamityādi /
GK16andhvc3u:8573_0: vyākhyāturasyāyamāśayaḥ- yasya hi mukhyaṃ prādhānaṃ taṃ pratyevaṃ guṇībhāvo 'nyāyyaḥ
GK16andhvc3u:8573_1: rasasyaiva ca tatprādhānyamiti nedaṃ vyākhyānaṃ sādhīyaityupahāsoktyā darśayati--sa devamityādi /
GK16andhvc3u:8574: yathā kaścinnirdhanatayā devaṃ vikrīya dhanaṃ sampādya tadyātrotsavaṃ kartumārabhate,
GK16andhvc3u:8575: tathā guṇībhūtavyaṅgyopapādanāya pravṛttastadvirodhinaṃ kañcitprakāramāśrita iti mahattaramasya kauśalamityupahāsaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:8582: evaṃ sthite ca 'nyakkāro hyayameva' ityādiślokanirdiṣṭānāṃ padānāṃ vyaṅgyaviśiṣṭavācyapratipādane 'pyetadvākyārthībhūtarasāpekṣayā vyañjakatvamuktam /
GK16andhvc3u:8584: teṣu hi vyaṅgyaviśiṣṭatvaṃ vācyasya pratīyate na tu vyaṅgyarūpapariṇatatvam /
GK16andhvc3u:8585: tasmādvākyaṃ tatra dhvaniḥ, padāni tu guṇībhūtavyaṅgyāni /
GK16andhvc3u:8586: na ca kevalaṃ guṇībhūtavyaṅgyānyeva padānyalakṣyakramavyaṅgyadhvanervyañjakāni yāvadarthāntarasaṃkramitavācyāni dhvaniprabhedarūpāṇyapi /
GK16andhvc3u:8588: yatra tu vākye rasāditātparye nāsti guṇībhūtavyaṅgyaiḥ padairudbhāsite 'pi tatra guṇībhūtavyaṅgyataiva samudāyadharmaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:8590: ramante ca saha strībhiḥ kuśalāḥ khalu mānavāḥ //
GK16andhvc3u:8591: locanam prādhānyaṃ nānyatkiñcidityalaṃ pūrvavaṃśyaiḥ saha vivādena /
GK16andhvc3u:8595: eṣa ca ślokaḥ pūrvameva vyākhyāta iti na punarlikhyate /
GK16andhvc3u:8597: yadyapi cātra viṣayanirvedātmakaśāntarasapratītirasti, tathāpi camatkāro 'yaṃ vācyaniṣṭha eva /
GK16andhvc3u:8598: vyaṅgyaṃ tvasambhāvyatvaviparītakāritvādi bālapriyā ato vācyaṃ pratyeva guṇībhāvo vaktavya iti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:8609: rājasevādivyavahāropalakṣitasya viṣopabhogatulyasya sarvasyāpi laukikavyavahārasya viṣayavairasyāpādakatayā śāntarasavyañjakatvāditi śaṅkāmanūdya pariharati--yadyapītyādi /
GK16andhvc3u:8613: yato rājāderapi sevādikaṃ kurvanti, tato mānavāḥ kuśalāḥ salviti vācyārthaprayukta ityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:8616: yena dhvanirguṇībhūtavyaṅgyayoralaṅkārāṇāṃ cāsaṅkīrṇe viṣayaḥ sujñāto bhavati /
GK16andhvc3u:8617: anyathā tu prasiddhālaṅkāraviṣaya eva vyāmohaḥ pravartate /
GK16andhvc3u:8619: taccāpiśabdābhyāmubhayato yojitābhyāṃ caśabdena sthānatrayayojitena khaluśabdena cobhayato yojitena mānavaśabdena spṛṣṭameveti guṇībhūtam /
GK16andhvc3u:8622: yatra vyaṅgyaṃ nāstyeva tatra teṣāṃ śuddhānāṃ prādhānyam /
GK16andhvc3u:8628: tata eva ca camatkāra ityata āha--vyaṅgyantvityādi /
GK16andhvc3u:8637: rājānamapi sevante api viṣamapi upabhuñjate api iti karmaṇā kriyayā ca yojitābhyāmityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:8639: sevākriyāyā kṣaṇe kṣaṇe sulabhāpāyatayā samāhitamatibhirapi duranuṣṭheyā /
GK16andhvc3u:8642: eko dyotako bahuṣvantya iti nyāyādramante ceti cakārasya samuccayārthakasya kriyātrayeṇa yojanetyarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:8644: khaluśabdaḥ kuśalaśabdena mānavaśabdena ca yojanīya ityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:8652: prasiddhālaṅkāraviṣaya evetyevakāreṇa kimuta vyaṅgyaviṣaya ityartho darśita ityāha--vyaṅgyaprakārastvityādi /
GK16andhvc3u:8665: lāvaṇyadraviṇavyayo na gaṇitaḥ kleśo mahān svīkṛtaḥ svacchandasya sukhaṃ janasya vasataḥ cintānalo dīpitaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:8666: eṣāpi svayameva tulparamaṇābhāvādvarākī hatā ko 'rthaścetasi vedhasā vinihitastanvyāstanuṃ tanvatā //
GK16andhvc3u:8667: ityatra vyājastutiralaṅkāra iti vyākhyāyi kenacittanna cuturastram;
GK16andhvc3u:8673: cireṇa hi yo vyayaḥ sampadyate na tu vidyudiva jhaṭiti tatrāvaśyaṃ gaṇanayā bhavitavyam /
GK16andhvc3u:8679: yatsvayaṃ nirmīyate tadeva ca nihanyata iti mahadvaiśasamapiśabdena vakāreṇa coktam /
GK16andhvc3u:8681: na svātmano na lokasya na nirmitasyetyarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:8683: rāgiṇo hi varākī hateti kṛpaṇatāliṅgitamamaṅgalopahataṃ cānuvitaṃ vacanam /
GK16andhvc3u:8690: pādatrayoktānaṃ trayāṇāmekena yogyo na kaścidartho nirūpyamāṇo dṛśyata ityāha--na svātmana ityādi /
GK16andhvc3u:8702: varākīti kṛpaṇatāliṅgitaṃ hatetyamaṅgalopahataṃ ca vacanaṃ rāgiṇo hyanucitamiti sambandhaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:8703: rāgī hi tannimagnacittavṛttitayā tāmeva bahumanyamānastadrūpasuṣamāsudhāmāsvādayan kathaṅkāraṃ tasyāḥ śocyatvamamaṅglatvaṃ ca paryālocayediti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:8708: ātmanyapi tadrūpāsambhāvanāyāṃ rāgatāyāṃ ca paśuprāyatvaṃ syāt /
GK16andhvc3u:8709_1: vā sītādiviṣaye duṣyantaprāyasya vānirjñātajātiviśeṣe śakuntalādau kimiyaṃ svasaubhāgyābhimānagarbhā
GK16andhvc3u:8710: vītarāgasya vā anādakālābhyastarāgavāsanāvāsitatayā madhyasthatvenāpi tāṃ vastutastathā paśyato neyamuktiḥ na saṃbhāvyā /
GK16andhvc3u:8711: na hi vītarāgo viparyastān bhāvān paśyati /
GK16andhvc3u:8718: kāmamastu svātmavyatiriktajanāpekṣayā tulyaramaṇābhāvasya sambhāvanā svātmāpekṣayāpi tatsambhāvanā na yuktetyatastadvacanamatyantānucitamityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:8732: vītarāgasya vā iyamuktina na sambhāvyeti sambandhathaḥ, sambhāvyaivetyarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:8756: atra vyaṅgyopaskṛtasya vācyārthasyaiva prādhānyamityato 'prastutapraśaṃsālaṅkāra iti bodhyam /
GK16andhvc3u:8758: na cāyaṃ ślokaḥ kvacitprabandha iti śrūyate, yena tatprakaraṇānugatārthatāsya parikalpayate /
GK16andhvc3u:8760_1: viśeṣajñamātmano na kañcidevāparaṃ paśyataḥ paridevitametaditi prakāśyate /
GK16andhvc3u:8761: tathā cāyaṃ dharmakīrteḥ śloka iti prasiddhiḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:8764: locanam dhikte kārṣṇyamiti sā paraṃ prastutaparatayeti nātrāsambhava ityāśaṅkyāha--na ceti /
GK16andhvc3u:8765: nissāmānyeti nijamahimeti viśeṣajñamiti paridevitamityetaiścaturbhirvākyakhaṇḍaiḥ krameṇa pādacatuṣṭayasya tātparyaṃ vyākhyātam /
GK16andhvc3u:8767: nanu kimiyatetyāśaṅkya tadāśayena nirvivādatadīyaślokārpitenāsyāśayaṃ saṃvādayati--sambhāvyata iti /
GK16andhvc3u:8768: avagāhanamadhyavasitamapi na yatra āstāṃ tasya sampādanam /
GK16andhvc3u:8772: ahamiti mahīyānavalepaḥ parisphuṭaṃ gamyata iti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:8777: yato 'yaṃ dharmakīrteḥ śloka iti prasiddhiratastathāpūrvoktārthaka ityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:8778: viniścayavṛttyante sthito 'yaṃ śloka iti prasiddhiratastathāpūrvoktārthaka ityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:8785: prakṛtodāharaṇe hi vivādo vyājastutyaprastutapraśaṃsāviṣayo na vakṣyamāṇatadīyaśloka iti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:8789_0: ayaṃ bhāvaḥ--yo yasyāśayo 'nyatra suspaṣṭapratipattikassa eva sambhavan anyatrāparisphuṭapratītike
GK16andhvc3u:8795: payaḥpakṣe yadā dānāyāntaḥ praveśo yasya tat /
GK16andhvc3u:8796: analpā dhīśaktirbuddhisāmarthyaṃ yasya tenāpyanyena kenacit kartrā /
GK16andhvc3u:8801: mataṃ mama jagatyalabdhasadṛśapratigrāhakaṃ prayāsyati payonidheḥ paya iva svadehe jārām //
GK16andhvc3u:8804: alabdhaṃ prayatnaparīkṣitamapi na prāptaṃ sadṛśaṃ yasya tathābhūtaṃ pratigrāhamekaiko grāho jalacaraḥ prāṇī airāvatoccaiḥśravodhanvantariprāyo yatra tadalabdhasadṛśapratigrāhakam /
GK16andhvc3u:8809: parasya bālapriyā evaṃ bhūtaṃ mama mataṃ matapratipādako granthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:8810: alabdhaḥ sadṛśaḥ svatulyaḥ pratigrāhako 'nyān pratibodhayitā svayaṃ bo /
GK16andhvc3u:8817: adṛṣṭaṃ paramaṃ yasmāttathāvidhamarthatattvaṃ kaustubhādiṃ yatra tat /
GK16andhvc3u:8842: tattacchalokena piratipāditāyāstathāvidhasya svasya svamatasya ca tathāvidhaśocyāvasthāyāḥ svapne 'pyasambhāvyāyāḥ sambhavāt svasya vismayaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:8849: tatra vivakṣitatvaṃ yathā-- parārthe yaḥ pīḍāmanubhavati bhaṅge 'pi madhuro yadīyaḥ sarveṣāmiha khalu vikāro 'pyabhimataḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:8850: na samprāpto vṛrddhi yadi sa bhṛśamakṣetrapatitaḥ kimikṣordeṣo 'sau na punaraguṇāyā marubhuvaḥ //
GK16andhvc3u:8851: yathā vā mamaiva--- amī ye dṛśyaneti nanu subhagarūpāḥ saphalatā bhavatyeṣāṃ yasya kṣaṇamupagatānāṃ viṣayatām /
GK16andhvc3u:8852_2: vīrarase viśrāntiriti mantavyam anyathā paridevitamātreṇa kiṃ kṛtaṃ syāt /
GK16andhvc3u:8855: iha tu saṅgatirastyevetyāśaṅkya saṅgatāvapi bhavatyevaiṣeti darśayitumupakramate---aprastuteti /
GK16andhvc3u:8858: yasya cakṣuṣo viṣayatāṃ kṣaṇaṃ gatānāmeṣāṃ saphalatā bhavati tadidaṃ bālapriyā śrotṛjanasyotsāhajanane hetudvayam--atyādaretyādi /
GK16andhvc3u:8871: nanvaprekṣāpūrvakatvamātmano 'nena darśitaṃ svaviṣayaparidevitasya sarvatra tadāvedakatvāditi na kiñcitkaratvaviraha ityāśaṅkya pariharati--aprekṣetyādi /
GK16andhvc3u:8872: nanvaprastutapraśaṃsāyāmityādigranthasya kā saṃgatirityataḥ prāsaṅgikī seti darśayannavatārayati--nanvityādi /
GK16andhvc3u:8882: nirāloke loke kathamidamaho cakṣuradhunā samaṃ jātaṃ sarvairna samamathavānyairavayavaiḥ //
GK16andhvc3u:8883: anayorhi dvayoḥ ślokayorikṣucakṣuṣī vivakṣitasvarūpe eva na ca prastute /
GK16andhvc3u:8885: avivakṣitatvaṃ yathā-- kastvaṃ bhoḥ kathayāmi daivahatakaṃ māṃ viddhi śākhoṭakaṃ vairāgyādiva vakṣi,
GK16andhvc3u:8893: aprāptaḥ para utkṛṣṭo bhāgo 'rthalābhātmakaḥ svarūpaprathanalakṣaṇo vā yena tasya /
GK16andhvc3u:8895: anena padenedamāha--akathanīyametat śrūyamāṇaṃ hi nirvedāya bhavati,
GK16andhvc3u:8897: kākvā devahatakamityādinā ca sūcitaṃ te vairāgyamiti bālapriyā aprastutārthavarṇanasthala ityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:8901: pīḍā nāmākṣau niṣpīḍanaṃ satpuruṣe tu kleśaḥ /

GK16andhvc3u:9371: liptaśabdādau tiraskṛto vācyaḥ, rāmādau tu saṃkrānta ityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:9372: evaṃ svaprabhedaṃ prati caturbhedānudāhṛtya guṇībhūtavyaṅgyaṃ pratyudāharati--guṇībhūteti /
GK16andhvc3u:9387_1: saṃyogastadātmakasya lepasya vācyārthasya bādhāllipidhātuḥ samparkaṃ lakṣayaṃstadatiśayaṃ dyotayati /
GK16andhvc3u:9388: evaṃ payodāssuhṛdo yeṣāmityatra vācyārthasya bādhātsuhṛtpadamupakāritvena rūpeṇa lakṣayattadatiśayaṃ vyanaktītyarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:9396: atra hyalakṣyakramavyaṅgyasya vākyārthībhūtasya vyaṅgyaviśiṣṭavācyābhidhāyibhiḥ padaiḥ sammiśratā /
GK16andhvc3u:9397: ata eva ca padārthāśrayatve guṇībhūtavyaṅgyasya vākyārthāśrayatve ca dhvaneḥ saṅkīrṇatāyāmapi na virodhaḥ svaprabhedāntaravat /
GK16andhvc3u:9402: tena tadupalakṣitā yo 'rtho vyaṅgyaguṇībhāvena vartate tena saṃmiśratā saṃkīrmatā /
GK16andhvc3u:9403: sā cānugrāhyānugrāhakabhāvena saṃdehayogenaikavyañjakānupraveśena ceti yathāsaṃbhavamudāharaṇadvaye yojyā /
GK16andhvc3u:9404: tathā hi-me yadaraya ityādibhi- sarvaireva padārthauḥ kartetyādibhiśca vibhāvādirūpatayā raudra evānugṛhyate /
GK16andhvc3u:9405: kartetyādau ca pratipadaṃ pratyavāntaravākyaṃ pratisamāsaṃ ca vyaṅgyamutprekṣituṃ śakyameveti na likhitam /
GK16andhvc3u:9407: tatra guṇībhūtavyaṅgyatāpi yojayituṃ śakyā, vācyasyaiva krodhoddīpakatvāt /
GK16andhvc3u:9410: ekavyañjakānupraveśastu taireva padaiḥ guṇībhūtavya vyaṅgyasya pradhānībhūtasya carasasya vibhāvādidvāratayābhivyañjanāt /
GK16andhvc3u:9413: nyakkāra ityādau rāvaṇagatasya kartetyādau bhīmasenagatasya ca krodhasya pratīteriti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:9432: kartetyādau tu te kiṃ na santītyata āha--kartetyādāviti /
GK16andhvc3u:9435: raudra evānugṛhyata ityanenānugrāhyānugrāhakabhāvena saṅkaraṃ pradarśya sandehayogena taṃ darśayati--tatretyādi /
GK16andhvc3u:9441: tathā ca guṇībhūtavyaṅgyasya dhvaneśca sandehasaṅkara iti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:9445: ata evetyetadvyākhyāyā ta evetyādi na yathāhi dhvaniprabhedāntarāṇi parasparaṃ saṅkīryante padārthavākyārthāśrayatvena ca na viruddhāni /
GK16andhvc3u:9446: kiṃ caikavyaṅgyāśrayatve tu pradhānaguṇabhāvo virudhyate na tu vyaṅgyabhedāpekṣayā tato 'pyasya na virodhaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:9447: ayaṃ ca saṅkarasaṃsṛṣṭivyavahāro bahūnāmekatra vācyavācakabhāva iva vyaṅgyavyañjakabhāve 'pi nirvirodha eva mantavyaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:9448: yatra tu padāni kānicidavivakṣitavācyānuramanarūpavyaṅgyavācyāni vā tatra dhvaniguṇībhūtavyaṅgyayoḥ saṃsṛṣṭatvam /
GK16andhvc3u:9450: atra hi 'vilāsasuhṛdā' 'rādhārahaḥsākṣiṇām' ityete pade dhvaniprabhedarūpe 'te' 'jāne' ityete ca pade guṇībhūtavyaṅgyarūpe /
GK16andhvc3u:9453: nanu vyaṅgyaṃ guṇībhūtaṃ pradhānaṃ ceti viruddhameva taddṛśyamānamapyuktatvānna śraddheyamityāśaṅkya vyañjakabhedāttāvanna virodha iti darśayati--ata eveti /
GK16andhvc3u:9459: nanu vyañjakabhedātprathamabhedayoḥ parihāro 'stu ekavyañjakānupraveśe tu kiṃ vaktavyamityāśaṅkya pāramārthikaṃ parihāramāha--kiñcetiḥ tato 'pīti /
GK16andhvc3u:9461: nanu vācyālaṅkāraviṣaye śruto 'yaṃ saṃkarādivyavahāro na tu vyaṅgyaviṣaya ityāśaṅkyāha--ayaṃ ceti /
GK16andhvc3u:9463: mananena pratītyā tathā niśceyaḥ ubhayatrāpi pratītereva śaraṇatvāditi bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:9472: anugrāhyānugrāhakabhāvena sandehayogena ca yau saṅkarau tayorityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:9483: mukhyārthayoḥ vācyālaṅkārasaṅkīrṇatvamalakṣyakramavyaṅgyāpekṣayā rasavati sālaṅkāre kāvye sarvatra suvyavasthitam /
GK16andhvc3u:9486: suhṛcchabdena sākṣiśabdena cāvivakṣitavācyo dhvaniḥ 'te' itipadenāsādhāraṇaguṇagaṇo 'bhivyakto 'pi guṇatvamavalambate,
GK16andhvc3u:9495: 'vivakṣā tatparatvena' iti dvitīyoddyotamūlodāharaṇebhyaḥ saṃkaratrayaṃ saṃsṛṣṭiśca labhyata eva /
GK16andhvc3u:9496: 'calāpāṅgāṃ dṛṣṭim' ityatra hi rūpakavyatirekasya prāgvyākhyātasya śṛṅgārānugrāhakatvaṃ svabhāvokteḥ śṛṅgārasya caikānupraveśaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:9497: 'uppaha jāyā' iti gāthāyāṃ pāmarasvabhāvoktirvā dhvanirveti prakaraṇādyabhāve ekataragrāhakaṃ pramāṇaṃ nāsti /
GK16andhvc3u:9499: tathāpi 'nāti nirvahaṇaiṣitā' iti yadabhiprāyeṇoktaṃ tatra saṅkārāsambhavātsaṃsṛṣṭirevālaṅkārema rasadhvaneḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:9503: bālapriyā suhṛtvasākṣitvayoracetaneṣu latāveśmasu bādhātsuhṛtpadamupakāritvena sākṣipadamāsannatvena rūpeṇa ca lakṣayati /
GK16andhvc3u:9528: yā vyāpāravatī rasān rasayituṃ kācatkavīnāṃ navā dṛṣṭiryā pariniṣṭhitārthaviṣayonmeṣā ca vaipaścitī /
GK16andhvc3u:9531: tatra vibhāvādiyojanātmikāvarṇanā, tataḥ prabhṛti ghaṭanāparyantā kriyā vyāpāraḥ, tena satatayuktā /
GK16andhvc3u:9535: ata eva te kavayaḥ varṇanāyogāt teṣām /
GK16andhvc3u:9539: pratibhārūpā, tatra dṛṣṭiścākṣuṣaṃ jñānaṃ ṣāḍavādi rasayatīti virodhālaṅkāro 'ta eva navā /
GK16andhvc3u:9540: tadanugṛhītaśca dhvaniḥ, tathāhi cākṣuṣaṃ jñānaṃ nāvivakṣitamatyantamasambhavā bhāvāt /
GK16andhvc3u:9541: na cānyaparam; api tvarthāntare aindriyakavijñānābhyāsollasite pratibhānalakṣaṇe 'rthe saṃkrāntam /
GK16andhvc3u:9562_1: vyāpāravatīti viruddhārthasya pratītyā virodhābhāsālaṅkāra ityāha--tatra dṛṣṭirityādi /
GK16andhvc3u:9576: aindriyakaṃ vijñānaṃ laukikatattadviṣayakacākṣuṣajñānaṃ tasyābhyāsa āvṛttiḥ tenollasite prakāśite ityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:9578: te dve apyavalambya viśvamaniśa nirvarṇayanto vayaṃ śrāntā naiva ca labdhamabdhiśayana tvadbhaktitulyaṃ sukham //
GK16andhvc3u:9579: locanam yā caivaṃvidhā dṛṣṭiḥ pariniṣṭito 'calaḥ arthaviṣaye niścetavye viṣaye unmeṣo yasyāḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:9580: tathā pariniṣṭhite lokaprasiddhe 'rthe na tu kavivadapūrvasminnarthe unmeṣo yasyāḥ sā /
GK16andhvc3u:9583: kavīnāmiti vaipaścitīti vacanena nāhaṃ kavirna paṇḍita ityātmano 'nauddhatyaṃ dhvanyate /
GK16andhvc3u:9591: tathā niścitārthaṃ varṇayantaḥ idamitthamiti parāmarśanumānādinānirbhajya nirvarṇanaṃ kimatra sāraṃ syāditi tilaśastilaśo vicayanam /
GK16andhvc3u:9592: yacca nirvarṇyate tatkhalu madhye vyāpāryamāṇayā madhye cārthaviśeṣu niścitonmeṣayā niścalayā dṛṣṭyā samyaṅnirvarṇitaṃ bhavati /
GK16andhvc3u:9596: na kevalaṃ sāraṃ na labdhaṃ yāvatpratyuta khedaḥ prāpta iti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:9599: yoganidrayā tvamata eva sārasvarūpavedī svarūpāvasthita ityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:9602: tvameva paramātmasvarūpoviśvasārastasya bhaktiḥ śraddhādipūrvaka upāsanākramajastadāveśastena bālapriyā arthaviṣaya ityasyārthamāha--niścetavya ityādi /
GK16andhvc3u:9618: mithyādṛṣṭiḥ kavidṛṣṭiḥ tatvadṛṣṭiḥ vipaściddṛṣṭiḥ tayorāṇe vyasaninastātparyavanta ityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:9632: yatra hi kānicitpadāni locanam tulyamapi na labdhamāstāṃ tāvattajjātīyam /
GK16andhvc3u:9633: evaṃ prathamameva parameśvarabhaktibhājaḥ kutūhalamātrāvalambitakaviprāmāṇikobhayavṛtteḥ punarapi parameśvarabhaktiviśrāntireva yukteti manvānasyeyamuktiḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:9635: yadapi vā lokottaraṃ rasacarvaṇātmakaṃ tata ubhayato 'pi parameśvaraviśrāntyānandaḥ prakṛṣyate tadānandavipruṇmātrāvabhāso hi rasāsvāda ityuktaṃ prāgasmābhiḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:9636: laukikaṃ tu sukhaṃ tato 'pi nikṛṣṭaprāyaṃ bahutaraduḥkhānuṣaṅgāditi tātparyam /
GK16andhvc3u:9639: andhapadanyāsena dṛṣṭiśabdo 'tyantatiraskṛtavācyo vāstu ityekataraniścaye nāsti pramāṇam,
GK16andhvc3u:9644_0: sakalavākye hi yadyalaṅkāro 'pi vyaṅgyārtho 'pi vyaṅgyārtho 'pi pradhānaṃ tadānugrāhyanugrāhakatvasaṅkarastadabhāve
GK16andhvc3u:9644_1: tvasaṅgatirityalaṅkāreṇa bālapriyā tasya paramānandarūpatvaṃ ca bhaktirasāyanādigrantheṣu pradarśitam /
GK16andhvc3u:9648: vṛttau saṅkīrṇatvamityanenānugrāhyānugrāhakabhāvena saṅkaraḥ ekapadānupraveśaśaṅkaraśca vivakṣita iti darśayati--tatretyādi /
GK16andhvc3u:9654: te avalambya nirvarṇayanta ityatra te iti tatpadena dṛṣṭipadavācyārthasya darśanasya parāmarśe darśanamavalambya paśyanta iti viruddhārthasya pratītyā virodhālaṅkāro vetyarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:9657: niḥśvāsāndha ityādāvandhādipadenevātyantatiraskṛtavācyena dṛṣṭipadena lakṣyasya pratibhārūpārthasya parāmarśe 'tyantatiraskṛtavācyo dhvanirvetyarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:9671: yathā-- dīrdhīkurvan paṭu madakalaṃ kūjitaṃ sārasānāṃ pratyūṣeṣu sphuṭitakamalāmodamaittrīkaṣāyaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:9672: locanam vā dhvaninā vā paryāyeṇa dvābhyāmapi vā yugapatpadaviśrāntābhyāṃ bhāvyamiti trayo bhedāḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:9674: yatrānugrāhyānugrāhakabhāvaṃ pratyāśaṅkāpi nāvatarati taṃ tṛtīyameva prakāramudāhartumupakramate--yatra hīti /
GK16andhvc3u:9678: atratyo hiśabdo maitrīpadamityasyānantaraṃ yojya iti grantha saṅgatiḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:9684: tathāsau sukumāro vāyuryena tajjaḥ śabdaḥ sārasakūjitamapi nābhibhavati pratyuta tatsabrahmacārī tadeva dīpayati /
GK16andhvc3u:9685: na ca dīpanaṃ tadīyamanupayogi yatastanmadena kalaṃ madhuramākarṇanīyam /
GK16andhvc3u:9698: vācyālaṅkārasaṃsṛṣṭatatvaṃ padāpekṣayaiveti padānāmāvṛttiḥ tatra padāpekṣayetyasya tathāvidhapadāpekṣayetyarthaśceti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:9700: dīrghīkuvannityanenoktaṃ siprāvātahetukaṃ kūjitasya dīrghatvaṃ daiśikaṃ kālikaṃ svasajātīyasaṃvalanakṛtaṃ ceti trividhamiti vivṛṇoti--saprāvātenetyādi dīrghatvamityantena /
GK16andhvc3u:9709: sphuṭitānītyasya truṭitānītyarthaṃ manasivṛtya tatra hetuṃ gamyaṃ darśayati--antarityādi /
GK16andhvc3u:9711: yatra strīṇāṃ harati surataglānimaṅgānukūlaḥ siprāvātaḥ priyatama iva prārthanācāṭukāraḥ //
GK16andhvc3u:9712_0: locanam tathā sphuṭitāni vikasitāni nayanahārīṇi yāni kamalāni teṣāṃ ya āmodastena
GK16andhvc3u:9714: sarvasya tathāvidhasya trailokyasārabhūtasya ya evaṃ karoti suratakṛtāṃ glāniṃ tāntiṃ harati,
GK16andhvc3u:9715: atha ca tadviṣayāṃ glāniṃ punaḥ sambhogābhilāṣoddīpanena harati /
GK16andhvc3u:9716: na ca prasahyaprabhutatayāpi tvaṅgānukūlo hyadyasparśaḥ hṛdayāntarbhūtaśca /
GK16andhvc3u:9719: prārthanārthaṃ cāṭūni karotīti tena tathā kāryata iti parasparānurāgaprāṇaśṛṅgārasarvasvabhūto 'sau pavanaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:9720: yuktaṃ caitattasya yataḥ siprāparicito 'sau vāta iti nāgariko na tvavidagdho bālapriyā bhāvārthamāha--nayaneti /
GK16andhvc3u:9723: tena parasparānukūlyasya parasparopakāritvasya lābha ityartha-. atrāvicchinnassaṃśleṣo lakṣyārthaḥ,
GK16andhvc3u:9739: priyatame iti ca padacchedamabhipretya priyatame prārthanā cāṭukāra iti vātaviśeṣaṇatayāpi yojayati--priyatama ityādi /
GK16andhvc3u:9743: cāṭukāra iti ṇyantātkartari pratyaya ityāha--cāṭūni atra hi maitrīpadamavivakṣitavācyo dhvaniḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:9746: priyatamo 'pi ratānte 'ṅgānukūlaḥ saṃvāhanādinā prārthanārthaṃ cāṭukāra evameva surataglāniṃ harati /
GK16andhvc3u:9748: cāṭukaraṇāvasare ca sphuṭitaṃ vikasitaṃ yatkamalakāntidhārivadanaṃ tasya yāmodamaitrī sahajasaurabhaparicayastena kaṣāya uparakto bhavati /
GK16andhvc3u:9750: evaṃ śabdarūpagandhasparśā yatra hṛdyā yatra ca pavano 'pa tathā nāgarikaḥ sa tavāvaśyamabhigantavyo deśa iti meghaḍhūte meghaṃ prati kāmina iyamuktiḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:9757: ityetadantaṃ vyākhyāyodāharaṇāni ca nirūpya 'punarapi' iti yatkārikābhāge padadvayaṃ tasyārthaṃ prakāśayatyudāharaṇadvāreṇaiva---saṃsṛṣṭetyādi /
GK16andhvc3u:9758: punaḥśabdasyāyamarthaḥ---na kevalaṃ dhvaneḥ svaprabhedādibhiḥ saṃsṛṣṭisaṅkarau vivakṣitau yāvatteṣāmanyonyamapi svaprabhedānāṃ bālapriyā kārayatīti /
GK16andhvc3u:9793: dantakṣatāni karajaiśca vipāṭitāni prodbhinnasāndrapulake bhavataḥ śarīre /
GK16andhvc3u:9795: atra hi samāsoktisaṃsṛṣṭena virodhālaṅkāreṇa saṃkīrṇasyālakṣyakamavyaṅgyasya dhvaneḥ prakāśanam /
GK16andhvc3u:9797_0: locanam svaprabhedairguṇībhūtavyaṅgyena vā saṅkīrṇānāṃ saṃsṛṣṭānāṃ ca dhvanīnāṃ saṅkīrṇatvaṃ
GK16andhvc3u:9797_1: saṃsṛṣṭatvaṃ ca durlakṣamiti vispaṣṭodāharaṇaṃ na bhavatītyabhiprāyeṇālaṅkārasyālaṅkāreṇa
GK16andhvc3u:9797_2: saṃsṛṣṭasya saṃkīrṇasya vā dhvanau saṃkarasaṃsargau pradarśanīyau /
GK16andhvc3u:9799: bodhisattvasya svakiśorabhakṣaṇapravṛttāṃ siṃho prati nijaśarīraṃ vitīrṇavataḥ kenaciccāṭukaṃ kriyate /
GK16andhvc3u:9801: rakte rudhire mano 'bhilāṣo yasyāḥ, anuraktaṃ ca mano yasyāḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:9803: jātaspṛhairiti ca vayamapi kadācidevaṃ kāruṇikapadavīmadhirokṣyāmastadā satyato munayo bhaviṣyāma iti manorājyayuktaiḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:9830: dharmasya dayāprayuktatvādatra dayāvīraśabdena dharmavīra evokta iti sambandhaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:9833: sa rasaḥ dharmavīraśśānto vā saṃsṛṣṭālaṅkārasaṃsṛṣṭatvaṃ ca dhvaneryathā---
GK16andhvc3u:9837_1: jātapulakastathā tvaṃ parārthasampādanāya svaśarīradāna ita karuṇātiśayo 'nubhāvavibhāvasampadoddīpitaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:9840: yadi vā pathikānāṃ śyāmāyitaṃ duḥkhavaśena śyāmikā yebhyaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:9842: abhinayaprayogarasikeṣu pathikasāmājakeṣu satsu mayūravṛndānāṃ prasāritagītānāṃ prakṛṣṭasāraṇānusārigītānāṃ tathā grīvārecakāya prasāritagrīvāṇāṃ nṛttaṃ śobhate /
GK16andhvc3u:9851: munibhirapi jātaspṛhairavalokitānītyanena dayāvīrasya paripoṣapratītyā virodhasyānugrāhakatvaṃ spaṣṭamiti manasi kṛtya samāsoktestadupapādayati--samāsoktimahimnetyādi /
GK16andhvc3u:9879: evaṃ dhvaneḥ prabhedāḥ prabheda-bhedāś ca kena śakyante /
GK16andhvc3u:9880: saṅkhyātuṃ diṅ-mātraṃ teṣām idam uktam asmābhiḥ // DhvK_3.44 //
GK16andhvc3u:9882: evaṃ dhvaneḥ prabhedāḥ prabhedabhedāśca kena śakyante /
GK16andhvc3u:9884: anantā hi dhvaneḥ prakārāḥ sahṛdayānāṃ vyutpattaye teṣāṃ diṅmātraṃ kathitam /
GK16andhvc3u:9886: ity ukta-lakṣaṇo yo dhvanir vivecyaḥ prayatnataḥ sadbhiḥ
GK16andhvc3u:9887: sat-kāvyaṃ kartuṃ vā jñātuṃ vā samyag abhiyuktaiḥ // DhvK_3.45 //
GK16andhvc3u:9890: satkāvyaṃ kartuṃ vā jñātu vā samyagabhiyuktaiḥ // 45 //
GK16andhvc3u:9891: uktasvarūpadhvaninirūpaṇanipuṇā hi satkavayaḥ sahṛdayāśca niyatameva locanam sandehāspadatvena saṅkīrṇābhyāmabhinayaprayoge,
GK16andhvc3u:9892: abhinavaprayoge ca rasikeṣviti prasāritagītānāmiti yaḥ śabdaśaktyudbhavasta saṃsargamātramanugrāhyatvābhāvāt /
GK16andhvc3u:9893: 'pahiasāmāiesu' ityatra tu pade saṅkīrṇābhyāṃ tābhyāmupamārūpakābhyāṃ śabdaśaktimūlasya dhvaneḥ saṅkīrṇatvamekavyañjakānupraveśāditi saṅkīrṇālaṅkārasaṃsṛṣṭaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:9897: atha 'sahṛdayamanaḥprītaye' iti yatsūcitaṃ tadidānīṃ na śabdamātramapi tu nirvyūḍhamityāśayenāha--ityukteta /
GK16andhvc3u:9898_0: yaḥ prayatnato vivecyaḥ asmābhiścoktalakṣaṇo dhvaniretadeva kāvyatattvaṃ yathoditena
GK16andhvc3u:9900: 'ahiṇaa' ityasya abhinaya abhinava ityubhayathāpi cchāyeti darśayan dhvaniṃ darśayati--abhinayetyādi /
GK16andhvc3u:9911: yathoditamityasya vyākartumityanena sambandha iti darśayan vivṛṇoti--yathoditenetyādi /
GK16andhvc3u:9921: etaddhvanipravartanena nirṇītaṃ kāvyatattvamasphuṭasphuritaṃ sadaśaknuvadbhiḥ pratipādayituṃ vaidarbhī gauḍī pāñcālī ceti rītayaḥ pravartitāḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:9922: rītilakṣaṇavidhāyināṃ hi kāvyatattvametadasphuṭatayā manāksphuritamāsāditi lakṣyate tadatra sphuṭatayā sampradarśitenānyena rītilakṣaṇenana kiñcit /
GK16andhvc3u:9929_0: asmin vyaṅgyavyañjakabhāvavivecanamaye kāvyalakṣaṇe jñāte sati yāḥ kāścitprasiddhā
GK16andhvc3u:9932: yatra śabdānāmarthānāṃ ca keṣāñcitpratipattṛviśeṣasaṃvedyaṃ locanam pravartitā ityuttarakārikayā sambandhaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:9939: yadāha--viśeṣo guṇātmā guṇāśca rasaparyavasāyina eveti hyuktaṃ prāgguṇanirūpaṇe 'śṛṅgāra eva madhuraḥ' ityatreti // 45//
GK16andhvc3u:9944: bālapriyā ityuktetyādikamekaṃ vākyamasphuṭetyādivākyāntaraṃ tatraitadityanena dhvaneḥ parāmarśaśceti bodhyam /
GK16andhvc3u:9951: anubhavasiddhatvamiti vṛttau vakṣyamāṇaṃ phalitamarthaṃ manasikṛtya vivṛṇoti---anubhavetyādi /
GK16andhvc3u:9952: jātyatvamiva ratnaviśeṣāṇāṃ cārutvamanākhyeyamavabhāsate kāvye tatra dhvanivyavahāra iti yallakṣaṇaṃ dhvanerucyate kenācittadayuktamiti nābhidheyatāmarhati /
GK16andhvc3u:9955: arthānāṃ ca sphuṭatvenāvabhāsanaṃ vyaṅgyaparatvaṃ vyaṅgyāṃśaviśiṣṭatvaṃ ceti viśeṣaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:9956: tau ca viśeṣau vyākhyātuṃ śakyete vyākhyātau ca bahuprakāram /
GK16andhvc3u:9964: tathā--'vṛttayaḥ kāvyamātṛkāḥ' iti yaduktaṃ muninā tatra rasocita eva ceṣṭāviśeṣo vṛttiḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:9966: iyatā 'tasyābhāvaṃ jagadurapare' ityādābhāvavikalpeṣu 'vṛttayo rītayaśca gatāḥ śravaṇagocaraṃ,
GK16andhvc3u:9968: tatra kathañcidabhyupagamaḥ kṛtaḥ kathañcicca dūṣaṇaṃ dattamasphuṭasphuritamiti vacanena /
GK16andhvc3u:9969: idānīṃ vācāṃ sthitamaviṣaye' iti yadūce tattu prathamoddyote dūṣitamapi dūṣayat sarvaprapañcakathane hi asambhāvyamevānākhyeyatvamityabhiprāyeṇa /
GK16andhvc3u:9976: kiñca rītipadavīmavatarantītyatra kāvyalakṣaṇajñānasya hetutvamapi durghaṭamityato 'nyathaivātra pāṭha ityāha--pratītipadavīmiti /
GK16andhvc3u:9979: ratnaviśeṣāṇāṃ jātyatvamiva pratipattṛviśeṣasaṃvedyaṃ yatra keṣāñcicchabdānāmarthānāṃ ca cārutvamanākhyeyamevāvabhāsata ityanvayaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:9982: cārutvaṃ nāma kaścidviśeṣa iti vaktavyamityabhipretya nābhidheyatāmarhatītyuktamupapādayati--'yata' ityādi /
GK16andhvc3u:9993: prakāśamānatvaṃ tu yadanākhyeyatvamucyate kvacit tadapi kāvyaviśeṣāṇāṃ ratnāviśeṣāṇāmiva na sambhavati /
GK16andhvc3u:9997: vaikaṭikā eva hi ratnatattvavidaḥ, sahṛdayā eva hi kāvyānāṃ rasajñā iti kasyātra vipratipattiḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:9998: yattvanirdeśyatvaṃ sarvalakṣaṇaviṣayaṃ bauddhānāṃ prasiddhaṃ tattanmataparīkṣāyāṃ granthāntare nirūpayiṣyāmaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:9999: iha tu granthāntaraśravaṇalavaprakāśanaṃ sahṛdayavaimanasyapradāyīti na prakriyate /
GK16andhvc3u:10000: bauddhamatena vā yathā pratyakṣādilakṣaṇaṃ tathāsmākaṃ dhvanilakṣaṇaṃ bhaviṣyati /
GK16andhvc3u:10003: sāmānyasparśī yo vikalpastato yaḥ śabdaḥ dṛṣṭānte 'pi anākhyeyatvaṃ nāstīti darśayati--ratnaviśeṣāṇāṃ ceti /
GK16andhvc3u:10008: evaṃ hi sarvabhāvavṛttāntatulya eva dhvaniriti dhvanisvarūpamanākhyeyamityativyāpakaṃ lakṣaṇaṃ syāditi bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:10009: granthāntara iti viniścayaṭīkāyāṃ dharmottaryāṃ yā vivṛtiramunā granthakṛtā kṛtā tatraiva tadvyākhyātam /
GK16andhvc3u:10019: ratnaviśeṣāṇāṃ jātyatvādisāmānyasya sambhāvanayaiva mūlyaparikalpanāyā darśanāditi bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:10022: tadgranthāntare nirūpayiṣyāma ityuktyā sūcitamanirdeśyatvarūpalakṣaṇasya doṣaṃ darśayati--evaṃ hītyādi /
GK16andhvc3u:10031: kvacit granthe bhāva iti ca pāṭhaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:10032: tatpakṣe anākhyeyāṃśabhāvitvamiti śloke tasyoktameva dhvanilakṣaṇaṃ sādhīyaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:10034: na lakṣaṇaṃ, lakṣaṇaṃ tu sādhīyo 'sya yathoditam //
GK16andhvc3u:10038: anākhyeyāṃśasyābhāso vidyate yasmin kāvye tasya bhāvastanna lakṣaṇaṃ dhvaneriti sambandhaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:10041: anyastu 'nirvācyārthatayā' ityatra niso nañarthatvaṃ parikalpyānākhyeyāṃśabhāsitve 'yaṃ heturiti vyācaṣṭe, tattu kliṣṭam /
GK16andhvc3u:10061: yathā nayanaṃ lokān kṛtārthān vidadhāti, tathedaṃ vyākhyānamiti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:10063: āsūtritānāṃ bhedānāṃ samyaksūtrairnirdiṣṭānāṃ dhvanyādibhedarūpāṇāṃ kāvyavāṇīnāṃ yā sphuṭatāpattiḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:10068: śubhamastu sarvaṃ śivam iti śrīrāmaśārakaracitāyāṃ locanaṭippaṇyāṃ tṛtīya uddyotaḥ //
